\begin{entry}
\word{aMga}
\meaning{\artha{oDalu, deVha:}
\ullekha{shivajanamxdalilx huTiTx liMgeYkayxrAgi tamamx aMgada meVle shivaliMgavirutitxralu anayxrane hADi anayxrane hogaLi anayxra vacanava koMDADalu kamaR biDadu Bava\-baMdhana (savasaM. 1; basava. 107-29); aMgakokxMdu suguNa duguRNa soVMkuvalilx soVMkida kale aMgakokxV AtamxMgoV (savasaM. 6; aMgasoVM. 1-1).}
\artha{deVhada oMdu BAga; avayava:}\break \ullekha{shira\-sUsxrudavxyaM toVLagxLavu yugaM tAnaMga\-venipaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-100-29).} \artha{tavxkukx athavA camaR eMbalilx aMga eMbudu camaRkekx anavxyisutatxde:} \ullekha{aMgada koneyalilx liMga muMtalalxde saMgava mADanA sharaNanu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 305-96).}
\artha{Atamx:} \ullekha{liMgAMgasAmarasayx eMba padavu parashiva matutx Atamx ivugaLa sAmarasayxkekx anavxyisutatxde.}
\artha{shudadhx jiVvAtamx; shivAMsha\-vuLaLx ceVtana; liMga\-diVkeSxyanunx hoMdida jiVva:}
\ullekha{liMga\-veMdoDe nAdaM A nAdada aMgaveMdoDe cidibxMduvAda jiVvaM (manoVvi. 6-31 TiVku); aMgakekx 
nilukadu maMgaLamUruti saMgarahita nija\-liMgana noVDiro (kUDasavx. 60 anupalalxvi).}
\artha{liMgAMga\-sAmarasayx~paDedavana~Atamx~matutx~deVha~eraDU parashivana aMga. parashivanu BakatxdeVhika. deVva eMbalilx, `aikayxsathxla\-davane parashivana deVha' eMbathaRvide. Bakatxnu vividha aMgagaLa mUlaka viSayagaLanunx \hbox{anuBavisuvaMte}, parashivanU A aMga\-gaLa mUlaka anuBavisutAtxne - eMbudu I pari\-kalapxne:} \ullekha{I vikArada hiMDa \hbox{biDisi}, nija niLaya nimamxMgava toVri, susaMgata\-dalilxrisu enonxDeya viVrabiVreVshavxra liMga (savasaM. 9; viVrago. 87-26); sakaleVMdirxyaveMba hiMDu maMde\-yAgiveVko? idara saMgava biDisu, nimamx nijadaMgava toVri (savasaM. 9; viVrago. 95-28).} \artha{`aMga' eMba padavu `savxrUpa' eMbudakekx anavxya\-vAguvaMte baLakeyAgide:}
\ullekha{I vikArada hiMDa \hbox{biDisi}, nijaniLaya {nimamxM\-gava} toVri susaMgadalilxrisu \hbox{enonxDeya} viVrabiVreVshavxra\-liMgA (savasaM. 9; viVrago. 87-29); coVra maqtuyx \hbox{iMtivu} modalAda bahuvidhada parxkaqtigaLalilx kAyada nela\-holanalilx sakaleVMdirxyaveMba hiMDu maMdeyAgi\-veVkoV? idara {saMgava} biDisu, nimamx nijadaMgava toVri (savasaM. 9; viVrago. 95-31).}
\artha{\hbox{cenanx\-basavaNaNx}\-navara parxkAra aMgahiVnareMdare ajAcnxnigaLu athavA budidhxhiVnaru:}
\ullekha{avaru kANabeVku, ivaru \hbox{kANa\-beVkeMba} Barxmeya Barxmitaru aMgahiVnaru (savasaM. 3; \hbox{cenanxba.} 335-108).}\break
\artha{guruseVveya parxkAragaLalilx oMdu; guruvina {pAda\-gaLanunx} niVriniMda toLeyuvudu:}
\ullekha{\hbox{gurupAdaparxkASxLanAdikave} aMga\-venipudu (manoVvi. 2-21 TiVku); sadugxru seVve\-yAdoDe Apatx aMgasAthxna
  sadABxvaveMdu nAlukx te\char'273nAgi\-hudu... gurupAdaparxkASxlanaveV aMgavenisuvudu (viveVka. 17).}
\artha{{\fontsize{14pt}{12pt}\selectfont aMgasathxla:}}
\ullekha{Bakatx mAheVshavxra parxsAdi \hbox{pArxNaliMgi} sharaNareYkayxliRMgamene tatavxda vAcamAcAraliMga (savasaM. 11; shUnayxmaM. 1253-582).}
\artha{{\fontsize{14pt}{12pt}\selectfont aMgagaLu:}}
\ullekha{ivu savaRjacnxtA, taqpitx, anAdiboVdha, savxtaMtarxtA, alupatx\-shakitx, anaMtashakitx eMdu Aru ive (shivAkoV. 38-55).}
\artha{parabarxhamxnatatx cali\-suva jiVva:}
\ullekha{amitipadameV barxhamx\-saMjecnxgamanAthaRmeV gamitipadamuBayasaMyoVga\-meyaMgaM (shivaciM. 38-185).}
\artha{\hbox{shivajAcnxni\-yAda} jiVva.~\hbox{`tatatxvXmasi'} eMba mahAvAkayxdalilxna `tavxM' padakekx viSaya\-nAdavanu. janana-maraNagaLilalxda, shAshavxta\-vAda mahAliMgadalilx hecucx Bakitx\-yuLaLxvanu:}
\ullekha{jAcnxnamaMgamiti pArxhujecnxRVyaM liMgaM sanA\-tanamf (si.shi., 12:42); \hbox{jAcnxnaM} shivajAcnxnavAnf jiVvaH aMgaM aMgamiti pArxhuritayxthaRH | (si.shi. tatatxvX, parx., 12:42); anAdayxMta\-majaM liMgaM tatapxraM paramaM parxti~| yadf gacaCxti mahA\-BakAtxyX tadaMgamiti nishicxtamf || (a.sU. 4:2); liMgaM tatapxdamAKAyxta\-maMgaM tavxM padamiVritamf | (a.sU., 5:27)}
\artha{{\fontsize{14pt}{12pt}\selectfont shakitx:} (= jiVva, piMDa)}
\ullekha{shivasutx barxhamxceYvoVkatxH shakitx\-reVvAMgamucayxteV~| shivashakitxsamA\-yoVgoV jagatasxqqSaTxyXthaR\-kAraNamf || (shi.ta.ra., BA - 1, 1:4:49).} \artha{{\fontsize{14pt}{12pt}\selectfont aMgada cidaginx:} shariVradalilx manasisxde, manasisxnalilx BAvavide. BAvadAce `citf' ide. cidAnaMdasavxrUpavAda ceYtanayx{shakitx} citfnalilxruvudariMda alilx divayxteVjasusx (aginx) ide. `citf' eMba aginxyalilx shAriVraka AcaraNe\-gaLanunx hAki manada keTaTx guNagaLanunx suTuTxhAkabeVku:}
\ullekha{aMgada cidaginx\-yoLu aMgadAcaraNeya hAki hAge dahisidA Basamxvanu~| maMgaLada rakeSx... (ni: va 15:6).} \artha{{\fontsize{14pt}{12pt}\selectfont aMgada BaMga:} aMganu (sAdhakanu) para\-shivaniMda BinanxveMdukoMDirutAtxne hAgU {taninxMda} BinanxvAda liMgavanunx pUjisutAtxne. Adare, aikayxsathxlavanunx muTiTxda meVle tAnu aMgadiMda BaMganeMbudu keVvala Barxme {eMbudu} avanige gotAtxgutatxde:}
\ullekha{aMgada BaMgava liMga\-muKa\-diMda gelide. manada BaMgava aruhina muKadiMda gelide (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 5-3).} 
\artha{{\fontsize{14pt}{12pt}\selectfont aMgada laya:} deVhada guNa ilalxvAguvudu; liMgAMgasAmarasayxda anuBavadiMda aMganu tAnu parxteyxVkaneMdu tiLiyade, parashivanalilxruva oMdu arivuLaLx kaNa eMdu tiLiyutAtxne - aMganu tAnu ilalxveV ilalx, parashivanaSeTxV idAdxne, parashiva iciCxsidaMte tAnu kelasa mADuvudAgi heVLutAtxne. biVjavu moLakeyoDeda meVle heVge biVjavu naSaTxvAgutatxdeyoV hAgeyeV aMganu liMgavanunx arita meVle aMgatavxvanunx kaLedukoLuLxtAtxne (layaH - liVcnf - shelxVSaNeV, liVyateV iti layaH, layanaM - layaH).}
\artha{{\fontsize{14pt}{12pt}\selectfont aMgadAcAra:} aMga eMdare parashivana nele\-yAgiralu yoVgayxvAda Atamx, aMtha aMgada AcAra\-gaLelalx niSAThx\-pUvaRka dhAmiRka kirxyegaLU, sharxdAdhxpUvaRka neYtika \hbox{kirxyegaLU} AgirabeVkAgutatxde:}
\ullekha{aMgadalilx AcArava toVrida A AcAraveV liMgaveMdaruhida (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 2-5).}
\artha{{\fontsize{14pt}{12pt}\selectfont aMgadudaya:} AtamxsAkASxtAkxra; jiVvanige tAnu shivana aMga eMba jAcnxnavuMTAguvudu:}
\ullekha{aMgadudaya liMgasuKa (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 860-257).}
\artha{{\fontsize{14pt}{12pt}\selectfont aMganiraMgada kUTa:} aMgadalilx aMgavanunx kUDisuva meYthunakirxye pArxNigaLige sahajavAdadudx. Adare mumukuSxvu tananx aMgavanunx (jiVvAtamxvanunx) niraMga\-nalilx (=paramAtamxnalilx) beresidare, adeV aMganiraMga kUTa, athavA liMgAMgasAmarasayx:} \ullekha{aMganiraMgava kUDi saMGaTisuvAga caMdana gaMdhadaMte kirxV jAcnxna BeVda. \hbox{adaraMgava} tiLidalilx kAlAMtaka BiVmeVshavxraliMgavanaridudu (savasaM. 7; Dakekxbo. 915-288).}}

\newmeaning{\ni{aMgaM, niraMgaM - nigaRtaM aMgaM yasAmxtf tatf \hbox{niraMgaM}, aMgaM ca niraMgaM ca aMganiraMgeV, tayoVH aMganiraMgayoVH}}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{OMkArasahita nidiRSaTx biVjAkaSxragaLanunx shariVrada nidiRSaTx sAthxnagaLige saMbaMdhagoLisuva kirxye; japa pUjAdi samayadalilx maMtarxpUvaRkavAgi beraLugaLiMda deVhada nidiRSaTx BAgagaLanunx muTiTxkoLuLxvudu:}
\ullekha{aMgada meVle liMgasAhitayxvanuLaLx nijaviVrasheYvasaMpananxru tamamx savxyAMgaliMgavanaciRsuvalilx BavisheYva BinanxkamiRgaLaMte aMganAyxsa paMcamashudidhx modalAda ashudadhxBAvavapapx kuSxdarx hodadx\-lAgadu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 851-253); matatxmA maMtarxM\-gaLiM karanAyxsa deVhanAyxsa aMganAyxsameMba nAyxsatarxyaMgaLa utapxtitx sithxti saMhAra BeVdaMgaLaM pUvoRVkatxkarxmadiMdaridu visatxrisu\-vudaralilx gaqhasathxMge mutetxYde vidhaveyarige sithxtinAyxsa\-vahudu (savasaM. 9; {shAMtaviV.} 1436-534); kAyashudidhxgaLaMgashudidhxyaMganAyxsavA urukaranAyxsa savaRsididhxgaLapapxveYyaMgadalilx liMgava dharisidAkaSxNaM (viVsheYpu. 7-110-44); aMganAyxsa\-gaLu 
ivu saqSiTxnAyxsa, sithxtinAyxsa, saMhAranAyxsa eMdive. SaDakaSxra\-maMtarxgaLanunx deVhakekx saMbaMdhisuva vidhagaLu ivu (shivAkoV. 149-376).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{nAyxsaH - ni + asu - keSxVpaNeV, nayxsayxti, nayxsayxteV iti nAyxsaH, nayxsanaM - nAyxsaH, aMgeV aMgasayx vA nAyxsaH - aMganAyxsaH}}

\begin{entry}
\word{aMgaliMgasaMbaMdha}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shariVra matutx liMgagaLa saMbaMdha; vacanakAraru aMga matutx liMga\-gaLi\-giruva saMbaMdha\-vanunx mUru riVtiyAgi kaMDidAdxre:} \artha{guruvu liMgadiVkeSxya mUlaka iSaTxliMgavanunx shiSayxnige koTaTxnaMtara, shiSayxnu adanunx yAvAgalU deVhada meVle dharisirabeVku. hiVge dharisuvudariMda avanalilx aMgaliMga saMbaMdha EpaRTaTxMtAyitu.}
\artha{aMgaveMdare \hbox{shudadhxnAda} AtamxneMdU, liMgaveMdare cidavxsutxvAda parashivaneMdU athaR mADidare, Aga parimitiyuLaLx aMganu aparimitanAda parashivanoMdige saMbaMdha paDedidAdxneMdu athaRvAgutatxde. ililx ``saMbaMdha'' eMba padakekx `aikayxte' athavA `sAmarasayx' eMba athaRvide. aMgaliMgasaMbaMdhadalilx (aikayxteyalilx) \hbox{aMganige} tAnu beVre, parashiva beVre eMba devxYtaBAva iruvu\-dilalx. I riVtiya saMbaMdhakekx aMga matutx liMgagaLu sAradalilx oMdeV AgirabeVkAdudu avashayxka. kalulx matutx niVru beVre beVre riVtiya vasutxgaLAdudariMda, kalulx eSuTx vaSaR niVrinalilxdadxrU adu niVrinalilx beretu oMdAgalu sAdhayxvilalx. Adare aMga matutx liMga eraDU cidavxsutxgaLeV. AdudariMda samAdhisithxtiyalilxruva sAdhakana aMgavu parashivanalilx oMdAgu\-tatxde.}
\artha{aMgavu saMsArabaMdhanadalilxdAdxgalU adakekx liMga\-doDane saMbaMdhavidedxV irutatxde. adu yAvAgalU liMgada aMgaveV (BAgaveV). Adare adakekx mareviniMdAgi I saMbaMdha\-vanunx gurutisikoLaLxlu sAdhayxvAguvudilalx. badalige deYhika suKaveV hececxMdu tiLidu tananx saMsArabaMdhanavanunx \hbox{matatxSuTx} gaTiTx\-mADikoLuLxtatxde. idoMdu baMdhanaveMba arivAdavanu, saMsAravanunx tiLidu, adariMda tapipxsi\-koLaLxlu, mAgaRdashaRnakAkxgi guruvina baLi barutAtxne. Bakitx, jAcnxna, kirxye matutx veYrAgayxgaLanunx oLagoMDa shivayoVgavanunx guruvu boVdhisi\-dAga, avanige avugaLa arivAgutatxde. aikayx\-sithxti\-yalilxru\-vavana aMgaliMga {saMbaMdhakUkx} saMsArabaMdhana\-dalilxruvavana\break aMgaliMga saMbaMdhakUkx oMdu muKayx vayxtAyxsa\-vide - \hbox{kalilxnalilx} beMkiyidadxrU, adu parxkaTavAgalu heVge oMdu kAraNa beVkoV, hAgeyeV saMsArabaMdhanadalilxruvavana aMgaliMga\-saMbaMdhavu goVcaravAgabeVkAdare, adakekx shivayoVgasAdhane\-yeMba kAraNa beVku:}
\ullekha{kirxyAjAcnxnasaMbaMdha\-veMdu nuDivaru kirxyAjAcnxnasaMbaMdhaveMtipuRdeMdariyaru. kirxVyalilx aMgaliMga\-saMbaMdhavanariyaru, jAcnxnadalilx liMga\-jaMgamasaMbaMdhavanari\-yaru (savasaM. 1; basava. 1166-319); aMgaliMga\-saMbaMdhavilalxdavara saMga BaMgaveMdu kUDalacenanx\-saMgayayxna \hbox{sharaNaru} mecacxrayAyx parxBuve (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1270-447); utapxtayxkUkx naSaTxkUkx uBayada oDala\-naritalilx, adu aMga\-liMga\-saMbaMdha (savasaM.\,8; moVLimA. 1657-548); aMgaliMgasaMbaMdha\-veMba davxMdavxvanaLidu, aSaTxvidhAcaRne SoVDashoVpacArada haMga haridu, soVhaM soVhaM enunxtitxdidxtutx (savasaM. 9; soDaDxLa. 729-223); aMgaliMga\-saMbaMdhava gaBiRVkarisikoMDu jiVvAtamx aMtarAtamx paramAtamxveMba BeVdavanaritu \hbox{atatxtatxle} nishicxMta nirAkuLaliMgadalilx niviRkAra\-nAgidaRnayayx (savasaM. 10; jakakxNa. 908-519).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{aMgaliMgayoVH saMbaMdhaH - aMgaliMgasaMbaMdhaH}}
\end{entry}

\ullekha{tApatarxyaMgaLu, aMtaH\-karaNaM\-gaLu iMtivAdiyAgi toVruva toVrikeyeVnU nAnalalx, \hbox{nananxvalalx} (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 58-21); shirxVguruputarxnAgi avaru tamamx aMtaHkaraNa kaqpeyiMda peVLida parxsAdavAkayxvanu avara dayadiMda peVLutideRnu keVLirayayx (savasaM. 10; kADasi. 321-202).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{aMtaHkaraNacatuSaTxya}
\meaning{\arthanonum{25 tatatxvXgaLalilx citatx, {budidhx}, ahaMkAra matutx manasusx eMba nAlakxra samUha: kameRVMdirxyagaLU, jAcnxneVMdirxyagaLU Atamxna karaNagaLu. Atamxnu keYkAlu itAyxdi\-gaLanUnx kaNuNx kivi muMtAdavugaLanUnx baLasikoMDu ruci noVDuvudu, keVLisikoLuLxvudu, naDedADuvudu muMtAda kelasagaLanunx mADutAtxne. adeV riVti manasusx, budidhx, \hbox{ahaMkAra} matutx citatx Atamxna nAlukx aMtaHkaraNagaLu. ivU saha Atamxna saMgadiMdAgi matutx AtamxnigoVsakxra nAlukx \hbox{parxkArada} mAnasika kirxyegaLanunx mADutatxve. oMdu vasutxvanunx noVDidAga manasusx adara meVle keVMdirxVkaqtavAgada horatu, nAvu A vasutxvanunx eSuTx hotutx noVDidarU adanunx tiLidu\-koLaLxlAguvudilalx; vasutxvina meVle manasusx keVMdirxVkaqta\-vAdAga budidhx, `idu iMtha {vasutx}' eMbudanunx nidhaRrisutatxde. ahaMkAravu `nAnu I vasutxvanunx noVDutitxdedxVne, nAnu nALe I kelasavanunx mADabeVku' eMdukoLuLxtatxde. yAva vasutxvanunx tiLidukoLuLxvAgalU iMdirxya, manasusx, budidhx beVkAgiruvaMte ahaMkAra saha beVku. citatxvu koVpa, saMtoVSa, loVBa muMtAdavugaLa AsharxyasAthxna:}
\ullekha{mana budidhx citatx ahaMkAraveMba aMtaHkaraNacatuSaTxyaMgaLaM tiLidu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 330-1000);
BUtAdiyeYdu ...aMtaH\-karaNacatuSaTxyavavoMdi ipaRtutxnAlukx tatatxvXMgaLAtamx sutatatxvXmapapxvu (viVsheYpu. 6-96-26-27).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{aMtaHkaraNAnAM catuSaTxyaM - aMtaHkaraNacatuSaTxyaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\artha{jiVvAtamx; haqdayamadhayxvatiRyAda barxhamx\-vasutx paramAtamx; jiVvAtamxnigiMta ucacxsithxtiyalilxruva para\-mAtamxna arivuLaLxvanu:}
\ullekha{jiVvAtamx aMtarAtamxna sudidxya besagoMbaDe heVLihe keVLiM BoV (savasaM. 1; basava. 927-244); jiVvaru mUvarayayx jiVvAtamxMtarAtamx paramAtamxtAtamxtarxyaM ...sUkaSxmXdalilx tanuvilasita vayxvahAriMdiMdaMtarAtamxneMdenisikoMbaM (viVsheYpu. 7-100-38-39).} \artha{EkoVtatxra jaMgamaliMgasathxlada olavu\-liMga, nirUpaliMga, parxsAdaliMga matutx pAdoVdaka\-liMga eMba nAlukx viBAgagaLalilx oMdAda olavu\-liMgada tirxvidha\-gaLalilx oMdu:} \ullekha{olavu\-liMga tirxvidha jiVvAtamx, aMta\-rAtamx,\break para\-mAtamx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 839-246)}. \artha{Atamxna parxgatige anuguNavAgi parxkaTagoLuLxva eMTu parxkAragaLalilx oMdAda jiVvAtamx:} \ullekha{jiVvAtamxnaMta\-rAtamxM parAtamxM nimaRlAvisheVSAtamx shudAdhxtamx \hbox{sujAcnxnAtamxnoVvalu} mahAtamx BUtAtamxniMtaSATxtamxru (viVsheYpu. 7-100-20).} \artha{ipapxtAtxru vidha tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdu:} \ullekha{ipapx\-tetxYdaneya tatatxvXvadu. jiVvAtamxnadanA sanatukxmAraM opapxvena\-lAcaripanenanx mana oMdipupxdipapxtatx A\char'273\char'311nisuvaMtarAtamx\-noLalA (viVsheYpu. 3-38-34).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{aMtaH vidayxmAnaH AtAmx - aMtarAtAmx}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{aMtarAtamxsathxla}
\src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{pArxNaliMgisathxlada {oMbatutx} vidha liMga\-sathxlagaLalilx oMdu; jiVvAtamxna aMtarAtamxBAvada sithxtiyanunx heVLuva sathxla; jiVvAtamxnu deVhadalilxdadxrU deVhasaMbaMdha\-diMda dUravAgi savxsavxrUpajAcnxnadiMdalU, paramAtamx BAva\-vuLaLxvanAdudariMdalU aMtarAtamxnenisutAtxne. jiVvAtamxnu vivikatxrUpadiMdalU, ahaMBAvavashanAgiruvudariMdalU manuSayx modalAda BArxMtiyuMTAgutatxde. I BArxMtiyu sAvxBAvikavAdudalalx eMba jAcnxnavu uMTAguva jiVvaneV aMtarAtamx. Atanige saMbaMdhisida sathxla:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
sathxlAnAM navakaM porxVkatxM pArxNaliMgisathxlAshirxtamf |\\[1pt]
AdAvAtamxsathxlaM porxVkatxmaMtarAtamxsathxlaM tataH ||\\[3pt]
deVhasithxtoV{\char'263}payxyaM jiVvaH deVhasaMgavivajiRtaH |\\[1pt]
boVdhAtf parAtamxBAvitAvxdaMtarAtemxVti kiVtiRtaH ||\\[3pt]
ahaMkArasayx saMbaMdhAtf manuSayxtAvxdiviBarxmaH |\\[1pt]
na savxBAva iti jAcnxnAdaMtarAtemxVti kathayxteV ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 18. 2, 19, 21)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{jiVvaBAvanivaqtitx mADi dAsoVhasanamxyaliMgavA pArxNa\-liMgi\-yoLu moVhadiMdAtamxsuviveVkiyAgidaR BeVdavadeMte\-nalekx keVLa deVhadoLagaMtAcarisutipaRnaMtarada deVhiyaMta\-yARmiyAgiyA savxpanx \hbox{sugArxhiyaMbujajaladavolu} \hbox{muTiTxyU} muTaTxdudeyaMtarAtamxsathxlaM (viVsheYpu. 8-126-\-35); iMtu jiVvaBAvanivataRkaliMgaM pArxNaliMgiyalilxyAtamx viveVkamaM pArxpatx BeVdaveMtidiRtetxMdoDe muMde aMtarAtamx\-sathxlavAdudu (keYvasha. 126-1-sUtarx).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{aMtarAtAmx iti sathxlaM yasayx tatf - aMtarAtamxsathxlaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{aMbaramada}
\meaning{\arthanonum{aSaTxmadagaLalilx oMdu; palalxkikx modalAda vAhanaBoVgagaLanunx anuBavisuvavanu; nelada meVle naDeyadavanu:}
\ullekha{paqthivxmada salilamada pAvakamada (pavanamada) aMbara\-mada ravimada shashimada Atamxmada - iMtiV aSaTxmadaM\-gaLa vivara (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 329-106); aMtaraMgada aSaTx\-mada avAveMdare heVLuve keVLiraNANx... aMbaramada ravimada shashimada AtamxmadaveMba aSaTxmUtiRya madaMgaLu (savasaM. 14; heVmaga. 1059-489); aMbaramadavadAgeyAMdoVLa muKayxvAhanavaneLasuvanu (viVsheYpu. 7-100-19).}}

\newmeaning{\ni{aMbarasayx madaH - aMbaramadaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{a, u, ma}
\meaning{\arthanonum{OMkArada viBakatx rUpa; oMdu deYvavanunx kuritu mADuva upAsaneyalilx baLasuva nidiRSaTx maMtarxda mUlaBUta akaSxrasamUha; biVjAkaSxra; OMkAradalilx akAra ukAra makAra ivu mUru biVjAkaSxra; akArave nAda, ukArave biMdu, makArave kaLe; akArave rudarx, ukArave Ishavxra, ma\-kArave sadAshiva:}
\ullekha{a, u, mAkaSxra parxsAda paMcAkaSxravAgi niMdAta namamx basavaNaNx (savasaM. 10; gaNaviV. 634-331); a, u, ma akaSxragaLu biVjAkaSxragaLeMba hesariniMda heVLalapxDuvuvalalxde avu anukarxmavAgi rudarx, Ishavxra, sadAshiva eMba adhideVvategaLa sAthxna\-gaLeMtalU heVLalapxDuvuduMTu (shivAkoV. 14-24).}}

\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{parxNava, OMkAra}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{akAya}
\meaning{\artha{parashiva. kAya (shariVra) yArige iruvu\-dilalxvoV avanu, nideRVhi. shivayoVgiyu shariVrarUpadalilx goVcarisidarU shariVra\-saMbaMdhiyAda vayxvahAra\-gaLilalxdiruvudariMda akAya, sherxVSaThx yoVgi enisutAtxne. samasatx parxpaMcavU tananx rUpaveMba BAvane\-yiMda kUDiruva, deVhABi\-mAna\-shUnayxnAda shivayoVgi:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
aupacArikadeVhitAvxtf jagadAtamxtavxBAvanAtf |\\[2pt]
mAyAsaMbaMdharAhitAyxdakAyoV hi paraH samxqqtaH ||\\[4pt]
parasayx deVhatAyxgeV{\char'263}pi na deVhAsharxyavikirxyA |\\[2pt]
shivaseyxVva yatasatxsAmxdakAyoV{\char'263}yaM parxkiVtiRtaH ||\\
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 16. 43-44)}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\artha{kAyada duSapxrXBAvakekx oLagAgadiruvudu; deVheVMdirxya\-gaLelalxvanUnx parashivanigapiRsi deVhaBAvavilalxdiruvudu:} \ullekha{aMga-\-mana BAvavaLida kAraNa kAya akAyavAyitutx (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 5-5).}
\artha{sakAya, akAya matutx parakAya eMba kAyaliMgada mUru viBAgagaLalilx oMdu; sUthxla kirxyegaLanunx aMgadoDane hoMdisade, liMgakAyadiMduMTAda nideRVhasithxti:}
\ullekha{kAyanalalx akAyanalalx guheVshavxraliMga tAneyAgi (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 689-185); akAyadalilx mahAGana\-parxsAdi (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 441-137); cenanxmalilx\-kAjuRnayAyx, nimamx sharaNanu akAyacaritanAgi (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 176-53). shikASxdaMDave kaTiTxge, paMcaBUtakAyava\-nuLida akAyave kaMthe (savasaM. 6; uripe. 1304-419); jagajagisuva paraMjoyxVtiya berasute agalade tananx nijada beLagi\-niMde sogasute desedesegaLali parxkAshavanogumige pasaripudaduve\-yakAyavu (keYvasha. 102-2); kAya\-liMga tirxvidha; sakAya, akAya, parakAya (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 849-255).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{na vidayxteV kAyaH yasayx saH akAyaH}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{akAyasathxla}}}
\end{entry}

\artha{shudAdhxdevxYta athavA cidadevxYta eMdu kareya\-lAguva I dAshaRnika paMthavu sArarUpadalilx upaniSatutx\-gaLalelxV idadxrU, adakokxMdu sapxSaTx rUpavanUnx, Badarx bunAdi\-yanUnx hAkikoTaTx kiVtiR shaMkarAcAyaRrige salulxtatxde. adevxYta sidAdhxMtada parxkAra elelxlUlx oMdeV tatatxvXvide; adeV niguRNabarxhamx; parxpaMcavu mAyeyeV horatu, barxhamxnaMte shAshavxta satayxvalalx; jiVvAtamxnu barxhamxniMda Binanxvalalx; jiVvanu avideyx\-yiMdAgi parxpaMcavu satayxveMdU, adu barxhamxniMda saqSiTxyAgide eMdU; tAnu parashivaniMda (barxhamxniMda) BinanxveMdU, tAnu deVheVMdirxyAdigaLeMdU tapupx tiLididAdxne. avanige jAcnxnoVdayavAdAga tAnu barxhamxneMdU, \hbox{parxpaMcavu} mitheyxyeMdU tiLiyutAtxne. barxhamxjAcnxnige barxhamxvoMdeV kANisu\-tatxde, parxpaMcavu kANisuvudilalx. idakikxMta Binanx shivA\-devxYtadalilx jagatutx mAyeyeMba shakitxrUpavAdadudx. idanunx aridalilx shakitx, maredalilx mAye eMdu tiLiyabeVku:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}

tadAhuH sathxlamadevxYtaM shivayoVgeYkatatapxrAH ||
\end{shl}

\pauthor{(a.sU., 2, 9)}

\pauthor{(viV. u., 1. 23, pu. 8)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{adevxYtava aMtaraMgadalilx aridu horage dAsoVhava mADa\-didaRDe eMtayAyx uBayasaMdeVhadalilx nijavapupxdu? (savasaM. 1; basava. 977-262); pArxNaliMgakekx kAyave sejejx, AkAsha\-gaMgeyalilx majajxna. hUvilalxda parimaLada pUje! haqdaya\-kamaladalilx `shivashivA' eMba shabadx - idu, adevxYta kANA \hbox{guheVshavxrA} (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 198-63); hU miDiya haridaDe haNaNxpupxde? hasivu taqSe niderx AlasayxvuLaLxnanxkakxra adevxYta\-vuMTe jagadoLage? (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1681-621); nuDiyabahude adevxYtavanoMdukoVTi veVLe? omemx naDeya\-bahude nidhaRravAgi sadaBxkitx sadAcArava?... (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1275-366); devxYtavaLidu adevxYtadiMda tananx tAnaridaDe cenanx\-malilxkAjuRnaliMgavu tAne (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 354-105); devxYtAdevxYtavilalxdaMdu shaMkara shashidhara IshavxrareMba gaNAdhiVshavxra\-rilalxdaMdu niVnu uluhaDagidedxyalAlx (gaNaBA. 92-18); baLasadiradevxYtavanu bAhayxdoLu ninonxLageVkoV BAvaneyoDa\-gUDu (keYvapa. 13-4).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{davxyoVH BAvaH devxYtaM, na devxYtaM - adevxYtaM}}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{muKayxdeVvate: saqSiTxpUvaRdalilx parashiva obabxneV idudx, avanige saqSiTx mADabeVkeMdu iceCxyAdAga avananunx niSakxlaliMga athavA sathxla eMdu kareyalAgutatxde. Aga modalu avaniMda sadAshiva horabarutAtxne; avanige jAcnxna\-shakitxyu joteyalilxrutatxde. sadAshivaniMda icACxshakitxyoDa\-gUDida Ishavxra; ivariMda kirxyAshakitxyoDa\-gUDida rudarx; ivariMda mahAlakiSxmXyeMba shakitxyoDagUDida viSuNx; ivariMda sarasavxtiyeMba shakitxyoDagUDida barxhamx horabarutAtxne. ivariMda parxpaMcada elAlx carAcara vasutxgaLu huTuTxtatxve:}
\ullekha{Adi anAdi adhideVvategaLu miVnaja roVmaja ciTaTxja capapxja QuSiyarugaLu modalAdanaMta barxhamxrilalxdaMdalilxMdatatxtatx EkaliMga obabxneV sharaNa (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 978-318).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{adhideVvategaLu matutx shakitxgaLu}
\meaning{\arthanonum{parxpaMcada saqSiTxge eraDu kAraNagaLive - shakitxyu upAdAnakAraNa, shivanu nimitatx kAraNa. shakitxyu shivanalelxV idudx, kelavu veVLe avayxkatxvAgiyU matetx kelavu veVLe vayxkatxvU Agirutatxde. shakitxyu avayxkatxvAgi shivanalilx oMdAgidadxre, A sithxtige parxLayaveMtalU, adeV {shakitx} vayxkatxvAgi vikAsavAdare saqSiTxyeMtalU hesaru. {shakitxya} \hbox{vikAsa\-da} parxtiyoMdu haMtadalilxyU shivana
 mAgaRdashaRna\-virutatxde. shakitxvikAsada vividha haMtagaLige beVre
 beVre hesaru\-gaLiruvaMte, avugaLa vikAsavanunx niyaMtirxsi, avu\-gaLige 
 mAgaRdashaRna niVDuva shivanigU AyA haMtagaLige takakxMte beVre
 beVre hesarugaLive. shivana I vividha avasethxgaLige
 adhi\-deVvate\-gaLeMdu hesaru. aMdare adhi\-deVvategaLu shivAMshikarAda
 deVvate\-gaLeV horatu, anayxralalx. hiVge kirxyAshakitxya \hbox{matotxMdu}
 rUpavAda paqthivxVtatatxvXvanunx niyaMtirxsuva adhi\-deVvate barxhamx;
 jAcnxnashakitxya matotxMdu rUpavAda jalatatatxvXvanunx
 niyaMtirxsuvavanu viSuNx; icACxshakitx, Adishakitx matutx
 parAshakitxya beVre rUpagaLAda aginx, vAyu matutx
 AkAshatatatxvXgaLanunx niyaMtirxsuvavaru rudarx, Ishavxra matutx
 sadAshiva. parashivanu tananx vividha shakitxgaLanunx tanage beVkAda
riVtiyalilx vikAsavAgalu biDade athavA tAneV avugaLiMda
baMdhitanAgade, avugaLanunx sakAladalilx niyaMtirxsi, avakekx sUkatx 
mAgaRdashaRna niVDi vikasita\-vAguvaMte mADutAtxne. \hbox{parxpaMcada} parxti
AguhoVgugaLalilxyU avanige Asakitx ide.}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad kirxyAshakitxya matotxMdu rUpa paqthivxVtatatxvX; barxhamx adara niyaMtarxkanAda adhideVvate. avanu paqthivxVtatatxvXvoMdanenxV alalxde itara tatatxvXgaLanUnx seVrisikoMDu saqSiTx mADutAtxne; barxhamxnilalxdidadxrU, paMcashakitxgaLu (paMcaBUtagaLu) irutatxve; Adare avugaLiMdAguva saqSiTxyiruvudilalx.}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad jalatatatxvXvu saMGaTanAsAmathayxRvuLaLx shakitx. jalatatatxvX\-diMdAgiyeV yAva vasutxvAdarU BAgavAgadeV athavA puDiyAgadeV uLidiruvudu. oMdu puDiyanunx athavA huDimaNaNxnunx niVru hAki kalasi mudedx mADabahudu. adeV riVti iDiV parxpaMcavanunx cadurihoVgadaMte hiDidiTiTxruva {shakitx} viSuNxvigide. viSuNx jalatatatxvXda (athavA jAcnxnashakitxya) adhi\-deVvate eMdarU oMdeV, viSuNxvu jagadarxkaSxka eMdarU oMdeV. adeV riVti aginxge nAshamADuva shakitxyiruvaMte aginx athavA icACxshakitxya adhideVvateyAda rudarxnigU saMhAra mADuva shakitxyide.}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad vAyuvige vasutxgaLanunx sathxLAMtarisuva shakitxyide. adeV riVti adara (athavA Adishakitxya) adhideVvateyAda Ishavxranige, manuSayxna maraNada naMtara jiVvAtamxnanUnx avana jote\-yalilxruva sUkaSxmX matutx kAraNashariVravanunx, adara kamaR\-kakxnuguNavAgi matotxMdu janamxkekx sathxLAMtarisuva shakitxyide. AkAsha\-tatatxvXvu vasutxgaLu savxtaMtarxvAgi (yAvudeV
 taDeyilalxde) calisalu avakAsha mADikoDutatxde. adeV riVti,
 AkAsha\-tatatxvXda athavA parAshakitxya adhideVvateyAda sadA\-shivanU
 saha, jiVvAtamxru AdhAyxtimxka sAdhaneya mUlaka liMgeYkayx\-vanunx
 paDedare, avarige sAvxtaMtarxyXvanunx
 anugarxhisutAtxne. liMgeYkayxrige kAladeVshagaLa taDeyilalxdiruvudeV
avaru cidAkAshadalilxruvudakekx kuruhu. Adishakitx matutx
parAshakitx\-gaLige karxmavAgi tiroVdhAnashakitx matutx anugarxhashakitx
eMba hesarugaLU ive (va.pA.koV. 18).}}
\end{entry}

%\ullekha{AdiliMga anAdi jaMgamaveMba BeVdava vivarisi toVridanayayx basavaNaNxnu (savasa. 2; alalxma. 876-257); Adi anAdiyiMdatatxtatxlAda nirAkAra paravasutx tananx savxrUpava tAna\char'273\char'236yade anaMta kalapxkalApxMtara iduR tananx savxliVleyiMda ...citetxnisitutx (savasaM. 10; kADAyx. 13-8); paraM gUDhameMdatishaya shariVrasathxveMdu liMgakeSxVtarxveMdanAdiyumenipapx nutavAdanAdiyiVshavxrana teVjasasxmagarxteya liMgavadeYdu ku\char'273\char'304hiMdalipupxdeY (viVsheYpu. 1-3-19).}}
\artha{parabarxhamx; paramatatatxvX:}
\ullekha{manada koneya moneya meVle maneya mADikoMDipapxnobabx dAsoVhi. AdiviDidu baMdAtaneV Bakatx. AdiviDidu baMdAtaneV jaMgama Adiguru anAdishiSayx (savasaM. 1; basava. 804-206).} 
\artha{nAda, biMdu matutx kaLegaLu oTuTxgUDi Ada goVLakAkAravAda liMga; cililxMga:}
\ullekha{sahajadiMda nirAlaMbavAyitutx; nirAlaMba\-diMda nirALavAyitutx. nirALadiMda niravayavAyitutx, niravaya\-diMda anAdiyAyitutx. anAdiyalilx mUtiRyAdanobabx sharaNa (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1576-468).}

%Adiye deVha anAdiye nideRVha ...I {eraDa\char'273} yoVgava BeVdisi taninxMda tAne tiLidu noVDalu AdisaMbaMdhavapapx BUtaMgaLu nAnalalx (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 48-19)
\artha{saMjecnxgaLu:} 
\ullekha{ivu aidu ive: 1.~para, 2.~gUDha, 3.~shariVrasathx, 4.~liMga\-keSxVtarx, 5.~anAdi - I parxkAra irutatxve. layaBoVgAdhikAra\-vanuLaLx parashivanu tAneV tatatxvXparxBAvamUtiRyenisi[da]-vayxya aparxmANa asAdhayx niSakxlatatavxveV paMcasaMjecnxyiMdipupxdu. adeM\-teM\-daDe: jagatf saqSiTxgAdi, aSaTxtanugaLigAdi, tirxmUtiRgaLi\-gAdi, SaTitxrXMshatatatxvXkAkxdi, Ishavxra sadAshivagAdiyAgipapx, meVlaNa para\-tatatxvXve para anaMtakoVTi barxhAmxMDagaLoLageviDade carAcara\-venisuva pArxNigaLoLage sUkaSxmXvAgi, vaTavaqkaSxdoLaDagipapx biVja\-daMte gUDhavAgi, ArigU haDeyabArade vishavxkekx 
kAraNavAgi\-hudeV {\bf gUDha.} tanonxLage shivashakitxgaLa shariVra GaTisi carAcaraMgaLu sitxrXV puM[napuM]sakaveMba muderxyiMda bahunAmaMgaLiMda tanonxLa\-gipapx kAraNa {\bf shariVrasathx;} tanonxLagiha mAyeyiMda jagatfsaqSiTx modalAda sakalaparxpaMca toVri A parxpaMcige tAne BUmi\-yAgi elalxva tanonxLagiMbiTaTx tAnenanxda aBinanxdiMdihude {\bf liMgakeSxVtarx;} Ishavxra sadAshivaru modalAda anaMta deVvAtamxmUtiRgaLa jananaM\-gaLAdiyiMdatatxtatxlipupxde {\bf anAdi}.
iMtapapx paMcasaMjecnx\-yanuLaLx liMgavanarita liMgeYkayxMge namoV namoV eMbenayAyx (savasaM. 6; Adaya. 1084-334); paramAtamxna iravu heVgirutatxdeMbudanunx ivugaLu vivarisutatxve. 1.~\hbox{paramAtamxnu}\break `para' eMdare saqSiTxsalapxTaTx elalx vasutxgaLanUnx miVridavanu ...\break paramAtamxnu anAdiyAgidAdxne. aMdare avanige Adi eMdare huTuTx eMbudilalx. huTuTx ilalxdadxriMda avanige aMtayx eMdare maraNavU ilalx. hiVge I aidu guNagaLiMda avananunx nAvu gurutisabeVku (shivAkoV. 20-31).}
\artha{parameVshavxrana kalegaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{nivaqtitx, parxtiSAThx, vidAyx, shAMti, shAMtayxtiVta, shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxra, anAdinimARya, anivARcayx ivu kalegaLu (shivAkoV. 141-338); AdiyeMdare deVha, anAdiyeMdare Atamxnu (liMgavi. 8-6 TiVke).}}

I daqSiTxyiMda noVDidAga duHKavu vaNaRnege sikakxlAradu. obabxna duHKavanunx vaNiRsalu nAvu eSeTxV shabadxgaLanunx KacuR mADidarU, goVDeya vaNaRnegiruvaSuTx Kacitate matutx sapxSaTxte, avana duHKada vaNaRnege baruvudilalx. adeV riVti, anuBAvige uMTAguva suKa anivARcayx. kelavu veVLe nAvu upameyanunx baLasi vaNiRsutetxVve. Adare upamegaLigU kelavu mitigaLirutatxve. udAharaNege, Atamx barxhamxra aikayxteyanunx baqhadAraNayxka upaniSatitxnalilx ({\small\rm IV}.3.21) `gaMDanu heMDatiya apupxgeyalilxdAdxga, avanige oLagu-horagugaLa vayxtAyxsada arivu heVge uMTAguvudilalxvoV hAgeyeV barxhamxnalilx liVnavAdavanige oLa horagugaLa vayxtAyxsada arivAguvudilalx' eMdu heVLalAgide. sitxrXV puruSaru apupxgeya naMtara matetx beVrebeVreyAguvaMte, AtamxnU anuBAva (samAdhi sithxti) mugida naMtara matetx beVrebeVreyAgutAtxreyeV eMba saMdeVha namamxlilx mUDutatxde. idakekx kAraNaviSeTxV: nAvu BASeyanunx kaliyuvudu iMdirxyAnuBavada mUlaka. aMdare nAvu kalita BASeyu baLakeyAguvudu iMdirxyAnuBavada parxpaMcada mitiyalilx mAtarx. Adare anuBAvavu oMdu atiVMdirxya matutx atibwdidhxka anuBavavAdudariMda, adanunx vaNiRsalu iMdirxyAnuBavada mUlaka kalita BASe ashakatxvAgutatxde (noVDi: anuBAva).}

\word{arivu (a\char'273\char'236hu)}
\src{va}
\meaning{\artha{tiLivaLike; jAcnxna.} \artha{tananx iruvikeya bagegina tiLivaLike; sAvxtamxjAcnxna; parashiva:} \ullekha{\hbox{tanuvina} koVpa tananx hiriyatanada keVDu. manada koVpa tananx \hbox{arivina} keVDu (savasaM. 1; basava. 248-62); arivuLaLxvanaMte Bavadalilx bAhara Bavanava kAvane, tatatxvXBAvaneya balalxvanaMte, tutitxnAsegAgi bekikxnaMte dhAyxnisutitxpapxne (savasaM. 8; madhuva. 995-293).} \artha{shivasaMbaMdhavAda tiLivaLike; shivajAcnxna:} \ullekha{kUDalasaMgamadeVvana arivu anupamavAgaloDane bevahAra\-doLagiraliVyadayAyx (savasaM. 1; basava. 910-237); ariva ariya heVLi sadugxrunAtha kuruha keYyalilx koTaTxnu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 958-311); arivu kaNedxreyadavaralilx Aratiyanolelx\-yayAyx niVnu (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 179-57); A arivu liMgavanoDagUDiyalalxde beVre oDaluviDiyadu (savasaM. 6; {aMgasoVM.} 1-1); arive parabarxhamxveMdu BAvisuvane jANara deVva arivane nitayxnimaRLaveMdu nenevane jANara deVva (keYvapa. 117-15-1).} \artha{AcaraNeya mUlaka parxkaTagoLuLxva tiLivaLike:} \ullekha{ariveMbudeV kirxV, kirxVyeMbudeV niravaya (savasaM. 8; meremiM. 1296-451); vacanakAraru tamamx vacanagaLalilx arivu -I shabadxvanunx bahaLa upayoVgisuvuduMTu ...avara daqSiTx\-yalilx arivu eMdare keVvala tiLivaLike mAtarxvalalx, kirxye\-yiMdAda anuBavavU adaralilx kUDide. tiLivaLikeyu kirxyeyalilxyeV toVrabeVku (shivAkoV. 4-6).} \artha{aruhu:} \ullekha{tananx aruhane maredu kuruhane pUjisuva naragurigaLa noVDA (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 958-311); 2. aruhinApAyxyanakekx anuBAvaveV taqpitx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 963-312).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{aruvatutxnAlukx shiVlagaLu}
\meaning{\arthanonum{viVrasheYvadiVkeSxyanunx paDedavanu anusarisabeVkAda aruvatutxnAlukx bageya sadAcAragaLu; shiVlagaLu anaMtasaMKeyxyalilxdudx, avugaLalilx parxmuKa\-vAgi aruvatutxnAlukx shiVlagaLu, {ipapxtutxnAlukx} shiVlagaLu eMbudAgi heVLutAtxre. ililx aruvatutxnAlukx shiVlagaLa vivaraNe\-yanunx koDalAgide:} \ullekha{aru[pAThAM.]vatutxnAlukx shiVla\-dalilx naDedu toVridanenage basavaNaNx noVDayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 203-63); pAlukxrike soVmeVshavxraM tAne oMdAdi\-ya\char'273\char'304vatutxnAlukx shiVlAMtaraMgaLanusuridAgamAthaRkarxma\-vanoreveneMdaM deVshikaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-32).}
\arthanonum{oMdaneya shiVla = utapxnanxshiVla, udoyxVgashiVla, liMgAMga saMbaMdhashiVla muMtAda ipapxtutxnAlukx shiVlagaLanunx keYkoMDu naDesuvudu:} \ullekha{I heVLidaKiLashiVlaMgaLaM keYkoMDu moVha\-diMdaM naDesa\-loMdaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-33).} \arthanonum{{eraDa\-neya} shiVla = heMDatiyiMdalU I ipatutxnAlukx shiVla\-gaLa AcaraNe\-yanunx tapapxdaMte mADisuvudu:} \ullekha{moVhini\-yenipapx tananxbalegiV varxtava mADuvuderaDaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-33).} \arthanonum{mUraneya cArushiVla = tananx baMdhumitarxrU I sadAcAra\-gaLanunx anusarisuvaMte mADuvudu hAgU meYligeyilalx\-daMtiruvudu:} \ullekha{beVhavaru tananx podiRdari\-gaMtenage modaleV hasanadAgiyaLavaTaTx shiVlavarxjagArxhakatavxvanoDa\-cuRvude parigaNa\-neyiM peVLalapxDutitxdaRnu A rajasUsxtakaM\-gaLevudeV mU\char'273neya cArushiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-34).} \arthanonum{nAlakxneya shiVla = saMcitakamaRgaLanunx puNayxkAyaRgaLiMda niVgikoLuLxvudu:} \ullekha{kamaRmaM kaLevudeV Arayeyx nAlakxneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-112-34).} \arthanonum{aidaneya shiVla = heMDatiyu gaBiRNi\-yAdAga liMgada hasatxdiMda BasitagaBaRsaMsAkxravanunx mADisuvudu:} \ullekha{aMgane gaBaRvAge samashiVlavapapx cAru\-liMgada hasatxdiM BasitagaBaRsaMsAkxramaM mADisuvadeYdaneya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-34).} \arthanonum{Araneya shiVla = jaMgama\-pAdoVdaka\-parxsAdavanunx liMgakekx koTuTx sivxVkarisuvudu:} \ullekha{tajajxMgamada pAdatiVthaR\-parxsAdavane liMgakekx koTuTx\-koMbudA\char'273neya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-35).} \arthanonum{ELaneya shiVla = jaMgamaveV shivaneMdu BAvisuvudu:} \ullekha{jaMgamavane shivaneMbudeVLaneya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-35).} \arthanonum{eMTaneya shiVla = BavigaLige kANabAradeMdu shAka pAkAdigaLa pAterxgaLanunx vasatxrXgaLiMda saMpUNaR\-vAgi mucucxvudu:} \ullekha{varxtada BAMDakekx tuMbi savARMga\-pAvaDeya kaTuTxvudeMTaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-35).} \arthanonum{oMbatatxneya shiVla = ememxya hAlanunx tayxjisuvudu:} \ullekha{ememx\-vAlaM koMbudeV dUSayxvenutaM biTuTx naDevudeV oMbatatx\-neya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-35).} \arthanonum{hatatxneya shiVla = tAneV shasAtxrXdigaLanunx odagisuvudalalxde, Bavige kwSxra mADuvu\-dilalx\-veMba Bakatxna keYyiMda kwSxra mADisikoLuLxvudu:} \ullekha{Bavige kelasaMgeyeyxneMba Bakatxna keYyoLeV vApanakirxyeya keYkoMbu\-daMtalalxveV tAne shasAtxrXLigaLananumADikoMDu kAlAnukUlAdi Bakatxra kAyoLanumADiseVneMbudiVga hatatxneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-36).} \arthanonum{hanonxMdaneya shiVla = hasu karugaLige liMgamuderxyanunx hAkidanaMtara hAlanunx kareyuvudu:} \ullekha{savaR\-lakaSxNada pashuka\char'273\char'304vige jAcnxniyeV liMgamuderxyanotitx ka\char'273\char'311vudeV niVna\char'273\char'236va hanonxMdaneya shiVlavayayx (viVsheYpu. 7-113-36).} \arthanonum{hanenxraDaneya shiVla = shivaBakatxra keYyiMda hulalxnunx tarisi, goVvugaLige hululx, niVranunx koDuvudu:} \ullekha{sanAmxni goVviMge shivaBakatxriM hulalx tarisiVvutatx tamAmxyatxda udakamaM koDu\-vudeV hanenxraDaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-37).} \arthanonum{hadimUraneya shiVla = jihAvxcApalayxkAkxgi upupx seVrisada sapepxyAgiruva padAthaRgaLanenxV seVvisuvudu:} \ullekha{upApxdiyaM nADe jihAvx laMpaTada[va] bageyadada biTuTx nisapxqqhada sapepxyeV hadimU\char'273neya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-37).} \arthanonum{hadinAlakxneya shiVla = liMgamuderxyiruva hasu matutx hoVrigaLanunx kUDisuvudu:} \ullekha{liMgamuderxya pashuge gaBaRvapupxdake muderxya basavanaM kUDi\-suva\-dutatxmada goVmayaM sAraNege \hbox{viBUtiya} mADe hadinAlakxneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-37).} \arthanonum{hadineYdaneya shiVla = shivaBakatxnAda kuMbAraniMda maDikegaLanunx mADisi, avugaLige liMgamuderxyanunx hAkuvudu:} \ullekha{shiva\-Bakatx kuMbA\char'273na gaqhake karedAyatada navajaladoLaM BAMDamaM mADisutatx matatxvu muKayx savaRkekx liMgamuderxyanotetx hadi\-neYda\-neya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-38).} \arthanonum{hadinAraneya shiVla = shiva\-BaketxyareV hatitxyanunx biDisi, nUlu tegedu, Bakatxru neVyadx baTeTxgaLige liMgamuderxyanonxtitxda naMtara dharisuvudu:} \ullekha{ava\-yavada vasatxrXkekx nUluvoDe biVvugaLotxvala kivi\-yiDade Baketxya\-riMda nUlisutatxve BakatxriM neVyisx liMgamuderxyanotetx hadi\-nA\char'273neya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-38).} \arthanonum{hadineVLaneya shiVla. orateya niVrinalelxV baTeTxgaLanunx ogeyuvudu:} \ullekha{A vasatxrXmaM cilumeyagagxNiyoLaM toLevudeV vicArisalu hadi\-neVLaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-39).} \arthanonum{hadineMTaneya shiVla = camaRda pAdarakeSxgaLanunx biTuTx marada hAvugegaLanunx dharisuvudu:} \ullekha{hAvugeyaneV meTiTx togala pAdukeya biDe hadi\-neMTaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-39).} \arthanonum{hatotxMbatatxneya shiVla = hUdoVTakekx Baviya daqSiTx tAkadaMte beVliyanunx hAkisuvudu:} \ullekha{pUvinutatxmada toVTakekx Bavi\-gaLa daqSiTx yAvuduM biVLadaMdade beVliyaM \hbox{ke\char'273\char'311pudeV}\-voMdu kaDame\-yipaRtatxneya shiVlaveMdenipudeY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-39).} \arthanonum{ipapxtatxneya shiVla = shivaBakatxnAda arasaniMda BUmiyanunx paDedu, adakekx liMgAMkita mADida naMtara shudidhxgoLisuvudu:} \ullekha{A BakatxnAda doreyiMdalA keSxVtarxmaM shirxVBUtiyitutx keYkoMDu liMgAMkitavanA BUmigoDaricuta shoVdhisUdiVgaLi\-paRtatxneya shiVlavahudu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-40)} \arthanonum{opapxtotxMdaneya shiVla = liMgamuderxyanunx hAkida etutxgaLa koraLige hagagxvanunx kaTiTxdanaMtara A BUmiyanunx uLuvudu:} \ullekha{keSxVtarxvaM geyavx vaqSaBaMgaLegx swBAgayx liMgamuderxya koraloLiDuta matAtxBAsamiNigaTaTxdA hagagxdiM geyavx shiVlavipaRtotxMdaleY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-40).} \arthanonum{ipapxtetxraDaneya shiVla = guruliMgajaMgamadalilx guNAvaguNagaLanunx huDukade avaru heVLidaMte naDeyuvudu:} \ullekha{guruliMgajaMgamadoLA guNaM duguRNaM piridu maqdu kaThiNa karuNa devxVSamumana\char'273saduru\-taradoLavarahudideMbudane tAneyahudeMdu matatxvariMdave haruSadiMdahudenisikoMbudeV ipaRtutx eraDaneya {shiVlaveY} (viVsheYpu. 7-113-41).} \arthanonum{ipapxtutxmUraneya shiVla = Bavi\-yanunx neMTaneMdu parigaNisade avanalilx koDukoLuLxvike\-yanunx mADadiruvudu:} \ullekha{Bavi {neMTanenanxdeyavarigeVnuvaM} koDade koLaLxdeV lekikxsadadipaRtutxmU\char'273neyadeY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-41).} \arthanonum{ipapxtutxnAlakxneya shiVla = BavishabadxvanUnx anayxdeVvatAsutxtiyanUnx keVLisikoLaLxdiruvudu:} \ullekha{BavishabadxvanayxdeYvada BajaneyaM tananx kiviyalilx {keVLadihu\-dipaRtutx} nAlakxneya savilAsashiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-42).} \arthanonum{ipapxtetxYdaneya shiVla = shivaBakatxneV kuliVna. parashivaneV paramAtamx hAgU paMcAkaSxriyanenxV maMtarxveMdu BAvisuvudu:} \ullekha{shiva\-BakatxneV kulajaniVshavxrane deYvavinunx parxvimalada paMcAkaSxriye maMtarxveMdu shurxtavavirataM daqSATxMtamaM toV\char'273\char'304vude... ipaRtutx\-aidaneya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu.\break 7-113-42).} \arthanonum{ipapxtutx Araneya shiVla = jAtisUtaka, janana\-sUtaka matutx perxVtasUtakagaLanunx keYbiDuvudu:} \ullekha{jAtisUtaka janana\-sUtakaM matetxyA perxVtasUtakavaLivudipaRtutx A\char'273neya sAti\-shayashiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-43).} \arthanonum{ipapxtetxVLaneya shiVla = tirxkaraNagaLalUlx paradhana, parasitxrXVyara bagegx ciMtisa\-diruvudu:} \ullekha{paradhana parasitxrXVyaraM tirxkaraNadoLu neneyadAta\-naduyipaRtutxyeVLaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-43).} \arthanonum{ipapxtutx eMTaneya shiVla = parxtiPalavananxpeVkiSxsade parashiva\-nanunx pUjisuvudu:} \ullekha{pirxVtiyiM kAmisuta kalipxsuta neVmisuta BUteVshanaM beVDadipuRdeV yipaRtutxyeMTaneya shiVla\-vahudeY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-43).} \arthanonum{ipapxtotxMbatatxneya shiVla = shivaBakatxra jAtigaLa bagege keVLadiruvudu:} \ullekha{opapxdiM BakatxroLu jAtigalana\char'273sadude ipaRtatxdoMbatatxneya\-deMdenipa shiVlavapupxdu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-44).} \arthanonum{mUvatatxneya shiVla = shivaBakatxra arivina bagege saMdeVhapaDadiruvudu:} \ullekha{A BakatxroLu balalxtanava\char'273sadiha shiVla mUvatatxneyadu apupxdu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-44).} \arthanonum{mUvatotxMdaneya shiVla = shiva\-BakatxroMdige takaR mADadiruvudu:} \ullekha{A BakatxroLu takiRsa\-dudiVga celavxpapx mUvatotxMdaneyadu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-\-44).} \arthanonum{mUvatutx eraDaneya shiVla = tananx neladalilx nAyi, haMdi, koVLi, bekukx muMtAda pArxNigaLu ODADadaMte noVDikoLuLxvudu:} \ullekha{shunakaM haMdi bapaR kukukxTane mAjAR\-lanaM tananx siVmeya meTaTxliVsadihudu mUvatutxyeraDaneya shiVlaveMda\char'273\char'311vudu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-45).} \arthanonum{mUvatutx mUraneya shiVla\break = yAvudeV roVga baMdarU nAru, beVru, maMtarx mATagaLiMda cikitesxyanunx mADisadiruvudu:} \ullekha{inAnxva bageyiMdalaSoTxVtatxra shatavAyxdhiyAvarisalA nAru beVru maNi maMtwrxSadhaMgaLaM biTiTxpuRdu mUvatutxmU\char'273neya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-45).} \arthanonum{mUvatutxnAlakxneya shiVla = tithi, laganx, shakuna muMtAdavugaLanunx naMbadiruvudu:} \ullekha{tithilaganx\-vAvAra viGanx shakunaMgaLaM bageyadudu mUvatutx nAlakxneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-45).} \arthanonum{mUvatatx \hbox{aidaneya} shiVla = BaviyoDane yAva bageya saMpakaRvanUnx iTuTxkoLaLxdiruvudu:} \ullekha{Baviya neremane Bavi beLeda dhAnayxvu Avavava biTuTx Bavi\-yoLu nuDiyadipuRdeV mUvatutx aidaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-46).} \arthanonum{mUvatutxAraneya shiVla = saMkArxMti, shivarAtirx muMtAda shuBadinagaLalilx opopxtutx UTavanunx mADadiruvudu:} \ullekha{tithi vAraM shuBAvahada saMkArxMti shivarAtirxyeVka\-BukAtxdigaLa mADadihudu mUvatutx A\char'273neya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-46).} \arthanonum{mUvatetxVLaneya shiVla = guruliMga\-jaMgamagaLige niSeThxyiMda naDedukoLuLxvudu:} \ullekha{guruliMga\-caradeVvareDegeVnuvaM vaMcisade naDevudeV mUvatutxyeVLaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-46).} \arthanonum{mUvatetxMTaneya shiVla = tiVthaRyAterxgaLalilx naMbikeyilalxdiruvudu:} \ullekha{A tiVthaRyAterx\-yoLf vishAvxsavilalxdihudeV tiLiye mUvatutxyeMTaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-47).} \arthanonum{mUvatotxMbatatxneya shiVla = yArigU upadeVshavanunx mADadiruvudu:} \ullekha{yArigeyu upadeVsha\-viVyadudu muvavxtatxvoMbatetxleY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-47).} \arthanonum{nAlavxtatxneya shiVla = jaMgamakekx mADuva upAdhi, nirupAdhi muMtAda AcaraNegaLalilx sAmarasayxsavxBAvadiMda iruvudu:} \ullekha{Otu jaMgamakaMtupAdhi nirupAdhiyaMtAtatada sahaja\-mATaMgaLAcaraNeyoLu niVtiyiM sahajamATavane mADu\-vudu nAlavxtatxneya shiVlavahudu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-47).} \arthanonum{nAlavxtotxMdaneya shiVla = tamamx manetanada gurugaLige takakxMte naDedukoLuLxvudu:} \ullekha{maMdirada tamamx samayA\-cAradoDeyarige oMdu samashiVlavAgidaRvara deVvaru\char'273\char'311saMda\-rAdoDeyavara pAdadoLu sahagamanaviVga nAlavxtutxvoMdu eMdenipa shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-48).} \arthanonum{nAlavxtetxraDaneya shiVla = adhamaRvanunx sahisadiruvudu hAgU deVhABimAnavanunx tayxjisuvudu:} \ullekha{anusaraNeyanoDaMbaDade muMde tAneV\-yadhamaRkekx seYrisada nalaviMda deVhABilASeya biTaTx nisapxqqhada shiVla nAlavxtetxraDulA (viVsheYpu. 7-113-48).} \arthanonum{nAlavxtatxmUraneya shiVla = deVhakekx sadAcAra, manasisxge arivu eMdu BAvisi, pArxNaveV jaMgama eMdu tiLidiruvudu:} \ullekha{AcAraM vicAra muMtAgi ne\char'273\char'311\ tatatxnuvigAcAravA mana\-kakx\char'273\char'311veMdenunxtatxM vicArisutAtx pArxNaveV jaMgamavadeMdu manaBAvadiM citatxshudadhxdoLa\char'273\char'311va shiVlaveV bageye nAlavxtatxmU\char'273\char'311Y (viVsheYpu. 7-113-49).} \arthanonum{nAlavxtutxnAlakxneya shiVla = adaqSaTxda benunxhatatxdiruvudu:} \ullekha{kAlakalapx\-nege beMbiVLadutatxmikeyiVga nAlavxtutxnAlakxneya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-49).} \arthanonum{nAlavxtutx aidaneya shiVla = keTaTx \hbox{mAtugaLanunx} ADadiruvudu:} \ullekha{A jihevxyoLagA kushabadxvilalxdude ...nAlavxtutx aidaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-50).} \arthanonum{nAlavxtutx Arane\-ya shiVla = keTaTx mAtugaLanunx keVLadiruvudu :} \ullekha{neYjashurxti\-yoLagaM kushabadxmaM keVLadudu nAlavxtutx A\char'273neyadeY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-50).} \arthanonum{nAlavxtetxVLaneya shiVla = jAgarx, savxpanx, suSupitx eMba mUru avasethxgaLalUlx shivananunx biTuTx beVre\-yadanunx neneyadiruvudu:} \ullekha{A jAgarxmuM savxpanxmuM suSupitx\-gaLalilx rAjadharanalalxdanayxvana\char'273\char'311yadipuRdeV teVjiSaTx nAlavxtutx\-yeVLaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-51).} \arthanonum{aivatatxneya shiVla = etitxna gADiyalilx parxyANavanunx mADuvudu:} \ullekha{kAyaRkAraNavAgi tAneV parxyANakA baMDiyoLu basavaMgaLaM kaTiTx tANakeyidavudadeYvatatxneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-51).} \arthanonum{aivatutxvoMdaneya shiVla = dashavAyugaLa iceCxyaMte naDeyadiruvudu:} \ullekha{dashavAyugaLa lasadiceCx\-yoLu hariyeneMdeMba shiVlaveV BAvisalekxYvatutxvoMdaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-52).} \arthanonum{aivatetxraDaneya shiVla = ariSaDavxgaR, aSaTxmadagaLanunx tayxjisuvudu:} \ullekha{ariSaDavxgaRvaSaTx\-madamaM kaLedu tatatxvXMgaLa vaqMdamaM tiLivudeYvatetxraDaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-52).} \arthanonum{aivatutxmUraneya shiVla = kasUtxri, pacacxkapURra muMtAda sugaMdhadarxvayxgaLanunx bayasadiruvudu:} \ullekha{kasUtxri kapURravAsAvxdu puNugA javAdi\-gaLu kuMkumada meVlaNa mahABArxMtu tananx manadaliceCxYsadihu\-deYvatutxmU\char'273neyadenipa shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-52).} \arthanonum{aivatutx nAlakxneya shiVla = rudArxkiSxyanunx biTuTx beVre oDave\-gaLanunx dharisadiruvudu:} \ullekha{rudArxkeSxyABaraNadanitalalxdeV mikakx navaratanxdABaraNamaM dharisadipuRdiVga tanujaneV aivatutxnAlakx\-neya shiVlaveMdenipudu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-53).} \arthanonum{aivatetxYdaneya shiVla = sharaNanalelxV parashivanu nelasiruva\-neMdu tiLiyuvudu:} \ullekha{yatarxjiVvasatxtarx shivaneMbavana {mAtanati\-gaLedu} sharaNa\-madheyxVliMga liMgamadheyxV sharaNanu eMba shurxtivAkayxdiM sharaNa\-noLu liMgaveV tuMbipuRdeMdoDaMbaDisuta mahAshiVla\-veMbu\-deYvatetxYdu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-54).} \arthanonum{aivatAtxraneya shiVla = dashavidha pAdoVdaka hAgU EkAdasha parxsAdagaLanunx ariyuvudu:} \ullekha{dashavidhoVdakavadeVkAdashapArxsAdavu eMbuda\char'273\char'311vude shiVlaveYvatutx A\char'273\char'311nipudu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-54).} \arthanonum{aivatetxVLaneya shiVla = catuviRdha moVkaSxgaLanunx apeVkiSxsadiruvudu:} \ullekha{sAloVkayx sAmiVpayx sArUpayxmuM baLika sAyujayxmaM bayasa\-dipuRdeYvatutxyeVLaneya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-54).} \arthanonum{aivatetxMTaneya shiVla = paMceVMdirxyagaLalUlx liMga\-BAvavanunx sAkASxtAkxra mADikoLuLxvudu:} \ullekha{kAmitaM kalipxta\-vadilalxde liMgaviDidiV mahatasxkalaBoVgaMgaLaM BoVgisu\-vudA mALekxyeMtenalu paMceVMdirxyadoLu liMgasAvxyatavanu mALapx I mALekxyeYvatutxyeMTaneya shiVlavahudeY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-55).} \arthanonum{aivatotxMbatatxneya shiVla = SaTasxthXlAcaraNe\-gaLiMda kUDidudx, {upeVkeSxyilalxdiruvudu:}} \ullekha{SaDusathxla\-susaMpananxnAgisutAtx meVle te\char'273hu ma\char'273hilalxdiVgaLeYvatutx\-voMbatatxneyadu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-55).} \arthanonum{aruvatatxneya shiVla = tAnAgi yAvudanUnx apeVkiSxsadiruvudu:} \ullekha{bayasi baMdu\-de\-yaMgaBoVgaveMdenipudeY bayasadeV \hbox{baMdudaMtadu} liMgaBoVgaveY savxyadiMdaleVnuvaM BAvisada shiVlava\char'273\char'304vatatx\-neyadu (viVsheYpu. 7-113-56).} \arthanonum{aruvatotxMdaneya shiVla = paMcajAcnxnagaLa arivanunx paDedukoMDiruvudu:} \ullekha{niyatade matijAcnxnavA shurxtijAcnxnavAsharxyavAdaKaMDita\-jAcnxnavA joyxVtiniNaRya lasadajAcnxnavA keVvalajAcnxna\-veMdeMba paMcajAcnxnava a\char'273\char'311dipuRda\char'273\char'304vatutxvoMdaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-56).} \arthanonum{aruvatetxraDaneya shiVla = beLagu, madhAyxhanx matutx sAyaMkAla eMba kAlagaLa kalapxne\-yilalx\-diruvudu:} \ullekha{udayamadhAyxhanxvasatxmAnaMgaLeMbe\char'273kavaha kAlakalipxtavilalxdipuRda\char'273\char'304vatutxyeraDaneya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-57).} \arthanonum{aruvatutxmUraneya shiVla = karasathxla\-liMgadalilx neTaTxdaqSiTxyiMdiruvudu:} \ullekha{ne\char'273\char'311\ liMgadaqSiTx hasatx sharxvaNa jihevxyoLagurivaMte noVDi hiDidude keVLi savivudeMda\char'273\char'311du sahaBoVjanaM mADuva\char'273\char'304vatatxmU\char'273neya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-57).} \arthanonum{aruvatutxnAlakxneya shiVla = japa, tapa, mwna muMtAduvanunx biTuTx shiVlajAcnxnavanenxV sadAcAraveMdu BAvisu\-vudu:} \ullekha{japatapadhAyxna mwnaM BArxMtugaLanelalxvapa\-karisi tAnalalxdanayxvilelxMda\char'273\char'236du vipulashiVlajAcnxnaveV shiVlaveMdu \hbox{nishashxbadxveV} shabadxveMdu upamita barxhamxmitutxcayxteVyeMdipuRdu\-pariya\char'273\char'304vatutxnAlakxneya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-58)}.}
\end{entry}

\artha{parxNavadiMda utapxtitxyAda tAraka, daMDaka, kuMDala, atheRVya matutx biMdu eMba aidu bageya AkArada adhaRcaMdarx lakaSxNagaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{areve\char'273\char'311ya kaTeTxsakadiM kaDeyoLipuRdeVyadhaRcaMdarxM nAlakxneyadenisitu ...A nakA\-rave tArakasAthxnaveY keVLu sUnuve makAraveV daMDaM shikAraveya\-nUna kuMDaliyalAvAkAravadhaRcaMdarxM yakAraM biMduveY (viVsheYpu. 1-5-27, 29).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{apaRNa}

gaMdhaparxsAdaM sadaBxkAtxshX citatxhasetxVna cApaRyeVtf ||\\[2pt]

daqgaMgakeV{\char'263}GoVramuKeV shivaliMgABidheV punaH ||\\[2pt]

pArxNaliMgisathxleV tAvxdishakitxyuketxV tavxgaMgageV ||\\[2pt]
caraliMgABidheV tatupxruSavaketxrXV daqDhavarxtaH |\\[2pt]
BakAtxyXnuBAvayA manoVhasetxVna sapxshaRmapaRyeVtf ||\\[2pt]
sharaNasathxleV tu parayA shakAtxyXyuketxV sharxvoV{\char'263}MgageV |\\[2pt]
parxsAdaliMgeV tivxVshAnamuKeV shabadxparxsAdakamf ||\\[2pt]

muKaM hasatxM parxsAdaM ca jAcnxtAvx veY samayxgacaRyeVtf |\\[2pt]

\meaning{\artha{ajAcnxna:} \ullekha{paramAtamxneMba sUyaRnu parxkAshisu\-titxralAgi avideyxyeMba katatxleyelAlx nAshavAguvudu (gaNaBA. 51-11).} \artha{paMcamAyegaLalilx oMdu:} \ullekha{\hbox{AgamapuruSa\-rirA,} nimamx Agama vAyavAgi hoVyitatxlAlx. vidAyxpuruSa\-rirA nimamx videyx avideyxyAgi hoVdalilx, barumuKarAgi ididxralAlx (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 113-37); deVhaveMbudu avideyx eMbuvaru; adeMtayAyx? deVha tAnilalxde Asharxyisuva pari eMtayAyx? aridaDe Asharxyisa, maredaDe Asharxyisuva (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1683-478); ArAra meVliMdatatxtatx toVruva nira\-vaya tAneMdarida meVle tanuvinalilx tAmasa avideyx toVralu kAraNaveVnu? paramaliVlAsapxdakekx niMdudAgi (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 689-207); saMtataM ninanxlilx toVpaR vidAyxkaqti BArxMti keDaloVsugaM liMgAMgasaMyoVgamaM taLedu sujAcnxna\-niSaThxnAgu (shivaciM. 52-5); tamasusx, mAye, moVha, avideyx, anaqtAtamxkiyeMbaveV mAyApaMcakaMgaLava\char'273lilx ......videyxyiM\break keDuvuda\char'273\char'236Mdavideyxyenisuvudu (viveVka. 31).}}

\begin{entry}

 manuSayxnu aSaTxtanu uLaLx piMDAMDa\-veMdU, parashivanu
 aSaTxtanuvuLaLx barxhAmxMDaveMdU heVLuvaru. piMDAMDadalilxruva eMTu

I tatatxvXgaLanunx ilalxdaMte mADidare athavA I tatatxvXgaLu kAyaR nivaRhisadaMte mADidare duHKagaLu ilalxdaMtAgutatxve eMdu heVLuvudara badalu A tatatxvX\-gaLanunx citf tatatxvXgaLanAnxgi parivatiRsidare avu duHKakekx kAraNa\-vAguvudara badalu duHKadiMda \hbox{biDugaDeyAgalu} sahAyakavAgutatxve eMdu heVLutAtxre. \newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad aginxtatatxvXvu iMdirxyaviSayagaLige kAraNavAgidudx. shiva\-yoVgiyu
 parxsAdiyanunx nijadaqSiTxyiMda noVDi nirahaMkAraveMba hasatxdiMda

 iMdirxyaviSayavanUnx (rUparasAdi viSayagaLanunx) shivaparxsAdaveMdu tiLiyuvanu. vAyutatatxvXvu pArxNAdi vAyupaMcakagaLige kAraNavAgidudx; avugaLa calaneyiMdAgi aneVka guNadoVSagaLuMTAguvuvu. shivayoVgiyu pArxNaliMgiyanunx nijadaqSiTxyiMda noVDi, sumanaveMba hasatxdalilx
sapxshiRsidare, vAyutatatxvXda duguRNagaLelAlx nivaqtitxhoMdi, adu
cidAvxyu enisikoLuLxvudu. idariMda vAyupaMcakagaLu sariyAda
riVtiyalilx kelasa mADi, pArxNaliMgiya anuBAvakekx beVkAda
EkAgarxteyanunx paDeyalu sahAyakavAgutatxve.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad AkAshatatatxvXvu aMtaHkaraNagaLige kAraNavAgidudx, avugaLeV elalx kamaRgaLa mUla; elalx suKaduHKagaLige kamaRgaLeV mUla. shivayoVgiyu sharaNananunx nija\-daqSiTxyiMda noVDi, sujAcnxnaveMba hasatxdiMda muTiTxdare ava\-nalilxdadx AkAshatatatxvXda duguRNagaLelalx nivaqtitx hoMdi, adu cidA\-kAshavenisikoLuLxvudu. idariMdAgi shivayoVgiya aMtaHkaraNagaLu shudadhxvAguvuvalalxde, avana naDe nuDigaLU pavitarxvAguvuvu; liMganiSeThxyU vaqdidhxsutatxde.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad AtamxtatatxvXvu jAgarxta, savxpanx matutx suSupitx eMba avasethxgaLige kAraNa. I avasethxgaLalilx nAvu aneVka riVtiya suKaduHKagaLanunx anuBavisutetxVve. shivayoVgiyu aikayxnanunx nijadaqSiTxyiMda noVDi, sadABxvaveMba sUkaSxmXhasatxdiMda muTiTxdare, avasethx\-gaLalilx paDuva suKaduHKagaLu mAyavAgi Atamxvu cidAtamx\-venisuvudu. idu shudadhxvAda AtamxvAdudariMda, adu liMgakekx sAthxnavAgiralu yoVgayxvAgutatxde.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad koneyadAgi sUyaR matutx caMdarx eMba tatatxvXgaLu parxtiyobabxralilxruva adeV hesarina eraDu nADigaLu. saMsAra\-baMdhana\-dalilxruva
 vayxkitxyalilxna I nADigaLu aneVka kAraNa\-gaLiMdAgi parxkAshamayanAda parashivananunx noVDalu aDiDx\-mADutatxve. Adare
 shivayoVgiyu niravayamUtiRyanunx nijadaqSiTxyiMda noVDi,
 pariNAmaveMba sUkaSxmXhasatxdiMda muTiTxdare, I sUyaRcaMdarxra
 doVSagaLu nivaqtitx hoMdi, avu
 citUsxyaRcaMdarxreninxsikoLuLxvuvu. idariMdAgi \hbox{sAdhakanu}
 mahAbeLageMba parAtapxrashivananunx tananx cidakiSxyiMda noVDalu
 sAdhayxvAgutatxde:}
\ullekha{parashivayoVgiV\-shavxranu nivaqtitxmAgaRveMdare paqthivxyaLidu nivaqtitx\-yAgi citapxqqthivx\-yenisipuRdu. apupxvaLidu nivaqtitxyAgi cidapupx\-venisipuRdu, aginxyaLidu nivaqtitxyAgi cidagimxyenisipuRdu. vAyuvaLidu nivaqtitxyAgi {cidAvxyuvenisipuRdu,} AkAsha\-vaLidu nivaqtitxyAgi cidAkAshavenisipuRdu. AtamxvaLidu nivaqtitx\-yAgi cidAtamxnenisipuRdu. A sUyaRcaMdArxdigaLaLidu nivaqtitxyAgi citUsxyaR caMdarxrAgipaRru (savasaM. 14; mUmumu. 2056-101).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{aSwTx ca tAH tanavaH aSaTxtanavaH, aSaTxtanUnAM nivaqtitxH aSaTxtanunivaqtitxH, aSaTxtanu nivaqtetxVH mAgaRH - aSaTxtanu\-nivaqtitxmAgaRH}}

\begin{entry}

\src{saM}
\meaning{\arthanonum{mUvatetxMTu kalegaLu. sadoyxVjAta, vAmadeVva, aGoVra, tatupxruSa matutx IshAna - ivaru paMcakalAbarxhamxru. ivarige saMbaMdhi\-sida aidu maMtarxgaLalilx iruva mUvatetxMTu kalegaLu (sadoyxVjAtamaMtarxdalilx eMTu, vAmadeVvamaMtarxdalilx hadimUru, aGoVramaMtarxdalilx eMTu, tatupxruSamaMtarxdalilx nAlukx matutx IshAnamaMtarxdalilx aidu - oTuTx mUvatetxMTu kalegaLu):}}

\begin{shl}

\begin{shl}

aGoVrasayx kalAshAcxSwTx vAmadeVveV tarxyoVdashaH |\\[1pt]
sadayxsAyxSaTxkalA jecnxVyA aSaTxtirxMshatf kalA samxqqtAH |\\[1pt]
IshAnAdi ca sadAyxMtaM aSaTxtirxMshatf kalA samxqqtAH |\\[1pt]
aSaTxtirxMshatf kaloVpeVtaM kalAdayxM tatf parxkiVtiRtamf ||

\medskip
\pauthor{(vA.shu.A., 7. 19-21, 36)}

BaveV, 4) aBaveV, 5) nAtiBaveV, 6) Bavasavx mAM, 7) Bava,\break 8) udaBxvAya namaH ;

namaH; rAjasiV, rakASx, rati, pAliniV, kAmA, saMyaminiV, kirxyA, budidhx,

EvaM tatupxruSashecxYva catusarxshacx kalAH samxqqtAH ||\\

\begin{entry}
\word{aSaTxdaLa}
\meaning{\arthanonum{jiVvAtamxnu nelesiruva; iMdarxdaLa, aginxdaLa, yamadaLa, neYrutayxdaLa, varuNadaLa, vAyavayxdaLa, kubeVradaLa, IshAnayxdaLa eMba eMTu daLa kamala. ivu eMTu dikukxgaLatatx cAcidudx. oMdoMdu daLadalUlx avanu oMdoMdu bageya guNa-avaguNagaLanunx hoMdirutAtxne. udAharaNege - sadugxNa, hasive, korxVdha, devxVSa, niderx, gamana, caMcalacitatxte, dhamaRbudidhx, sitxrXVviSayAsakatxte, sadABxva itAyxdi. utatxramuKiyAdalilx avanu paramAthaR moVkaSxkekx ahaRnAgutAtxne. keTaTx guNagaLanunx dATi meTiTx Atamxnanunx oLeLxyavananAnxgi mADalu sAdhayx:}
\ullekha{iMdarxdaLaveV\char'273lu guNiyAgihanu .....madhayxsAthxnakekx baMdalilx sadABxviyAgi moVkaSxva bayasutitxhanu iMtiV aSaTxdaLaMgaLalilx tiruguva haMsana neleya keDisi sadABxviyAgirabalalx kUDalacenanxsaMgA nimamx sharaNa (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1029-345); enanx haqdayakamalada aSaTxdaLada dAvxtirxMshatf kusumamadhayxdalilxpapxnA sUyaR (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 243-68); aSATxvaraNa hiDidaSATxcaRneyiMdaSaTxdaLadi niV 
be\char'273\-gAgo (kaDasavx. 1-35-1).}}
\vskip 6pt
\newmeaning{\ni{aSwTx dalAni yasayx tatf - aSaTxdalaM; aSaTxdalAni - aSwTx ca dalAni, tAni ca aSaTxdalAni}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{aSaTxdaLakamala}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{idu oMdu upame. iDiV vishavxvanenxV nAvu oMdu kamalaveMdu
 UhisikoMDare, Aga vishavxda eMTu dikukxgaLanunx, A kamalada eMTu
 daLagaLaMte Uhisi\-koLaLxbeVkAgutatxde. A eMTu daLagaLeMdare:
 iMdarxdaLa (pUvaR), aginxdaLa (AgenxVya), yamadaLa (dakiSxNa),
 neYrutayxdaLa (neYrutayx), varuNadaLa (pashicxma), vAyudaLa
 (vAyavayx), kubeVradaLa (utatxra) matutx IshAnayxdaLa
 (IshAnayx). kelavu veVLe mAnavana haqdayaveV aSaTxdaLakamalaveMdU
 kareya\-lAgide; parxpaMca hAgU \hbox{mAnavana} haqdayamadhayxdalilx parashivana neleyide:}
\ullekha{aSaTxdaLakamalava sututxva jiVvAtamxna meTiTxda daLavana\char'273\char'236yade; Anu BakatxneMteMbe (savasaM. 1; basava. 479-115); aSaTxdaLakamalada meVlipapx nishUshxnayxna mamaR\-vana\char'273\char'236yade, pArxNaliMgaveMdeMbaru, saMteya sudidxya vaMca\-karu (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 142-43); savaRjiVvaMgaLalilx jiVva hiMseya mADadirabalalxDe parxthama puSapx ...sakalaparxpaMcavaLidu shivajAcnxnasaMpananxrAgirabalalxDe aSaTxma puSapx. iMtiV aSaTxdaLakamala\-dalilx sahajapUjeya mADabalalx sharaNaru nimamx parxtibiMbadaMti\-papxru kANA (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1702-627); aSaTxdaLakamalada AtamxnoLage saqSiTx janisi, kUruma digudaMti diguvaLayava nuMgi, nijashUnayx tAnAda baLika, tananx tAnarida nijapada BinanxyoVgakekx bahude? (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 49-18).}}
\vskip 7pt
\newmeaning{\ni{aSaTxBiH daleYH yukatxM yatf kamalaM tatf - aSaTxdala\-kamalaM}}

\begin{entry}
\word{aSaTxdaLagaLa pariNAma}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{mAnavananunx athavA avana aSaTxtanuvanunx oMdu aSaTxdaLakamalaveMbaMte Uhisi\-koMDare, Aga A
 daLagaLu avana vataRneyanunx heVge nidhaRrisutatxve eMbudanunx
 vacanakAraru hiVge vivarisidAdxre~: iMdarx\-daLa parxbalavAdare avanu
sadugxNiyAgutAtxne; aginxdaLa parxbala\-vAdare avanige 
hasiveyAgutatxde. yamadaLa parxbala\-vAdare avanu
dubuRdidhxyuLaLxvanAgi ceVSiTxtanAguvanu; neYrutayxdaLa
parxbalavAdare koVpiSaTxnAguvanu; varuNadaLa parxbalavAdare
niderxgeYyutAtxne; vAyudaLa parxbalavAdare vAyuvinaMte
saMcarisutAtxne; kubeVradaLa parxbalavAdare
dhamaRbudidhxyuLaLxvanAgutAtxne; IshAnayxdaLa parxbalavAdare
viSayaloVlupanAguvanu; oMdu veVLe manuSayxnu I daLagaLa rahasayxvanunx
tiLidu, madhayxsAthxnakekx baMdare, Aga mumukuSxvAguvanu, hAgU 
sadABxviyAguvanu (va.pa.koV - 48):}
\ullekha{iMdarxdaLa\-veVralu guNiyAgihanu. aginxdaLaveVralu hasivanu. yamadaLa\-veVralu duritaceVSiTxtanAgihanu. neYrutayxdaLaveVralu koVpisu\-titxhanu. varuNadaLaveVralu niderxgeYvanu;  vAyudaLaveVralu saMcalanAgihanu. kubeVradaLa\-veVralu dhamaRbudidhxyAgihanu. IshAnayxdaLaveVralu viSayAturanAgihanu. madhayxsAthxnakekx baMdalilx sadABxviyAgi moVkaSxva biMbisutitxhanu. iMti aSaTxdaLaMgaLalilx tiruguva haMsana neleya keDisi sadABxviyAgirabalalx kUDala\-cenanxsaMgA. nimamx sharaNa (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1029-345).}}
\vskip 5pt

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{gaqha, shayeyx, vasatxrX, ABaraNa, sitxrXV, puSapx, gaMdha matutx tAMbUla eMba eMTu bageya BoVgavasutxgaLu; ananx, udaka, tAMbUla, puSapx, caMdana, vasatxrX, shayeyx, alaMkAra eMdU ivugaLanunx guruvenunxvaru hAgU nidhi, nikeSxVpa, akeSxVpa, AgAmi, saMcita, jala, pASANa, taru eMba eMTu vidha:}

\begin{entry}
\word{aSaTxmada}
\meaning{\artha{kula, bala, dhana, rUpa, ywvana, videyx, parivAra matutx adhikAra eMba eMTu madagaLu:}
\ullekha{enanx aSaTxmadaMgaLa suTuTxruhideyAgi, kaTuTxgarxdiMda nimamx shirxVcaraNava kaMDe (savasaM. 1; basava. 483-116); paMceVMdirxya, SaDuvagaR, sapatxdhAtu, aSaTxmadaveMba baLiLxya siVLi, ELukaTiTxna moVLigeyane hotutx naDede\-nayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1683-621); kula CalaM dhana rUpu ywvanaM videyxyA sulaBarAjayxM tapaM bahiraMga\-daSaTxmadavele (viVsheYpu. 7-100-17). aMtaraMgakekx saMbaMdhisi\-daMtiruva saMsithxta (viVsheYpu. 7-100-17).}
\artha{aMta\-raMgada saMsithxta, taqNiVkaqta, vatiRni, korxVdhini, moVhini, aticAriNi, gaMdhacAriNi hAgU vAsini eMba eMTu bageya madagaLu:}
\ullekha{aSaTxmadaMgaLanotitx meTiTx, neTaTxne niMdu iSaTxliMgavanariya\-balalxDe virakatxneMbenu (savasaM. 5; amuge. 688-213); aSaTxmada\-sUtakada keTaTx guNavaLiduLidu, iSaTxliMgadalilx niSeThx nibebxrasida viVramaheVshavxrana GanamahimeyanAru balalxru heVLA! (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 233-73); saMsithxtaM tatatxqqNiVkaqta vatiRniV korxVdhiniV moVhiniV vilasadaticAriNiV gaMdhacAriNiV vAsiniV lasitAMtaradaSaTxmada (viVsheYpu. 7-100-17).}
\artha{aSaTxtanu mUtiRmada:}
\ullekha{paqthivxmada salilamada pAvakamada pavanamada aMbaramada ravimada shashimada Atamxmada.... iMtiV aSaTxmada\-vaLidu nijavana\char'273\char'236yabalalxre kUDalacenanxsaMgayayxnalilx shivayoVgi\-gaLeMbenu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 329-106).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{aSwTx ca teV madAshacx - aSaTxmadAH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{aMga, liMga, hasatx, jAcnxneVMdirxya, Bakitx, shakitx, apiRta matutx padAthaR eMba eMTu bageya sakiVlagaLu. Aru sathxlagaLalilx sAdhakanu I eMTu viSaya\-gaLanunxLaLx sAdhane mADabeVku. avugaLa vivara hiVgide:\break (1) sAdhaka BakatxsathxladalilxruvAga BakatxneV aMga, avanu aciRsuvudu AcAraliMga, avanu sucitatxveMba hasatxdiMda, AcAraliMgada GArxNeVMdirxya eMba bAyige sadaBxkitx (sharxdAdhxBakitx)yiMda, kirxyAshakitxya guNavAda parimaLadarxvayx\-vanunx apiRsi, sugaMdhaveMba parxsAda paDeyutAtxne (2) sAdhaka \hbox{eraDaneV} sathxladalilxruvAga, avaneV maheVshaneMba aMga, avanu aciRsuvudu guruliMgavanunx, aMdare subudidhxyeMba hasatxdiMda, guruliMgada jihevxyeMba bAyige (muKakekx) niSAThx\-BakitxyiMda, jAcnxnashakitxya guNavAda rasavanunx apiRsi, surasa\-vanunx parxsAdavAgi paDeyutAtxne (3) sAdhaka mUraneya sathxladalilxruvAga, parxsAdiyeMba aMganenisikoLuLxtAtxne hAgU avanu shivaliMgavanunx aciRsutAtxne; avanu nirahaMkAraveMba hasatxdiMda
 shivaliMgada neVtarxveMba bAyige avadhAna\-BakitxyiMda icACxshakitxya guNavAda rUpavanunx apiRsi, surUpa\-vanunx parxsAdavanAnxgi paDeyutAtxne (4) pArxNaliMgiyeMba aMganu jaMgamaliMgavanunx ArAdhisutAtxne. avanu sumanaveMba hasatxdiMda tavxgiMdirxyaveMba {liMgada} bAyige anuBAvaBakitxyiMda Adishakitxya guNavAda soVMkanunx apiRsi susapxshaRveMba parxsAdavanunx paDeyutAtxne (5) sharaNaneMba
aMganige parxsAdaliMgaveV ArAdhayxvasutx. avanu sujAcnxnaveMba
hasatxdiMda liMgada shorxVtarxveMba bAyige AnaMdaBakitxyiMda
parAshakitxya guNavAda shabadxvanunx apiRsi, sushabadxvanunx
parxsAdavAgi paDeyutAtxne (6) aikayxneMba aMganige mahAliMgaveV\break 
ArAdhayxdeYva. avanu BAvaveMba hasatxdiMda mahAliMgada haqdaya\-veMba
bAyige samarasaBakitxyiMda, citfshakitxya guNavAda taqpitxyanunx
apiRsi, pariNAmaveMba parxsAda\-vanunx paDeyutAtxne:}
\ullekha{aSATxvara\-Nava tiLidu, aSaTxvidha sakiVlava BeVdisi noVDi aSATxcAragaLa kaMDu, niSeThx nijadalilx niMdu...paMcAcAramUtiR AcAraliMga\-vAgi nelasipuRdu noVDa (savasaM. 7; alalxma. 773-214); A cidaGxnaliMgavu aSaTxvidha sakiVlaMgaLiMda aKaMDa mahA\-joyxVti\-parxNamavanAsherxYsipuRdu noVDA (savasaM. 10; gurusi. 722-41).}}

\newmeaning{\ni{aSaTxvidhAni ca tAni sakiVlAni ca - aSaTxvidhasakiVlAni}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{AkAshacakarx}
\meaning{\arthanonum{oMbatutx bageya cakarxgaLalilx oMdu; idu nAda, biMdu, kalegaLeMba mUru vaNaRgaLa kUTadiMda EkarUpavAgidudx,
mahAmeVruvina \hbox{meVliruva} divayx\-liMgapiVThasavxrUpadAdxgide. alilxruva hadinAru daLa kamalada
madhayxdalilx niviRkalApxnaMdavanunx koDuva elalx vAyxpAravimuKateyiMda paramashUnayxvAda
UdhavxRshakitxyanunx dhAyxnisabeVku:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
AkAshacakarxM navamaM parxshasatxM tirxkUTakaM pUNaRgireVshacx piVThamf |\\
tatorxVdhavxRshakitxM suKadAM sushUnAyxM dhAyxyeVdfdavxyASATxra saroVjamadheyxV ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(shi.yoV.parx. 3.16)}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\ullekha{AkAshacakarxkekx shorxVtarxdalilxpaR AkAshaveV pUvaR (savasaM. 13; mumamxDi. 1099-557).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{AkAshasayx cakarxM - AkAshacakarxM}}
\vskip -2pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{cakarx}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{AkAshatatatxvX}
\meaning{\artha{karaNahasigeya paMciVkaraNagaLalilxya oMdu paMcaka:}
\ullekha{jAcnxnavu kApaTayxrahitave samAnavAyuM shorxVtarx\-doVviM\-dirxyaM shabadx viSaya vAgiMdirxyaM I paMcakaMgaLAkAsha\-tatatxvX\-kakxlA (viVsheYpu. 7-100-13); shAMtayxtiVtakaleyanunx kUDi mana budidhx citatx ahaMkAra jiVvagaLu shivasAdAKayxvanunx kUDi\-dalilx AkAshatatatxvX bayalAgutatxde (shivAkoV. 18-29).}
\artha{deVha\-tatatxvXdalilx AkAshada paMciVkaqtiyiMda uMTAguva jAcnxna, samAna\-vAyu, shorxVtarx, shabadx matutx vAkukx eMba aidu tatatxvXgaLa samUha:}
\ullekha{shAMtayxtiVta shakitxyaneYyidx, mana budidhx citatx ahaM\-kAra jiVvaMgaLeYdu shivasAdAKayxvanoDagUDidalilx, AkAshatatatxvX bayalAyitutx (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1365-403); Adi\-sidAdhxMta\-viDidu veVda savxyaMBuvalalx. AdimUla shivaniMdAdaviV veVdaMgaLu keVLire. shivaniMdAda mUvatAtxru tatatxvXdoLeYdane\-yadu AkAshatatatxvXvu (savasaM. 9; saMgameV. 296-98); 
aSaTx\-vidhatatatxvXMgaLu aDagipaRvayayx. A tatatxvXMgaLa viBAgayeMteM\-daDe; paqthivxVtatatxvX ipapxtetxYdu, apupxtatatxvX ipapxtutx, aginxtatatxvX hadineYdu, vAyutatatxvX hatutx, AkAshatatatxvX aidu. iMtu epapxtetxYdu tatatxvXMgaLu (savasaM. 10; gurusi. 722-410).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{AkAshaH iti tatatxvXM - AkAshatatatxvXM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{AkAshatatatxvXpaMcaka}
\meaning{\arthanonum{AkAshatatatxvXkekx saMbaMdhisida aidu
tatatxvXgaLu; avu mUvatAtxru tatatxvXgaLalilx aMtagaRtavAgive. AkAshatatatxvXdalilx
paqthivx, jala, teVjasusx, vAyu tatatxvXgaLa samAgamadiMda uMTAda tatatxvXgaLu; AkAshatatatxvXpaMcakagaLu eraDu bage:} \artha{AkAshadalilx paqthivx, jala, teVjasf, vAyutatatxvXgaLa samAgama\-diMda uMTAguva jAcnxna,
manasusx, budidhx, citatx, ahaMkAra eMba paMcatatatxvXgaLu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
voyxVminx voyxVmAMshatoV jAcnxnaM voyxVminx\\[1pt]
\qquad vAyavxMshatoV manaH |\\[2pt]
voyxVminx teVjoVM{\char'263}shatoV budidhxvoyxRVminx\\[1pt]
\qquad citatxM jalAMshataH ||\\[2pt]
voyxVminx kaSxmAMshAdahaMkAra itAyxkAshapaMcakamf |
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi.ta.ra., BA-1, 1.7. 48-49)}
\vskip 2pt
\newmeaning{\ullekha{rAga devxVSa Baya lajejx moVha A aidu AkAshapaMcaka (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 734-202).}
\artha{paqthivx, jala, teVjasf, vAyutatatxvXgaLalilx AkAshatatatxvXda samAgamadiMda uMTAda
jAcnxtaqtavx, samAnavAyu, shorxVtarx, shabadx matutx vAkf eMba paMcatatatxvXgaLu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
jAcnxtaqtavxmaMtarikaSxM ca samAnoV vAyureVva ca |\\[2pt]
shorxVtarxmaginxdhavxRnivARrivAgUBxH KeV tatatxvXpaMcakamf ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi.yoV.parx., 4.20)}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{AkAshatatatxvXsayx paMcakaM - AkAshatatatxvXpaMcakaM}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{paMciVkaraNa}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{AkAshatarxya}
\meaning{\arthanonum{GaTAkAsha, maThAkAsha matutx mahAkAsha eMba mUru parxkAragaLu. sAmAnayxvAgi I mUru
 pada\-gaLanunx aMga - liMgagaLa saMbaMdhavanunx vivarisuvAga
 baLasalAgutatxde. AkAshakekx savxMta yAvudeV AkAravilalxdidadxrU,
 adu GaTadalilxdAdxga GaTada AkAravanenxV paDeyutatxde. Adare
 GaTa\-doLagiruvAga AkAshavu mahAkAshada BAgavAdudariMda adu siVmita;
 hAgU adara siVme kaqtaka. mahAkAshakekx siVmeyilalx. oMdu veVLe adu
 maThadalilxruva AkAshadaSuTx doDaDxdAdarU adu siVmitaveV. Adare
 siVmeyilalxda mahAkAshakekx yAvudeV AkAravilalx. adeV riVti
 manuSayxnalilxruva ceYtanayxvu alapx athavA ANavadaMte toVridarU,
 adara miti keVvala kAlapxnika. GaTa matutx maTha eraDU oDedare
 avu\-gaLalilxruva AkAshavu heVge mahAkAshadalilx oMdAgutatxveyoV
 hAgeyeV ajAcnxna, deVha, iMdirxya muMtAda upAdhi\-gaLiMda horabaMda
 AtamxvU anaMta \hbox{paramAtamxnalilx} oMdAgutatxde:}
\ullekha{diTadAkAsha GaTadAkAsha maThadAkAsha\-tarxyaMgaLalilx hoVgalikasAdhayx horavaDalikasAdhayx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 660-197).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{AkAshAnAMtarxyaM - AkAshatarxyaM}}
\end{entry}
%%diTadAkAsha, GaTadAkAsha,... shUnayxtaraM vididhx cidAkAshaM varAnaneV eMbudAgi AkAshatarxya (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 660-197);


\begin{entry}
\word{AkAshadaMsha}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{paMcaBUtagaLalolxMdAda AkAsha\-diMdA\-guva DaMbu (moVsa), parxkaTa, parxpaMcu (saMsAra), aBarxcACxya (neraLu), AnaMda (ihavanunx savxgaRveMdu BAvisu\-vudu) - aidu viSayagaLu:} \ullekha{DaMbu parxkaTa parxpaMcu aBarxcACxya AnaMda iveYdu AkAshada aMsha (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1351-471); AkAshadaMshadalilx Atamxnu baMdira\-likAkxgi iMtiV aidu BeVdadalilx dashavAyuva kalipxsikoMDu, hesara rUhiTuTx asunAthana oDagUDabeVkeMbalilx idu saMdi\-lalxda saMshaya (savasaM. 6; avasa. 718-215); vAyuvinaMsha\-vanaLidu cidAvxyuveV aMgavAgi sadAcAra nelesidudeV jaMgama\-liMgasaMbaMdha. AkAshadaMshavanaLidu cidAkAshaveV aMgavAgi liMgAcAra nelesidudeV parxsAdaliMgasaMbaMdha (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 375-114).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{AkAshasayx aMshaH - AkAshAMshaH}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{AkAshatatatxvXpaMcaka}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{AkAshaliMga}
\meaning{\arthanonum{paMcaBUtasavxrUpagaLalilxruva Ishavxrana aidu liMgarUpagaLalilx oMdu; bayaleV rUpavAguLaLx \hbox{shivaliMga}; cidaMbara keSxVtarxdalilxna shivaliMga:}
\ullekha{AkAshaliMga tirxvidha; piMDAkAsha, biMdAvx\-kAsha, mahadAkAsha (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 839-246); AkAsha\-liMga tirxvidhavanoLakoMDu enanx iMdirxyaMgaLalilx saMgavAda\-nayayx parxBudeVvaru (savasaM. 11; gumamxsi. 771-387); kAMciVpuradalilx pAthiRvaliMga ....cidaMbaradalilx AkAshaliMga - hiVge \hbox{vishavxdalilx} kANuva paMcaBUtagaLa rUpadalilxyU para\-mAtamxnu sAdAKayxgaLenisi virAjisutitxruvudanunx nAvu sapxSaTxvAgi kANutetxVve ....AkAshaliMgaveMdare bayaleV liMgavAgiyU hiMde tiLisida keSxVtarxgaLalilx IgalU kANutitxve (shakitxvi. 26).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{AkAshashacx tatf liMgaM ca - AkAshaliMgaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{Akaqti}
\meaning{\arthanonum{AdhAra, sAvxdhiSAThxna muMtAda cakarxgaLiganuguNavAgiruva tAraka, daMDaka muMtAda AkAragaLu:}
\ullekha{shivashakitxsaMpuTavihiVna liMga, hAnivaqdidhxyilalxdude jaMgama. jAgarxdalilx kuruhu, savxpanxdalilx Akaqti. nere arita arivu, hiridu kiridenanxda sajajxna shudadhxshivAcAra kUDala\-cenanxsaMgA liMgeYkayxvu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 746-223); Akaqti nirAkaqtigaLeMba AkaqtiyaLidu, vAyxkuLa nirAkuLaMgaLaDagi, nirAkarisuvudu sivxVkarisuvudilalxde carAcaranalalxde aKilAtiVta\-nAgi niMda niluvu, swrASaTxrX soVmeVshavxrA, nimamx sharaNa (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 816-247); tAraka, daMDaka, kuMDala ...niraM\-jana ivu AkaqtigaLu. ivu AyA cakarxgaLige saMbaMdhisidavugaLu (shivAkoV. 141-335).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{AkaqtiH - A+kaq+ti}.}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{Agama}
\src{saM}
\meaning{\artha{BavabaMdhanakekx oLagAgiruva
jiVviyu dhamARdhamaRgaLa viveVkadiMda bALi sadagxtiyanunx paDeyalu beVkAguva paramAtamxna
upAsaneyanunx vivarisuva shAsatxrX:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}

na hi deVvAH parxsiVdaMti kalw cAnayxvidhAnataH ||
\end{shl}
\pauthor{(taMtarxsAra)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{tatatxvX matutx maMtArxthaRgaLanunx tiLisuvudariMda `taMtarx' eMba matotxMdu hesarU idakikxde:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
tanoVti vipulAnathARnf taMtarxmaMtarxsamanivxtAnf |\\[1pt]
tArxNaM ca kuruteV yasAmxtf taMtarxmitayxBidhiVyateV ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(kAmikAgama)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{paramAtamxna upAsaneya vidhAna matutx sAdhanAmAgaRgaLu avaravara AcAra matutx upAsayxdeVvatABeVdagaLiMda BinanxvAgi sheYva, shAkatx, veYSaNxva, jeYna modalAda AgamaBeVda\-gaLive; sheYvAgamadalilx parashivaneV upAsayxdeVvate. idaralilx sheYva, soVma, lAkula matutx pAshupatagaLeMba nAlukx saMparxdAyagaLive:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
AgamAH bahudhA porxVkAtxH shiveVna paramAtamxnA |\\[1pt]
sheYvaM pAshupataM soVmaM lAkulaM ceVti BeVdataH ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 5. 9)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{parameVshavxrana sadoyxVjAta, vAmadeVva, aGoVra, \hbox{tatupxruSa}, IshAna eMba paMcamuKagaLiMda upadiSaTxvAda sheYvAgamagaLu:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
AgataM paMcavakAtxrXtutx gataM ca girijAmuKeV |\\[1pt]
mataM ca vAsudeVveVna tasAmxdAgamamucayxteV ||\\[1pt]
AgatAH shivavaketxrXVBoyxV gatAshacx girijAmuKamf |\\[1pt]
matAshacx vAsudeVveVna yatatxdAgama nA mataH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi.ta.ra., BA-1, 1.1.77)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{sheYvAgamagaLige sidAdhxMtAgamagaLeMba hesaridudx, ivugaLa saMKeyx kAmikAdi vAtulAMta ipapxtetxMTu.
ivugaLalilx hatutx AgamagaLu sadAshivaniMda dashashivarige upadiSaTxvAdudariMda sheYvAgamaveMdU, hadineMTu AgamagaLu aSATxdasharudarxrige upadiSaTxvAdudariMda rwdArxgamaveMdU parxsidadhxvAgive. Agama\-gaLalilx kirxyA, cayAR, jAcnxna matutx yoVga eMba nAlukx pAdagaLive:}}

SaTasxthXladavara dhikakxrisuva janara siVLuveneMbuva varxtave eMTa\-neya AcAra. keTaTx janara sahavAsava mADadihude oMbatatxneya AcAra. sajajxnasaMgatiya biDadihude hatatxneya AcAra. anayxdeVvatA\-Bajanege vimuKanAguvude hanonxMdaneya AcAra. shivaneV savaRdeVva shiKAmaNiyeMdu manadalilx acocxtitxpupxde hanenxraDa\-neya AcAra. shivanige shivagaNaMgaLige BeVdava mADadihude hadi\-mUraneya AcAra. sakala jiVvigaLige hitava bayasuvude hadi\-nAlakxneya AcAra. savaRrige hitava mADuvude hadineYdaneya AcAra. kaDiDxya liMgakekx toVridaMtadhAvaneya mADuvude hadi\-nAraneya AcAra. savARvayavava savxcaCx parxkASxLisuvude hadi\-neVLaneya AcAra. liMgamuderx {ilalxda} guDiyalilx pAkava mADa\-dihude hadineMTaneya AcAra. parxNavamuderx ilalaxda vasatxrXva hodeyadihude hatotxMbatatxneya AcAra. huTiTxda shishuvige liMgadhAraNava mADade, tAya molehAlu jeVnutupapx muTiTxsa\-dihude ipapxtatxneya AcAra. ADida BASeya kaDe pUreYsuvude ipapxtotxMdaneya AcAra. satayxva nuDidu tapapxdihude ipapxtetxraDa\-neya AcAra. turugaLa kaTiTx rakiSxsuvude ipapxtutxmU\char'273neya AcAra. turugaLige liMgamuderxyikikx hAlu karevudu ipapxtutx\-nAlakxneya AcAra. maMtarxsahita goVmayava hiDidu maMtarx\-sahita puTavikikx Basamxda rAshiya mADuvude ipapxtetxYdaneya AcAra.\break A Basamxda rAshiya pAdoVdakadoDane uMDiya kaTuTxvude \hbox{ipapx\-tAtxraneya} AcAra. vidhiyaritu sAthxnavaritu rudArxkiSxgaLa dharisu\-vude ipapxtetxVLaneya {AcAra.} shivAnuBavava shAsatxrXva vicAri\-suvude ipapxtetxMTaneya AcAra. manava noVyisi mAtanADa\-dihude ipapxtotxMbatatxneya AcAra. liMgada kaleyaritu liMgava pUjisuvude mUvatatxneya AcAra. gurumuKadiMda tAnAru tananx nijaveVneMdu besagoLuLxvudeV mUvatotxMdaneya AcAra. SaDavxgaRMgaLa meTiTx SaTasxthXlavaniMbugoMDudeV mUvatetxraDaneya AcAra. aviciCxnanxvAgi aMgatarxyadalilx mana OkarisikoMDude mUvatutxmUraneya AcAra. liMgadalilx shileya BAvavanarasa\-dihude mUvatutxnAlakxneya AcAra. jaMgamadalilx kulava\-narasa\-dihude mUvatetxYdaneya AcAra. viBUtiya mANabxdihude mUvatAtxraneya AcAra. rudArxkiSxya shudadhxva mADi maNigaLa dharisuvude mUvatetxVLaneya AcAra. pAdoVdakadalilx uciCxSaTx\-vaLidude mUvatetxMTaneya AcAra. parxsAdadalilx ruciya noVDadihude mUvatotxMbatatxneya AcAra. maMtarxdalilx kutisxta kalapxneya mADadihude nAlavxtatxneya AcAra. liMgAcaRna\-virahita BoVjana mADadihude nAlavxtotxMdaneya AcAra. aikayxra samAdhi\-goLisi tAnu liMgapUjeya mADuvude nAlavxtetxra\-Daneya AcAra. liMgadorxVhava keVLi tAnu pArxNa biDuvude nAlavxtutx mUraneya AcAra. jaMgamadorxVhava keVLi tAnu aikayxnAgu\-vude nAlavxtutxnAlakxneya AcAra. liMgadorxVhava mADidavana pArxNava BeVdisuvude nAlavxtetxYdaneya AcAra. jaMgama\-dorxVhava mADidavana shiravaniVDADuvude nAlavxtAtxraneya AcAra. aSATx\-varaNa saMgava mADuva BeVdava tiLivude nAlavxtetxVLaneya AcAra. tAnAru liMgavAru eMba BeVdavu tilamAtarx ilalxdiruvude nAlavxtetxMTaneya AcAra. tananx nijavicArava tA {mareyade} SaTasxthXladavarige aruhi tananxMte mADuvude nAlavxtotxMbatatxneya AcAra. iMtiSuTx AcAraMgaLa kaDemuTiTxsuvude kUDalacenanx\-saMgamadeVvaralilx aivatatxneya AcAra noVDA sidadhxrAmayayx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 971-311).}
\arthanonum{3. bAhayxkirxyegaLanunx shudadhxgoLisuva liMgAcAra, sadAcAra, shivAcAra, gaNAcAra matutx BaqtAyxcAra eMba aidu bageya dhAmiRka niyamagaLu; guruviniMda dhAraNa mADida iSaTxliMgavananxlalxde anayxdeVvatA\-caRne mADadiruvudu, satayxshudadhxkAyakavanunx mADutatx, sakala\-pArxNigaLalilx pAtArxpAtarxvananxritu hitavanunxMTumADuvudu, shivalAMCanadhArigaLanunx parashivaneMdu BAvisi tananxnunx apiRsi\-koLuLxvudu, aSATxvaraNagaLanunx kuritu anayxru niMde mADidalilx A sathxLavanunx biDuvudu hAgU shivasharaNaru hiriyaru tAnu kiriya eMba BAvaneyiMda avaranunx seVvisuvudu - eMba aidu parxkArada AcAragaLu.}}

%\ullekha{diVkeSx paDeda Bakatxnu nitayxkamaRgaLanunx mADutatx guruliMga jaMgamArAdhaneyanunx mADuvudu, shivasharaNagaNagaLalilx SaDivxdhaBakitxyiMda kUDidadx avara vacanAnuBavagaLanunx hoMdi adaraMte Acarisuvudu, ariSaDavxgaRgaLanunx dUramADi sadAcAradiMdiruvudu, koTaTx BASeyanunx koneyavaregU naDesikoDuvudu, liMgANatiyiMda baMdudanunx sivxVkarisutatx parxsAdadalilx suKisuvudu, parxNava modalAda mahAmaMtarxgaLalilx BakitxyiMda kUDiruvudu matutx SaTasxthXlamAgaRdalilx naDedu niravayavanunx sAdhisuvudu-eMba ELu parxkArada AcAragaLu.}
\newmeaning{\ullekha{iMtu AcArada kuruha tiLidu paMcAcArava bahiSakxrisi sapAtx\-cArava goVpayxva mADi daridarxnige nidhi nidhAna doretaMte..... tamamx cidaMgasavxrUparAda sharaNagaNaMgaLalilx usuri dujaRnAtamx\-ralilx baLasade niMda paramasuKi nimamx sharaNanu (savasaM 3; cenanxba. 945-304).}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{4. aMtaraMgakirxyegaLanunx shudadhxgoLisuva kirxyAcAra, jAcnxnAcAra, BAvAcAra, satAyxcAra, nitAyxcAra,~dhamARcAra matutx savARcAra saMpatitx\-nAcAra eMba ELu bageya neVmagaLu:} \ullekha{diVkeSx paDeda Bakatxnu nitayxkamaRgaLanunx~mADutatx guruliMgajaMgamArA\-dhaneyanunx mADuvudu, shivasharaNagaNa\-gaLalilx SaDivxdhaBakitxyiMda kUDidadx avara vacanAnuBavagaLanunx hoMdi adaraMte Acari\-suvudu, ariSaDavxgaRgaLanunx dUramADi sadAcAradiMdiru\-vudu, koTaTx BASeyanunx koneyavaregU naDesikoDuvudu, liMgA\-NatiyiMda baMdudanunx sivxVkarisutatx parxsAdadalilx suKisuvudu, parxNava modalAda mahAmaMtarxgaLalilx BakitxyiMda kUDiru\-vudu matutx SaTasxthXlamAgaRdalilx naDedu niravayavanunx sAdhisu\-vudu-eMba ELu parxkArada AcAragaLu:}}
%\newmeaning{\ullekha{veVdAgamaMgaLu heVLida... apahAsayxkekx bArade AcAramAgaRdalilxrabalalxDe.. (savasaM. 1; basava. 1356-374); rUpa[ne] kaMDaru... AcAravane kaMDaru, vicAravane kANaru.. (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 495-136); AcAra gurusathxla, anuBAva liMgasathxla.. (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 723-218); mUlAdhArada... AcArada beVra hiDidu aikayxda tudiyaneVride.. (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 344-102); samashiVla neVma... AcArakakxhaRnAda rAmeVshavxraliMgave niVne balalx.. (savasaM. 5; akakxmamx. 574-180).}}

\begin{entry}
\word{AdhAra}
\meaning{\arthanonum{jagatitxna AdhAravAda parashiva.} \artha{yoVgashAsatxrXdalilx parxsidadhxvAgiruva Aru bageya cakarxgaLalilx oMdu; gudasAthxnadalilx nAlekxsaLina kamalada AkAradalilxruvudeMdu BAvisalAda oMdu cakarx; ililxruva nAlukx daLagaLalilx va, sha, Sa matutx sa eMba nAlukx akaSxragaLive; idara adhideYva barxhamx; elalx SaTacxkarxgaLalUlx shakitxgaLige kAraNavAgiruva parxNavAkaSxragaLidudx, AdhAra\-cakarxdalilx `na'kAravu nelaside; miduLinalAlxguva kaMpanagaLu I parxNavAkaSxragaLa mUlaka shariVrada sAnxyugaLalilx saMcarisutatxve; liMganiSaThxru I bageya shakitxgaLanunx SaTasxthXlAcaraNe, aSATxvaraNa muMtAduvugaLa sAdhane\-yiMda liMgamuKavanAnxgi mADutAtxre; I karxmadiMdAgi AdhAracakarxdalilx AcAraliMgavu parxkaTa\-goLuLxtatxde:}
\ullekha{AdhAradalilx barxhamx sAvxyatavAda, sAvxdhiSAThxnadalilx viSuNx sAvxyatavAda, maNipuradalilx rudarxsAvxyatatxvAda (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 201-64); Ajecnxyalilx OMkAra iMtiV mayARdeyalilx SaDAdhxtuvinalilx SaDakaSxrarUpiMda SaDilxMga sAthxpayxvAgihavu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1055-352);
AdhAra sAvxdhiSAThxna maNipUraka vishudidhx AjecnxVyava nuDidaDeVnu? Adi anAdiya sudidxya keVLi\-daDeVnu? (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 60-24); AdhAra \hbox{moda\-lAgi} A\char'273\char'304 cakarxva meTiTx hAdi toV\char'273\char'236sidAtane guruvu (kUDasavx. 17-1).} 
\artha{{\large AdhArAdheVyavaDaguvudu:} AdheVya\-veMdare {parxpaMca} matutx cidavxsutxgaLAda AtamxgaLu, AdhAra\-veMdare saqSiTxkataRnAda parashiva. AdheVyavu AdhAravananxvalaMbisutatxde. {jiVvanu} tananx ajAcnxnadiMdAgi (mareviniMdAgi) tAnu {AdhAra} (parashiva)diMda beVreyeMdu tiLidukoMDirutAtxne. Adare AdhAyxtimxka shikaSxNadiMdAgi aikayxsathxla talupidAga tAnu-idiru (\hbox{AdheVya}-AdhAra)gaLa vayxtAyxsa ilalxvAgutatxde. ililx AdhAra matutx AdheVyagaLu aDaguvudilalx, averaDara vayxtAyxsagaLaSeTxV aDagi, eraDU oMdAdaMte anuBavavAguvudu:} \ullekha{samaya samayoVcita BAvaBAvanaSaTx\-vAgi kAlakamaRvilalxde hoVyitutx; tatatxvXjAcnxna parxkAshikeyaDa\-gitutx; AdhArAdheVyavaDagitatxyAyx nirAdhAra samayavAyitatxyayx basavA, basavA, basavA eMba anuBAva bayalAyitatxyayx (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 1074-309).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{AdhirxyaMteV asimxnf kirxyAH iti - AdhAraH}}
\end{entry}

\pauthor{(si.shi., 1.1)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{suKa; idu para matutx apara eMdu eraDu vidha. parAnaMdaveV parasuKa, aparAnaMdaveV

elalx jiVvigaLige moVkASxnaMdavanunxMTumADuvudu parasuKa eniside:}}

\pauthor{(viV.dha.shi., pu. 256)}
\newmeaning{\artha{AnaMda eMba hesarina Bakitx; SaTfsathxlagaLige saMbaMdhisida Aru vidha BakitxgaLalilx oMdu; AnaMdaBakitxyu sharaNa\-sathxlakekx saMbaMdhiside. pArxNaliMgisathxladalilxruva anuBavaBakitxyeV AnaMda\-yoVgadiMda AnaMdaBakitx eniside:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
parxsAdaliMgasaMyukatxmaMgaM hi sharaNasathxlamf |\\[1pt]
