tatarx sAvxnuBavAkArA BakitxrAnaMdayoVgataH |\\[1pt]
poVkAtx{\char'263\char'263}naMdAtimxkA Bakitxriti veVdAMtaveVdiBiH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(a.sU., 5. 78-80)}
\newmeaning{\ullekha{anuBavavilalxda AnaMdavu taledoVradu, AnaMdavilalxde shivaliMga\-dalilx samarasavAgadu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1289-459); sharxdedhx niSeThx avadhAna anuBava AnaMda samarasa (ivu Aru SaDivxdhaBakitx\-gaLu) (shivasU. 2 aDiTi).}
%\newmeaning{\artha{AnaMdavu suKakikxMta eraDu riVtiyalilx Binanx. suKavu iMdirxyavoMdu tananx viSayadoDane saMpakaR paDedAga manasisxnalAlxguva pariNAma. I kAraNakAkxgi adanunx `iMdirxya suKa' eMdu kareyutAtxre. Adare AnaMda iMdirxya janayx athavA iMdirxya viSaya janayxvalalx. eraDaneyadAgi iMdirxya suKa kaSxNika. Adare AnaMda nitayx.}}
%\newmeaning{\artha{AnaMdavu liMgAMga sAmarasayxda pariNAma. idu eraDu haMtagaLalilx pariNamisutatxde. sAdhakanu dhAyxna pArxraMBisi, iMdirxya matutx aMtaHkaraNagaLa vAyxpAravanunx tAtAkxlikavAgi taDehiDidAga, Atamxvu tAnoMdeV irutatxde. keVvala oMdeV iruva Atamxda I sithxtige keYvalAyxnaMda eMdu hesaru. deVhada BAravAgali mAnasika duHKa dumAmxnagaLAgali ilalxda Atamxkekx tAnoMdeV iruvudu AnaMdadAyaka sithxti.}}
%\newmeaning{\artha{liMgAMga sAmarasayx mugidAga Atamxnige tAnu parama dheyxVyavanunx sAdhisida taqpitx uMTAgutatxde. ariSaDavxgaR muMtAda citatxvaqtitxgaLilalxdavanigaSeTxV anuBAva (liMgAMga sAmarasayx) sAdhayx. citatxvaqtitxgaLilalxda manasusx AsegaLiMda mukatx, pUvaRkamaRgaLiMdalU mukatx. hiVge atayxMta hecicxna dheyxVyavanunx sAdhisida, Ase matutx vAsanegaLilalxda manasisxnalilx neleyUruva shAMti, taqpitx, samAdhAnagaLeV AnaMdada matotxMdu hesaru.}}
%\newmeaning{\artha{vacanakAraru AnaMdavu aMganige hosateVnalalx enunxtAtxre. liMgada BAgavAgidAdxga, shiva sAnidhayxdiMdAgi avanu sadA AnaMdiyeV Agidadx. saMsAra baMdhanadalilx avideyxyiMdAgiyU aMgasaMgadiMdAgiyU adanunx maretidadxnaSeTxV. malatarxyagaLanunx koDavikoMDu muninxna liMgAMga sAmarasayxvanunx paDedAga, adara jotegina AnaMdavU avanige laBayxvAgutatxde.}}
%\newmeaning{\artha{paramAtamxna aidu bageya savxrUpagaLalilx oMdu:}}
%\newmeaning{\artha{SaDivxda BakitxgaLalilx oMdu; pArxNaliMgasathxladalilxruva shivAnuBavada jotegUDi uMTAda Bakitx:}}
\artha{paramAtamxna aidu bageya savxrUpagaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{ivu aidu lakaSxNagaLu: avu 1.~satf, 2.~citf, 3.~AnaMda, 4.~nitayx, 5.~\hbox{paripUNaR} I parxkAra iru\-tatxve. ivu paramAtamxna savxrUpavanunx heVLutatxve... \hbox{para\-mAtamxnu} AnaMdasavxrUpanu. ililx AnaMdaveMdare jAcnxna athavA arivu eMdu tiLiyabeVku. idakekx cuyxtiyu athavA korateyu ilalx (shivAkoV. 20-32).}
\artha{rUpa, ruci matutx AnaMda -eMba mUru bageya darxvayx\-gaLalilx oMdu; idakekx taqpitx eMba matotxMdu hesaridudx, shiva-jiVvara aikayxdiMduMTAguva idanunx kAraNashariVradalilxruva BAvaliMgakekx apiRsabeVku:}
\ullekha{A~BAvaliMgada pUjeyalilx rAjisutalipaR AnaMda vilasadadx\-paRNa suparxsananx sanAmxnaparxsAdamaM sivxVkaripudeV ...BAvaliMga\-parxsAda (viVsheYpu. 7-110-75).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{AnaMdaH A+naMdf+Gatf(a)}}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{dAsoVhada mUlaka apiRtaparxsAdaseVvane\-yiMda uMTAguva ananayxvAda AnaMda. liMgada arivu uMTAdAga jAcnxnacakuSx teredu uMTAguva aduBxta AnaMda.} \artha{taqpitx; taNivu:} \ullekha{goVpayxvAgidadxnuBava heVLoV\-denanx kaDige ApAyxyana mADikoMbuvudu ninanx kaDige (kuDasavx. 3-56 palalxvi).} \artha{sapatxvidha parxsAdagaLalilx oMdu:} \ullekha{ApAyxyana samaya paMceVMdirxyavirahita karaNacatuSaTxyavirahita sadABxva samate jAcnxnaparxsAda modalAdavu sapatxvidhaparxsAdavenisuvudayAyx (samava. 4; sidadhxrA. 579-160).}}

\begin{entry}

\vskip 4pt

\begin{entry}

\word{iDA}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{benunxhuriyalilxruva oMdu nADi. idu iMdirxyagoVcaravalalx. idu shariVrada eDaBAgavanunx parxtinidhisutatxde. iDAnADiyu jAcnxneVMdirxyagaLanUnx, manasusx, budidhx, citatx matutx ahaMkAragaLanUnx niyaMtirxsutatxde. idanenxV `budidhx' athavA `manasusx' eMdare tapApxgalAradu. manuSayx aMtamuRKiyAgalu iDA muKayx kAraNa. kelavu veVLe idanunx caMdarxnADiyeMdU kareyuvuduMTu. mUgina eDa hoLeLxya mUlaka usirADuvudariMda iDA hecucx kAyaRparxvaqtatxvAgutatxde:}
\ullekha{caMdarx\-shileyalilx pAvaka huTiTx, iDApiMgaLa madhayxdalilx anila tuMbi, aridaridu! nimamx neneva parikara hosatu (savasaM. 1; basava. 1185-325); Adi anAdigaLilalxdaMdina kUgu; nAda biMdu\-gaLilalxdaMdina kUga kaMDu kUgide! iDA piMgaLa suSumanxnALa\-madhayxda kUga kaMDu kUgide. guheVshavxraneMba talevolana dAMTi alalxma kUgida kUgu (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 877-258); doDaDxveraDu kaMbada madhayxdalilx cikakxveraDu kaMba. iMtiV nAlakxra madhayxda manege asithxgaLu, narada kaTuTx, majejxya sAra, mAMsada goVDe, camaRda hodike, shorxVNitada sArada, kuMBadiMdipupx\-doMdu citarxda mane noVDayAyx. A manegoMbatutx bAgilu, iDA piMgaLaveMba gALiya bAdaLa, maqdu kaThiNaveMbaveraDu aguLiya BeVda noVDA, itatxleya meVlipapx suSumAnxnALava mucicx, divArAtirxyeMba aruhu marahina uBayava kada kitutx noVDayAyx (savasaM. 6; okakxli. 1737-658).}}
%\vskip 2pt
%\newmeaning{\ni{iliti iDi ilA-lAkakxsa Datavx-iDA}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

I pUjAkarxmavu sUkASxmXgamadalilx hiVgide - pUjeya AraMBadalilx shivadhAyxnavanunx mADi, paMcAkaSxramaMtarxvanunx japisi, karaDigeyalilxruva iSaTxliMgavanunx muTiTx, mUru sala paMcAkaSxramaMtarxvanunxcacxrisi, manasisxnalilxyeV shivananunx dhAyxnisi, puSapxvanunx dharisabeVku. AnaMtara karaDigeyalilxruva iSaTxliMgavanunx karasathxlakekx tegedukoLaLxbeVku. pUjAkAladalilx iSaTxliMgavanenxV pArxNaliMgaveMdu BAvisi aSaTxvidhAcaRne mADabeVku. pUjA samayadalilx \hbox{iSaTxliMgada} goVmuKavanunx eDakekx iTuTx, kiru beraLu, uMgura beraLugaLa tudiyiMda iSaTxliMgavanunx matutx hebebxraLina tudiyiMda goVmuKavanunx muTaTxbeVku. iSaTxliMgakekx modalu aBiSeVka mADi, baLika Basamx-gaMdhagaLanunx leVpisi, akaSxteyanunx apiRsi, hUgaLiMda alaMkarisabeVku. aBiSeVka, patarxpuSapx, neYveVdayx, parxdakiSxNe, vaMdane - I aidu upacAragaLiMdalAdarU iSaTxliMgavanunx pUjisabeVku. anaMtara neYveVdayxvanunx niveVdisi, tAMbUlavananxpiRsabeVku. idu iSaTxliMgapUjeya karxma. iSaTxliMgapUjeyanunx parxtidinavU oMdu, eraDu athavA mUru sala tapapxde AcarisabeVku. iSaTxliMga, pArxNaliMga, BAvaliMgagaLalilx yAvudeV tAratamayx mADade, samAnaBAvadiMda pUjisabeVku. manasisxnalilx iSaTxliMgada dhAyxna mADuvudu pArxNaliMgAcaRne enisidare, liMgadalilx manasasxnunx talilxVnagoLisuvudeV BAvaliMgapUje enisutatxve.}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
pUjAdw tu shivaM dhAyxtAvx japAtxvX paMcAkaSxraM manumf |\\[2pt]

niveVdayitAvx neYveVdayxM parxdakiSxNanamasikxrXyeV |\\[2pt]
EBiH paMcoVpacAreYvAR pUjayeVlilxMgamanavxhamf ||\\[2pt]

\end{shl}

\newmeaning{\ullekha{iSaTx\-liMgakekx aMgadalilxya macacxna, lalATadalilxye gaMdhAkaSxte (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 942-283); kirxV AcaraNe shudadhxvAdalilx iSaTxliMga\-pUje. rUpu ruci EkavAdalilx pArxNaliMgapUje (savasaM. 8; moVLige. 1710-562); tanuva samapiRsi beVDikoMDu horagaNa honunx heNuNx maNuNx SaTakxmaRMgaLa biTuTxdeV iSaTxliMga\-pUje (savasaM. 11; GanaliM. 725-337).}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{{\large iSaTxliMga catuviRdha pUje:} iSaTxliMgapUjeyu mahatiV, guviRV, laGivxV, avasarA eMdu nAlukx vidha. \hbox{mahatiVpUjeyanunx} utatxmanu (SaTfkAlagaLalilx pUjemADuvavanu), guviRVpUjeyanunx madhayxmanu (tirxkAla pUje\-mADuvavanu), ashakatxnu pArxtaHkAla \hbox{muMtAda} samaya\-dalilx BoVjana samayadalilx avasarA pUje\-yanunx mADabeVku:}}

tirxkAlamacaRnAM kuyARcaCxkatxH SaTfkAlameVva vA ||\\
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(kA. A., kirx. pA., 4. 5-6; makuTa., kirx. pA., 3. 3-4)}

\begin{entry}

Adare janarige tiLiyuvaMtha BASeyalilx mAtanADabeVkAdare, ihaloVka, paraloVka, shivapura, keYlAsa, savxgaR muMtAda parikalapxnegaLanunxLaLx BASeyalelxV avaru mAtanADabeVkidudxdu aMdina kAlakekx anivAyaRvAgitutx:}
\ullekha{akaTa\-kaTA, shiva ninaginitu karuNavilalx, akaTakaTA shiva ninaginitu kaqpe\-yilalx. 
Eke huTiTxside ihaloVkaduHKiya (savasaM. 1; basava. 64-19); Bakatxna tanuve shivanipApxlayavAgi ihaloVkave para\-loVka; paraloVkave ihaloVka ninanx BakatxMge (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 266-78).}}

\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{hiDida kAyaRvanunx sAdhisuvavanu hAgU tananx kAyaRgaLige aDiDxbaruvavaranunx shikiSxsuva shUra; ihaloVkaviVra, paraloVkaviVra, liMgaviVra eMba tirxvidha maheVshavxraralilx obabx:}

\begin{entry}
  \word{udadhxraNe}
  \src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{BavabaMdhanadiMda mukatxgoLisu; udadhxrisu. jiVvAtamxnu paramAtamxnalilx aikayxgoLaLxbeVkAdare meVlumxKa\-vAgi (UdhavxR)  hoVgabeVku. idu BavabaMdhanadiMda mukatx\-goLuLxva Atamxnu, paramAtamxnAguva parxkirxye. meVlakekx hoVguva kirxye eMdare - manavu Ase AmiSagaLiMda dUravAdAga vAyuvinaMte hagurAgutatxde. adakekx yAva leVpagaLU aMTikoLuLxvudilalx. hagurAda padAthaRvu meVlumxKavAgi sulaBadalilx calisutatxde. Atamxvu hiVge shudadhxvAdAga hagurAgi meVlakekx calisutatxde. aduve AtomxVdAdhxra. iMtha AtomxVdAdhxrada bageyanunx citarx matutx vivaraNegaLiMda pAriBASika tAMtirxka sheYliyalilx vivarisuvudanunx `udadhxraNe' eMdu viVrasheYvadalilx heVLalAgutatxde. oMdariMda eraDUvare aDigaLaSuTx agala, sumAru mUvatutx mUvatetxYdu aDigaLavaregU vividha \hbox{AkArada} paTiTxkegaLalilx vaNaRmayavAgi udadhxraNegaLu racita\-goMDiruvudu kaMDubarutatxde. viVrasheYvada tAtitxvXkate, sidAdhxMta ivugaLanunx hasatxparxtigaLalilx dAKalisuva I vishiSaTxvAda bage apUvaR matutx aduBxta. udadhxraNegaLige mUla shivAgamagaLeV enunxtAtxre. shivAgamagaLalilx I bageya citarx\-sahitavAda tAtivxkavivaraNe idadxMte toVruvudu. udadhxraNegaLalilxyeV I sUcaneyiruvudanunx gamanisabahudu. ``shirxV viVrasheYva sidAdhxMta sAthxpanAcAyaRrapapx AdayxranupamamatadiMda udadhxrisida kuTila, kuhaka yaMtarx taMtarxgaLilalxda shivajAcnxnasAdhanavapapx shivamaMtarxnAyxsa shivatatatxvX sAthxpisi shivaliMgAMga\-saMbaMdha parxtipAdakAgama garxMthAthaR-vAcayxMgaLiM kelavu vacana\-gaLiV saMgarxhisida udadhxraNe paTalavidu, shivaliMgAMkita shAsana\-vidu. shivasharaNaravadharipudu'' eMba heVLikegaLu udadhxraNe\-gaLalilx sigutatxve:}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{udadhxraNe}}
\ullekha{I paMcapaMcAkaSxraMgaLudadhxraNeyoLu harxsavx diVGaR matAtx visagaR biMdugaLeraDa noVDarumenutatx bageyalu beVDa (viVsheYpu. 1-5-13).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\pauthor{(si.shi., 5. 44-45)}
\newmeaning{\artha{mUru vidha: kiMcitfsatatxvXrajoVpAdhi, atayxMta tAmasoV\-pAdhi matutx paratatatxvXmayoVpAdhi eMdu upAdhiyu mUru vidha. kiMcitfsatatxvXrajoVpAdhiBoVkAtx (jiVva), atayxMtatAmasoVpAdhiBoVjayx (jagatutx) matutx shudadhxsatatxvXguNada barxhamxceYtanayxnAda Ishavxra paratatatxvXmayoV\-pAdhi:}}

\begin{shl}

atayxMtatAmasoVpAdhiBoRVjayxmitayxBidhiVyateV ||\\[3pt]
paratatatxvXmayoVpAdhibarxRhamxceYtanayxmiVshavxraH ||

\medskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 5. 40)}
\newmeaning{%\arthanonum{Atamxda sAvxBAvika athavA mUlasavxrUpavanunx siVmitagoLisuvaMtahudu. %upAdhiyilalxde beVDabalalxDe, gamanavilalxde suLiyabalalxDe, nigaRmaniyAgirabalalxDe, adu vamaR, adu sambaMdha, avara naDe pAvana, avara nuDi satayx, avara jagadArAdhayxreMbenu kANA guheVshavxrA (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 963-290);
\ullekha{upAdhiviDidu upadeVshava mADuvAta guruvalalx, upAdhi\-viDidu upadeVshava mADisikoMbAta shiSayxnalalx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1620-590); elelxlilx suLidaDe alalxlilx upAdhi \hbox{biDadayAyx}. \begin{entry}

A mUtiRya saMga nisasxMgavAyitu. heVLa\-bArada Ganava ArigU heVLada vasutxva kaMDu hesarilalxde niMde nAnu. parxNavAkaSxrada kuruha kaMDu paravashaLAdenayayx EkAkaSx\-rada saMga nisasxMgavAyitatxyayx saMgayayx (savasaM. 5; {niVlamamx.} 1053-313).}}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{EkAdashaparxsAda}
\src{va}
\meaning{\artha{hanonxMdu bageya \hbox{parxsAdagaLu;}
viVrasheYvana ELigege saMbaMdhisida elalx bageya AcaraNegaLa\-nonxLagoMDa guruparxsAda, liMgaparxsAda, jaMgamaparxsAda, parxsAdiparxsAda, ApAyxyanaparxsAda, samayaparxsAda, paMceVMdirxyavirahitaparxsAda, aMtaHkaraNacatuSaTxyavirahita\-parxsAda, sadABxvaparxsAda, samatAparxsAda matutx jAcnxnaparxsAda eMba hanonxMdu bageya parxsAdagaLu:}
\ullekha{[a]nAdikuLa sanamxtavAda EkA\-dashaparxsAda kuLava tiLivaDe: parxthamadalilx guruparxsAda, divxtiVya\-dalilx liMgaparxsAda, taqtiVyadalilx jaMgamaparxsAda, catuthaRdalilx  parxsAdi\-parxsAda, paMcamadalilx ApAyxyanaparxsAda, SaSaThxmadalilx samaya\-parxsAda, sapatxmadalilx paMceVMdirxyavirahitaparxsAda, aSaTxma\-dalilx aMtaHkaraNacatuSaTxyavirahitaparxsAda, navamadalilx sadABxva\-parxsAda, dashamadalilx samatAparxsAda, EkAdashadalilx jAcnxnaparxsAda iMtiV EkAdashaparxsAdasathxlavanatigaLeda kUDala cenanxsaMgayayx\-nalilx aikayx\-parxsAdige namoV namoV eMdenu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 906-279).} \artha{hanonxMdu bageya apiRtagaLu:} \ullekha{inunx EkAdashaparxsAda; parxthamadalilx mahAdeVvaMge manavapiRta, divxtiVya\-dalilx maheVshavxraMge viVrApiRta, taqtiVyadalilx shaMkaraMge samAdhAnApiRta, catuthaRdalilx niviRSayApiRta, paMcamadalilx paMcavapiRta, SaSaThxmadalilx naSaTxrUpanirUpApiRta, sapatxmadalilx AtAmxpiRta, aSaTxmadalilx tananx mareda marahApiRta, navamadalilx asamasahasarxnALadiMda taqpatxyXpiRta, dashamadalilx citatxsuyidhAni\-yAgi suSumAnxnALadiMda amaqtApiRta, EkAdashadalilx Eka\-parxsAda noVDahoVdare tananx nuMgitatxyAyx (cenanxba. savasaM. 3-1362-482).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{EkAdasha ca teV parxsAdAshacx - EkAdashaparxsAdAH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

hanonxMdu rudarxru. avarugaLeMdare: shiva, maheVshavxra, shaMBu, shirxVkaMTha, Bava, Ishavxra, mahAdeVva, pashupati, niVlakaMTha, vaqSadhavxja matutx parameVsha:}}

mahAdeVvaH pashupatiniRVlakaMThoV vaqSadhavxjaH |\\[1pt]

\medskip
\pauthor{(shi.ta.ra., BA-1, 1. 6. 61-62)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{shabAdxthaRkwsutxBa eMba saMsakxqqta-kananxDa shabadxkoVshadalilx \hbox{EkAdasha} rudarxra hesarugaLu I riVti - ive: ajeYkapAtf, ahibuRdhanxyX, virUpAkaSx, sureVshavxra, jayaMta, bahurUpa, tarxyXMbaka, aparAjita, veYvasavxta, sAvitarx matutx hara:}}

\newmeaning{\artha{mahABArata kaqtigarxMthadalilx aja, EkapAtf, ahibuRdhanxyX, pinAki, aparAjita, tarxyXMbaka, maheVshavxra, vaqSAkapi,
shaMBu, hara matutx Ishavxra - ivaru hanonxMdu jana rudarxru:}}

\newmeaning{\artha{viVraBadarx, shaMBu, giriVsha, aja, EkapAtutx, ahibuRdanxyX,

 EkAdasharudarxru. ivaru shivana mAnasoVdaBxvaru, ivaru {shivana}
 sAkArasavxrUparu:}}

(savasaM. 6; uriliM. 1558-571); veVdava noVDuvaNaNxgaLa vAdisitutx mAye... EkAdasharudarxru.. \begin{entry}
\word{EkAdashavamaR (hanonxMdu rahasayxgaLu)}
\meaning{\arthanonum{hanonxMdu bageya rahasayx, mamaR; ililx vamaR (mamaR) eMba padavu shUnayxsaMpAdaneya rahasayxvanunx sUcisutatxde. I padaviyanunx paDeyalu hanonxMdu riVtiya AcAra\-gaLanunx pAlisabeVkAgutatxde. I AcAragaLu elalxrigU gotitxlalxvAdudariMda, moVkASxthiRyu avugaLa rahasayxvanunx samathaR guruviniMda kaliyabeVkAgutatxde. I hanonxMdu AcAragaLa vivaragaLu hiVgive:}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{liMgAcAra: guru diVkeSxyalilx koTaTx liMgavananxlalxde anayx\-deYvagaLanunx kAyeVna, vAcA, manasA aciRsadiruvudeV liMgAcAra.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{sadAcAra: sAdhakanu liMgAcAravananxlalxde, adakekx pUraka\-vAda neYtika AcAragaLanUnx (sadAcAravanUnx) pAlisabeVku. sAdhakanu Bakatxsathxladalilxdadxre, satayxshudadhxkAyaka mADi, dAsoVha mADabeVku; maheVshasathxladalilxdadxre satayxshudadhx BikeSx mADi, dAsoVha mADabeVku; aMtU dAsoVha sAdhakana kataRvayx. samasatx pArxNigaLa hitAthaRvAgi dAsoVha mADabeVkeV horatu, ADaMbarakakxlalx. alalxde beVreyavara hasivu-taqSe\-gaLanunx gamanisi dAsoVha mADabeVkeV horatu, apAtarx\-rige dAsoVha mADabAradu.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{shivAcAra: neYtika kirxye shivAcAravanUnx oLagoLuLxtatxde. gurumAgaRda AcAradalilxruva shivalAMCanadhArigaLanunx parashivaneMba BAvaneyiMda tanu-mana-dhanavanapiRsuvudu. avara guNAvaguNavananxlalx. vAsatxvavAgi avarelalxrU guru.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{gaNAcAra: shivagaNagaLa (shivaBakatxra) athavA aSATxvaraNagaLa niMdeyu keVLibaMdare, gaNasameVta A sathxLavanunx biTuTx beVre kaDege hoVguvudeV gaNAcAra (kelavaru shivaBakatxranUnx shiva\-dhamaRvanUnx niMdisuvavaranunx kolalxbeVku eMbudeV gaNAcAra enunxtAtxre).}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{BaqtAyxcAra: BaqtayxneMdare seVvaka. nijavAda \hbox{viVrasheYvanu} guru matutx jaMgamarige BaqtayxraMte seVve mADabeVku. jAti, Asharxma, kula, goVtarx muMtAdavugaLanunx lekikxsade guruvi\-niMda iSaTxliMgavanunx paDedu, Bakitx, jAcnxna, veYrAgayxgaLiMda aSATxvaraNa matutx SaTfsathxlagaLanAnxcarisuva shivaBakatxranunx BakitxgwravagaLiMda Adarisi, avaridadxlilxgeV hoVgi tanumanadhanagaLananxpiRsuvudu BaqtAyxcAra.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{kirxyAcAra: diVkASxguru, shikASxguru matutx jAcnxnaguru\-gaLiMda heVge pUje mADabeVku, maMtarxvanunx heVge, yAvAga ucacxrisabeVku muMtAdavugaLanunx kalitu, adaraMte AcarisabeVku; deYhika shuciyanunx Acarisi, sAkAra matutx nirAkAra acaRne mADuvu\-danunx kalitu, adaraMte AcarisabeVku.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{jAcnxnAcAra: kirxyAcAradiMda deYhika matutx mAnasika shudidhxyanunx paDeda naMtara sAdhakanu jAcnxnavanunx paDeyalu parxya\-tinxsabeVku. I parxyatanxvu jAcnxnAcAravenisikoLuLxtatxde. idaralilx muKayxvAduveMdare: guruhiriyaralilx ahaMkAradiMda vatiRsa\-bAradu; kuMdu-\-niMde, hAsayx-roVSagaLanunx vajiRsabeVku. pAtakara dashaRna, sapxshaRna, sahaBoVjana, sahavAsavanunx vajiRsabeVku. vacana\-gaLalilx heVLiruvaMte naDedukoLaLxbeVku.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{BAvAcAra: BAvAcAraveMdare namamx BAvavanunx (aMtaraMga) nAveV pariVkeSx mADikoLuLxvudu. tanu vikAradiMda uMTAda kAma, korxVdha, loVBa, moVha, mada, mAtasxyaRgaLanunx vajiRsabeVku. BavijiVvanavanunx biDabeVku; yAvudu oLeLxyadu, yAvudu keTaTxdu eMbudanunx nAveV  savxMta viveVcaneyiMda nidhaRrisi, duguRNava tayxjisi, sadugxNava hiDidu, biDadipupxdeV BAvAcAra.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{satAyxcAra: satAyxcAraveMdare, satayxvacana. atAyxseyiMda husiya nuDiyade, satayxvanenxV nuDiyabeVkeMbudu; nuDida meVle, adaraMte naDeyabeVkeMbudu; vacana koTaTx meVle \hbox{vacanakekx} tapapxdiruvudu satAyxcAravenisikoLuLxtatxde.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{nitAyxcAra: kAmana bAdhegoLagAgi aneYtikavAgi vatiRsade, maDi meYlige muMtAdavugaLanunx Acarisade, baMdu\-delalxvU parxsAdaveMdu tiLidu, A parxsAdaBoVgadalilx loVlupatx\-nAgiruvudeV nitAyxcAra.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{dhamARcAra : yAvudeV parisithxtiyalilx dashavidhapAdoV\-dakada AcaraNe, EkAdashaparxsAdada AcaraNe matutx mUva\-tAtxru parxNavagaLa AcaraNe ivugaLanunx dhamARcAra oLa\-goLuLxtatxde.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad idelalxvanUnx samathaR guruviniMda tiLidukoMDu adaraMte AcarisuvudeV savARcArasaMpatutx eMdu cenanxbasavaNaNx\-navaru niNaRyisidAdxre:}
\ullekha{ayAyx, shirxVguru karuNisikoTaTx liMga jaMgamavalalxde, anayxdeYvaMgaLa terxYkaraNa\-dalilx aciRsadipuRde liMgAcAraveMbenayAyx... iMtiV EkAdasha\-vamaRva gurukaqpAmuKadiMdaridu, AcAraveV aMga mana pArxNa BAvaMgaLAgi, ihaparava miVri, piMDAdi jAcnxna\-shUnAyxMtavAda EkoVtatxramAgaRdalilxMdu, bayaloLage bacacx\-bariya nivaRyala sAdhisuvudeV savARcArasaMpatitxnAcArada nilukaDe noVDA (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 930-293).}}

%\begin{entry}

%\ullekha{I heVLidaKiLashiVlaMgaLaM keYkoMDu moVhadiMdaM naDesaloMdaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-33).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{eraDaneya shiVla : heMDatiyiMdalU I ipapxtutx nAlukx shiVlagaLa AcaraNeyanunx tapapxdaMte mADis%uvudu:}
%\ullekha{moVhiniyenipapx tananxbalegiV varxtava mADuvuderaDaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-33).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{mU\char'273neya cArushiVla : tananx baMdhumitarxrU I sadAcAragaLanunx anusarisuvaMte mADuvudu hAgU meYligeyilalxdaMtiruvudu:}
%\ullekha{beVhavaru tananx pUdiRdarigaMtenage modaleV hasanadAgiyaLavaTaTx shiVlavarxjagArxhakatavxvanoDacuRvude parigaNaneyiM peVLalapxDutitxdaRnu A rajasUsxtakaMgaLevudeV mU\char'273neya cArushiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-34).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nAlakxneya shiVla : saMcitakamaRgaLanunx puNayxkAyaRgaLiMda niVgikoLuLxvudu:}
%\ullekha{kamaRmaM kaLevudeV Arayeyx nAlakxneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-112-34).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{aidaneya shiVla : heMDatiyu gaBiRNiyAdAga liMgada hasatxdiMda BasitagaBaRsaMsAkxravanunx mADisuvudu:}
%\ullekha{aMgane gaBaRvAge samashiVlavapapx cAruliMgada hasatxdiM BasitagaBaRsaMsAkxramaM mADisuvadeYdaneya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-34).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{A\char'273neya shiVla : jaMgama pAdoVdaka parxsAdavanunx liMgakekx koTuTx sivxVkarisuvudu:}
%\ullekha{tajajxMgamada pAdatiVthaR parxsAdavane liMgakekx koTuTx koMbudA\char'273neya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-35).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{ELaneya shiVla : jaMgamaveV shivaneMdu BAvisuvudu:}
%\ullekha{jaMgamavane shiVvaneMbudeVLaneya shiVlaM (viVsheYpu. 7-113-35).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{eMTaneya shiVla : BavigaLige kANabAradeMdu shAka pAkAdigaLa pAterxgaLanunx vasatxrXgaLiMda saMpUNaRvAgi mucucxvudu:}
%\ullekha{varxtada BAMDakekx tuMbi savARMgapAvaDeya kaTuTxvudeMTaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-35).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{oMbatatxneya shiVla : ememxya hAlanunx tayxjisuvudu:}
%\ullekha{ememxvAlaM koMbudeV dUSayxvenutaM biTuTx naDevudeV oMbatatxneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-35).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{hatatxneya shiVla : tAneV shasAtxrXdigaLanunx odagisuvudalalxde, Bavige kwSxra mADuvudilalxveMba Bakatxna keYyiMda kwSxra mADisikoLuLxvudu:}
%\ullekha{Bavige kelasaMgeyeyxneMba Bakatxna keYyoLeV vApanakirxyeya keYkoMbudaMtalalxde tAne shasAtxrXLigaLananumADikoMDu kAlAnukUlAdi Bakatxra kAyoLanumADiseVneMbudiVga hatatxneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-36).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{hanonxMdaneya shiVla : hasu karugaLige liMgamuderxyanunx hAkidanaMtara hAlanunx kareyuvudu:}
%\ullekha{savaRlakaSxNada pashuka\char'273\char'304vige jAcnxniyeV liMgamuderxyanotitx ka\char'273\char'311vudeV niVna\char'273\char'236va hanonxMdaneya shiVlavayayx (viVsheYpu. 7-113-36).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{hanenxraDaneya shiVla : shivaBakatxra keYyiMda hulalxnunx tarisi, goVvugaLige hululx, niVranunx koDuvudu:}
%\ullekha{sanAmxni goVviMge shivaBakatxriM hulalxtarisiVvutatx tamAmxyatxda udakamaM koDuvudeV hanenxraDaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-37).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{hadimU\char'273neya shiVla : jihAvxcApalayxkAkxgi upupx seVrisade sapepxyAgiruva padAthaRgaLanenxV seVvisuvudu:}
%\ullekha{upApxdiyaM nADe jihAvx laMpaTada[va] bageyadada biTuTx nisapxqhada sapepxyeV hadimU\char'273neya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-37).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{hadinAlakxneya shiVla : liMgamuderxyiruva hasu matutx hoVrigaLanunx kUDisuvudu:}
%\ullekha{liMgamuderxya pashuge gaBaRvapupxdake muderxyabasavanaM kUDisuvadutatxmada goVmayaM sAraNege viBUtiya mADe hadinAlakxneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-37).}}

%\ullekha{shivaBakatx kuMba\char'273na gaqhake karedAyatada navajaladoLaM BAMDamaM mADisutatx matatxvu muKayx savaRkekx liMgamuderxyanotetx hadineYdaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-38).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{hadinA\char'273neya shiVla : shivaBaketxyareV hatitxyanunx biDisi, nUlu tegedu, Bakatxru neVyadx baTeTxgaLige liMgamuderxyanonxtitxda naMtara dharisuvudu:}
%\ullekha{avayavada vasatxrXkekx nUluvoDe biVvugaLotxvala kiviyiDade BaketxyariMda nUlisutatxve BakatxriM neVyisx liMgamuderxyanotetx hadinA\char'273neya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-38).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{hadineVLaneya shiVla : orateya niVrinalelxV baTeTxgaLanunx ogeyuvudu:}
%\ullekha{A vasatxrXmaM cilumeyagagxNiyoLaM toLevudeV vicArisalu hadineVLaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-39).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{hadineMTaneya shiVla : camaRda pAdarakeSxgaLanunx biTuTx marada hAvugegaLanunx dharisuvudu:}
%\ullekha{hAvugeyaneV meTiTx togala pAdukeya biDe hadineMTaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-39).}}

%\ullekha{keSxVtarxvaM geyavx vaqSaBaMgaLegx swBAgayxliMgamuderxya koraloLiDuta matAtxBAsamiNigaTaTxdA hagagxdiM geyavx shiVlavipaRtotxMdaleY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-40).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{ipaRtutx eraDaneya shiVla : guru liMga jaMgamadalilx guNAvaguNagaLanunx huDukade avaru heVLidaMte naDeyuvudu:}
%\ullekha{guruliMga jaMgamadoLA guNaM duguRNaM piridu maqdu kaThiNa karuNa devxVSamumana\char'273sadurutaradoLavarahudideMbudane tAneyahudeMdu matatxvariMdave haruSadiMdahudenisikoMbudeV ipaRtutx eraDaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-41).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{ipaRtutx mU\char'273neyadu : Baviyanunx neMTaneMdu parigaNisade avanalilx koDukoLuLxvikeyanunx mADadiruvudu:}
%\ullekha{Bavi neMTanenanxdeyavarigeVnuvaM koDade koLaLxdeV lekikxsadadipaRtutxmU\char'273neyadeY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-41).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{ipaRtutx nAlakxneya savilAsa shiVla : BavishabadxvanUnx anayxdeVvatAsutxtiyanUnx keVLisi koLaLxdiruvudu:}

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{ipaRtutx aidaneya shiVla : shivaBakatxneV kuliVna. parashivaneV paramAtamx hAgU paMcAkaSxriyanenxV maMtarxveMdu BAvisuvudu:}

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nAlavxtatxneya shiVla : jaMgamakekx mADuva upAdhi, nirupAdhi muMtAda AcaraNegaLalilx sAmarasayxBAvadiMda iruvudu:}

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nAlavxtutxnAlakxneya shiVla : adaqSaTxda benunx hatatxdiruvudu:}

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nAlavxtutx aidaneya shiVla : keTaTx mAtugaLanunx ADadiruvudu:}
%\ullekha{A jihevxyoLagAkushabadxvilalxdude ....nAlavxtutx aidaneya shiVlaveY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-50).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nAlavxtutx A\char'273neyadu : keTaTx mAtugaLanunx keVLadiruvudu:}
%\ullekha{neYjashurxtiyoLagaM kushabadxmaM keVLadudu nAlavxtutx A\char'273neyadeY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-50).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nAlavxtutxyeVLaneya shiVla : jAgarx, savxpanx, suSupitx eMba mUru avasethxgaLalUlx shivananunx biTuTx beVreyadanunx neneyadiruvudu:}
%\ullekha{A jAgarxmuM savxpanxmuM suSupitxgaLalilx rAjadharanalalxdanayxvana\char'273\char'236yadipuRdeV teVjiSaTx nAlavxtutxyeVLaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-50).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{shiVla nAlavxtutxyeMTu : caMdarx, sUyaRranunx noVDadiruvudu:}

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{nAlavxtutxvoMbatutx : bisilu, beLudiMgaLugaLalilx ODADidarU siVmoVlalxMGaneya mADuvudu:}
%\ullekha{meVNalilxyuM carise kAyaRvilAlxgiyakeSxVNa siVmAlaMGaneya mADikoMbudeV nAlavxtutxvoMbatetxleY (viVsheYpu. 7-113-51).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{aivatatxneya shiVla : etitxna gADiyalilx parxyANavanunx mADuvudu:}

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{aivatetxraDaneya shiVla : ariSaDavxgaR, aSaTxmadagaLanunx tayxjisuvudu:}
%\ullekha{ariSaDavxgaRvaSaTxmadamaM kaLedu tatatxvXMgaLa vaqMdamaM tiLivudeYvatetxraDaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-52).}}
%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{aivatutx mU\char'273neyadenipa shiVla : kasUtxri, pacacxkapURra muMtAda sugaMdhadarxvayxgaLanunx bayasadiruvudu:}

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{aivatutxyeVLaneya shiVla : catuviRdhamoVkaSxgaLanunx apeVkiSxsadiruvudu:}

%\ullekha{niyatade matijAcnxnavA shurxtijAcnxnavAsharxyavAdaKaMDitajAcnxnavAjoyxVtiniNaRyalasadfjAcnxnavA keVvalajAcnxnaveMdeMba paMcajAcnxnava a\char'273\char'236dipuRda\char'273\char'304vatutxvoMdaneya shiVla (viVsheYpu. 7-113-56).}}

%\newmeaning{\arthanonum{a\char'273\char'304vatatx mU\char'273neya shiVla : karasathxlaliMgadalilx neTaTxdaqSiTxyiMdiruvudu (?):}

\begin{entry}
\word{OM (OMkAra)}
\meaning{\artha{oMdu deYvoVpAsaneya nidiRSaTx maMtarxda mUlaBUtavAda biVjAkaSxragaLAda a, u, ma eMbuvugaLa samimxlanadiMduMTAda oMdu pavitarx maMtArxkaSxra; parxNava; teVjasisxna biMdu, elalx maMtarxgaLa mUla. AdadxriMda idakekx maMtarxrAja eMdu hesaru:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
OMkAraH savaRmaMtArxNAM maMtarxrATf parikiVtiRtaH ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(sU.A., kirx.pA., 4. 58)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{OM mUlada A parxshiKAcakarxdalilx manoVBAvavaDagi ...sharaNeMdu badukidenu kANA (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 353-98); OM eMbuvu\-doMdeV maMtarxda mUla (kaDasavx. 3-63-3).}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{paMcAkaSxriV mahAmaMtarxkekx parxNavavanunx seVrisidare SaDakaSxra maMtarxvAgutatxde; (OM namaH shivAya):}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
OMkArapUvoRV maMtorxV{\char'263}yaM
paMcAkaSxramayaH paraH |\\[1pt]
 sheYvAgameVSu veVdeVSu SaDakaSxra iti
samxqqtaH ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 8. 17)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{oMda\char'273lilx OMkAra Bavisitutx ...A\char'273\char'273lilx avayxya animiSasAthxnava kaMDe (savasaM. 4; sidadhxrA. 282-78); OMkAraveMba parxNava\-dalilx akAra ukAra makAra ivu mU\char'273\char'304\ biVjAkaSxra. akArave nAda ukArave biMdu makArave kaLe ...a eMdaDe anAhata u eMdaDe nAdaviLiyitutx ma eMbalilx biMdu baMdu kUDalu shiva\-shakitxyAgutatxM ihaMtaha OMkAravAyitutx (karaNa. 657-2); sarasa cAtuveRVdanAM mo\char'273\char'311yaloVMkAradi maMtorxVcacxraNa\-ravadiMdatirx muKayxradoMdeseyoLiralu (basapu. 1-47).}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\artha{savxgaR, matayxR, pAtALaloVkagaLa elalx carAcaravasutxgaLa janaka; ukAra biMdujAgarx, akAra nAdasavxpanx, makAra kale sushukitx ivelalxvU EkavAgi OMkAravu utapxtitxyAgutatxde.}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
OMkAraH parxNavashecxYva barxhamxjAcnxnaM shivAtamxkamf |\\[1pt]
teVjoVbiVjaM niSakxlaM sAyxtAtxrakaM niSakxlAtamxkamf ||\\[1pt]
OMkAraparxBavaM savaRM terxYloVkayxM sacarAcaramf |\\
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(shi.ta.ra., BA-1, 1.5. 26. 30)}
\end{entry}

(savasaM. 4; {sidadhxrA.} 1197-345); parxsAdaliMgada seVvakatavxdiMda kamaRtarxyavanaLida nimaRla nirA\-varaNana noVDA! (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 225-109); tApatarxyaMgaLigenanxnu oLagumADuva kamaRtarxyaMgaLu keTaTx keVDa noVDA (savasaM. 11; GanaliM. 758-372); pUvaR\-janAmxMtaradalilx mADida sukaqtaduSakxqqtakamaRve saMsAkxrarUpa\-diMdaneVka BavaMgaLige biVjamAgi ...kamaRtarxyadiMdumamxLisi (viveVka. 199).}}

\meaning{\arthanonum{vacanagaLalilx baruva kalegaLa parikalapxneyu sapxSaTxvAgilalx. kelavu vacanakAraru kalegaLu athavA kalAshakitxgaLu adhoVmAyeya rUpagaLeMdU, Bakitx matutx shakitxgaLu UdhavxRmAyeya rUpagaLeMdU heVLidare, matetx kelavaru parAshakitx, Adishakitx muMtAda shakitxgaLu adhoVmAyeya rUpa\-gaLeMdU, kale athavA kalAshakitxgaLeV UdhavxRmAyeya rUpagaLeMdU heVLutAtxre. kelavaru kalA, {shakitx} matutx BakitxgaLige yAva BeVdavU ilalxvenunxtAtxre. {obabxneV} vacanakAra ``kale'' eMba padavanunx mUru athaRgaLalUlx baLasutAtxne. sadayxkekx nAvu kaleyeMdare parashivana shakitxya shudadhxrUpaveMdU, shakitxgaLeV ashudadhxrUpaveMdU Uhisi muMduvareyabahudu.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad kalegaLa parikalapxneyalilx asapxSaTxte matutx omamxtavilalx\-didadxrU, avugaLa bagegx I eraDu viSayagaLanunx KacitavAgi heVLabahudu.}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\artha{akakxmahAdeVviya parxkAra} \ullekha{A mahAliMgave paMca\-sAdAKayx\-veMdenisitutx. A paMcasAdAKayxve paMcaliMgaparxkAshaveMdenisitutx. A paMcaliMga parxkArave paMcamuKaveMdenisitutx. A paMcamuKa\-diMdave paMcAkaSxriyutapxtitx. A paMcAkaSxriyiMdave paMcashakitx\-gaLutapxtitx (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 58-22).} 
\arthanonum{upAsayxnAgi kANabeVkeMba udedxVshadiMda \hbox{mahAliMgavu} paMcasAdAKayxvAgutatxde. AcAraliMga, guruliMga, shivaliMga, jaMgamaliMga matutx parxsAdaliMga ivugaLeV A liMgada muKagaLu athavA parxkAsha\-gaLu (\hbox{sadAshiva}, tatupxruSa itAyxdi hesarugaLU I hesarugaLa badalu baLasalapxDutatxve). aMtU, aidu muKagaLiMda (paMca\-sAdAKayxgaLiMda) paMcAkaSxri maMtarx utapxtitxyAgutatxde. heVgeMdare : nakAravu sadoyxVjAtamuKadiMdalU, makAravu {vAmadeVvamuKadiMdalU,} shikAravu aGoVra\-muKadiMdalU, vakAravu tatupxruSamuKadiMdalU, yakAravu IshAnayxmuKadiMdalU utapxtitxyAgutatxve.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I aidu akaSxragaLu aidu kalegaLanunx utApxdisutatxve. nakAradiMda nivaqtitxkale, makAradiMda parxtiSAThxkale, shikAradiMda vidAyxkale, vakAradiMda shAMtikale, yakAradiMda shAMtayxtiVta kale utapxtitxyAgutatxve. toVMTada sidadhxliMga shivayoVgigaLu shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxreyeMba Araneya kaleyanunx gurutisi:}
\ullekha{niHkala shivana madhayxdalilx cicaCxkitx udayisidaLu. A cicaCxkitxya madhayxdalilx shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxreyeMba kale. A shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxreyeMba kaleya madhayxdalilx mahAliMga. A mahAliMgada madhayxdalilx nimuRkatx sAdAKayx (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 63-32).}
\arthanonum{adu mahAliMga athavA nimuRkatxsAdAKayxdiMda utapxtitxyAgutatxde enunxtAtxre.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\artha{kalegaLu sAdhakanige AdhAyxtimxka jiVvanavanunx parxbalagoLisalu sahAya mADutatxve. jiVvAtamxnu jAcnxneVMdirxya, \hbox{kameRVMdirxya}, aMtaHkaraNa muMtAdavugaLa duSapxrXBAvadiMda tapipxsikoLuLxvavaregU mukatxnAgalAra. Adare, nivaqtitxkalegaLa sahAya\-diMda avanu avugaLa duSikxrXyegaLanunx tapipxsi, avu satikxrXye mADuvaMte mADabalalxnu. kameRVMdirxya\-gaLu avananunx vividha riVtiyalilx perxVreVpisi, avananunx kamaRbaMdhanakokxLagumADive. Adare nivaqtitxkaleya parxBAvadiMda, avanu avugaLiMda AdhAyxtimxka kelasagaLananxSeTxV mADisutAtxne. hiVge, avana vAgiMdirxyavu yAvAgalU shivanAmavanenxV ucacxrisutatxde; satayxvanenxV nuDiyutatxde; maqduvacanavananxSeTxV nuDiyutatxde; avana keYgaLu eMdU duSaTxkAyaRgaLanunx mADade, satAkxyaR\-gaLananxSeTxV mADalu upayoVgisalapxDutatxve; avana kAlugaLu yAva dumARgaRvanUnx karxmisade, guru vidhisida sanAmxgaRdalilx mAtarx calisutatxve; avana gudavu ANava, kAmiRka matutx mAyiVya malagaLiMda mukatxvAgutatxde; avanu jananeVMdirx\-yada mUlaka kUTada suKapaDuva iceCxyanunx tayxjisi, liMgAMgasAmarasayxda mUlaka suKapaDuva iceCxyanunx vayxkatx\-paDisutAtxne. idaralilx jaya sAdhisidavanu AcAraliMga athavA adara parxkAshavAda sadoyxVjAta (athavA kamaR) sAdAKayxvanunx sAkASxtakxrisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sAdhakana AdhAyxtamxsAdhaneyalilx inUnx parxgatiyAdare avanu parxtiSAThxkaleya parxBAvakokxLagAgidAdxneMdathaR. Aga avanu rUparasagaMdhAdi viSayagaLa bayakeyanunx niyaMtirxsutAtxne. Aga avanige shabadxveMdare guruvina vacana (shabadx), sapxshaRveMdare iSaTxliMga sapxshaR, rUpaveMdare lAMCanagaLAda {rudArxkiSx}, viBUti, kAvibaTeTx, muMtAdavugaLa noVTa, rasaveMdare parxsAdada ruci, vAsaneyeMdare shivana nimaRlate. hiVge tanAmxterxgaLanunx niyaMtirxsabalalx sAdhakanu guruliMga athavA adara parxkAshavAda vAmadeVvamuKa (athavA katuRsAdAKayx)vanunx sAkASxtakxrisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shivaliMga athavA adara parxkAshavAda aGoVramuKa (mUtiRsAdAKayx)vanunx aMtashacxkuSxviniMda noVDabeVkenunxva sAdhakanu vidAyxkaleyanunx olisikoLuLxva parxyatanx mADutAtxne. vidAyxkaleyanunx sAdhisidavanu rudArxkiSx, viBUti matutx liMgavanunx dharisutAtxnalalxde beVrAva AlaMkArikavasutxgaLanUnx dharisuvudilalx, shivaliMgavanunx noVDutAtxnalalxde yAva moVhaka vasutxvanUnx noVDuvudilalx; parxsAdavananxlalxde EnanUnx tinunxvudilalx. EkeMdare, avanige guruviniMda videyx yAvudu avideyx yAvudu eMbudara BeVda tiLidide.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad jaMgamaliMga athavA adara parxkAshavAda tatupxruSamuKa (athavA amUtiRsAdAKayx)vanunx sAkASxtakxrisikoLaLx\-beVkenunxva sAdhakanu shAMtakaleyanunx avalaMbisabeVkAgutatxde. idariMdAgi avanige pArxNa, samAna, udAna, apAna, vAyxna eMba aidu vAyugaLanunx niyaMtirxsalu sAdhayxvAgutatxde, hAgU Ata parashivanaMte satutx, citutx, AnaMda, nitayx matutx paripUNaRnAgutAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shAMtayxtiVtakaleya sahAyadiMda sAdhakanu manasusx, citatx, budidhx matutx ahaMkAragaLanunx niyaMtirxsi, adhAyxtamxdalilx matatxSuTx parxgati sAdhisutAtxne. Aga avana manasusx yAvAgalU liMgavanenxV manana mADutitxrutatxde; avana budidhxyu yAvAgalU sacAcxritarxvanenxV anusarisutatxde; avana citatxvu dAsoVha\-vanunx mADalu nidhaRrisutatxde matutx avanu nirahaMkAri\-yAgutAtxne.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad ililx nivaqtitxkalege A hesareVke eMdu nAvu parxshinxsabahudu. adakekx kAraNaviSeTx. moVkASxthiRyAdavanu nivaqtitxmAgaRvanunx anusarisadeyeV tananx guriyanunx sAdhisalAra. nivaqtitxkaleyu sAdhakananunx nivaqtitxparananAnxgi mADutatxde. parxtiSAThxkaleyu A nivaqtitxyanunx matatxSuTx parxbalagoLisutatxde; vidAyxkaleyu AdhAyxtimxka jAcnxnavanunx huTiTxsutatxde; shAMtikaleyu iMdirxya\-gaLanunx shAMtavAgiDutatxde hAgU shAMtayxtiVtakaleyu aMtaHkaraNagaLanunx shAMtavAgiDutatxde. hiVge noVDidAga elalx kalegaLU nivaqtitxkalegaLeV eMbudu KacitavAgutatxde (va.pa.koV. 114-116).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\artha{{\large kalegaLu - shakitxgaLu:} vividha vacanagaLa parishiVlaneyiMda kalegaLu matutx shakitxgaLu
 BinanxvoV alalxvoV eMba parxshenx ELutatxde. toVMTada sidadhxliMgeVshavxraru tamamx vacana\-voMdaralilx ``kale'' matutx  ``shakitx'' oMdeV vasutxvina eraDu hesaru\-gaLenunxtAtxre:}
\ullekha{``shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxreyeMba kalApariyAya\-vanunxLaLx cicaCxkitx, shAMtayxtiVteyeMba kalApariyAyavanunxLaLx \hbox{parA\-shakitx}, shAMtiyeMba kalApariyAyavanunxLaLx Adishakitx, vidAyx\-kalApariyAyavanunxLaLx icACxshakitx, parxtiSAThxkalApariyAya\-vanunxLaLx kirxyAshakitx nivaqtitx, kalApariyAyavanunxLaLx jAcnxnashakitx. hiVge oMdeV shivashakitx Aru teranAgi SaTfparxkAravahaMthA liMgakekx aMga\-rUpavAgitutx'' (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi 36-20).} 
\arthanonum{I {mAtanunx} samathiRsutatxde. Adare, ideV vacana\-kAraru:}
 \ullekha{``\hbox{paMca\-shakitxyanunx} paMcasAdAKayxvanunx, paMcakalegaLanunx paMcAkaSxraM\-gaLanunx tananxlilx gaBiRVkarisikoMDu''}
\arthanonum{eMdu heVLuvAga kalegaLeV beVre, shakitxgaLeV beVre eMdu daqDhavAgutatxde.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad vAsatxvavAgi, kalegaLu shakitxgaLiMda Binanxvalalx. I vAdakekx eraDu AdhAragaLanunx koDabahudu: (1) mUvatAtxru tatatxvXgaLa bagegx heVLuvAga yAva vacanakAranU kalegaLanunx parxsAtxpisuvudilalx. shakitxgaLeYdu, kalegaLeYdu eMdu heVLidare Aga tatatxvXgaLa saMKeyx mUvatAtxrakikxMta hecAcxgutatxde. (2) parxtiyoMdu vasutxvU shakitxya rUpaveMdU, A shakitxyu shivana aMgaveMdU (BAga athavA deVha) heVLuvAga, uLida EneV idadxrU adu shakitxya rUpeV AgirabeVkAgutatxde. alalxde, }
\ullekha{``hiVge oMdeV shakitx Aru teranAgi SaTfparxkAravahaMthA liMgakekx rUpAyitutx''}
\arthanonum{eMbalilx liMgakekx kaleyeV aMgaveMdU, kale shakitxya inonxMdu hesareMdU heVLutatxde.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad inonxMdu athaRdalilx shakitx matutx kalegaLu keVvala hesaru\-gaLaSeTxV alalx, savxrUpadalilxyU Binanx eMbudanunx toVrisabahudu. kalegaLeMdare nivaqtitxkalA, vidAyxkalA (itAyxdi) eMdu athaR mADuvudAdare kalegaLu nivaqtitxshakitxgaLeMdU, shakitxgaLu parxvaqtitxshakitxgaLeMdU heVLabahudu athavA kalegaLu  \hbox{parashivana} shakitxya shudadhxrUpagaLu, shakitxgaLu adeV shakitxya ashudadhx rUpagaLu. Aga nivaqtatxkale, parxtiSAThxkale muMtAda kalegaLu shakitxya beVre rUpagaLU hwdu, beVre hesarugaLU hwdu (va.pa.koV. 116-117).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{kavacamaMtarx}
\meaning{\arthanonum{rakASxmaMtarx: Aru bageya nAyxsAkaSxramaMtarxgaLalilx oMdu; `herxYM' eMba biVjAkaSxra:}
\ullekha{baLikakxM, SaDaMgamaMtarxnAyxsamaM peVLevxneMtene - adhaH\-paTiTxkeyalilx hArxM eMba haqdayamaMtarxmaM, adhaHkaMjadalilx hirxVM eMba shiroVmaMtarxmaM, kaMThadalilx hUrxM eMba shiKAmaMtarxmaM, UdhavxRkaMjadalilx herxYM eMba kavacamaMtarxmaM, UdhavxRpaTiTxke\-yalilx hwrxM eMba {neVtarxmaMtarxmaM}, AjayxparxdhArikeyalilx harxH eMba asatxrXmaMtarxmaM, liMgadalilx nAyxsaMgeyuvxdeMdu niravisideyayAyx, parashivaliMgayayx (savasaM. 11; imamxDi. 1391-646); A parxNavada kuMDalA\-kAradalilx kavacamaMtarx utapxtayx (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 913-398); OM herxYM kavacAya BaM - idu kavaca\-maMtarxveMdu heVLalapxDutatxde (shivAkoV. 114-256).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{kavacasayx maMtarxH - kavacamaMtarxH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{kaLavunirasanasathxla}
\src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{aMgasathxlagaLalilx oMdu; anayxsitxrXV\-vayxsanavanunx tayxjisabeVkeMbudanunx nirUpisuva sathxla:}
\ullekha{kaLavu\-nirasanasathxla ...paradAramaM biTuTx liMgasAhitayxvAdeneMbavaMge kaLavu {shwcamaM} keDisuvudeMbudana\char'273\char'236du inunx kaLava shivaBakatxru biDabeVkeMbudaM nuDida vacanaMgaLu (gaNaBA. 165-1).}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{kaLasha}
\meaning{\artha{pUjAvidhigaLigAgi iDuva shudadhxjala tuMbida kuMBa.}
\artha{deVvAlayada goVpurakekx hAkuva loVhada goVLA\-kArada kavaca muMtAduvu:}
\ullekha{shivakaLasha gurukaLashaveMdu hesariTuTx\-koMDu nuDiviri. shivakaLasha gurukaLashava niVvu {balalxre} heVLireV (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 714-213); sadugxru sAvxmi shiSayxMge anugarxhava mADuvalilx taciCxSayxna masatxkada meVle tananx hasatxvanirisi\-daDe loVhada meVle paruSa bidadxMtAyitatxyAyx... sadoyxVjAta vAmadeVva aGoVra tatupxruSa IshAnaveMba paMcakaLashadaBi\-SeVkava mADisalu, shivana karuNAmaqtada soVne suridaMtAyi\-tatxyAyx (savasaM. 5; akakxma. 320-100); shirxVguru shivagaNaMgaLa madhayxdalilx enage upadeVshisuvalilx parameVshavxrana paMcamuKavane paMcakaLashavAgi mUtiRgoLisi, gaNaMgaLu sAkiSxyAgi kara\-sathxlakekx shivaliMgava koTuTx `I liMgave gaMDa, niVneV heMDati'yeMdu heVLi, lalATadalilx viBUtiya paTaTxva kaTiTx hasatxdalilx kaMka\-Nava kaTiTx, pAdoVdakaparxsAdavanitutx eMdeMdigU satipatiBAva tapapx\-dirali\-yeMdu nirUpisidanayayx shirxVguru (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 180-84); A paqthivxyAkAshaveMba I uBayamadhayxdoLu sakalajiVvavarxjaM tiVvidaRvolu tatakxkAraveV paqthivxyaMtAvara LakAravAkAshaM shakAraveV apupxtatatxvXM mU\char'273lA ...kUDe kaLashABi\-dhAnavadAdudw (viVsheYpu. 7-103-31-32).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{keVna = jaleVna lashati iti - kalashaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{kaLashapaMcaka}
\src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shuBakAyaRgaLalilx parashivana paMcamuKagaLa hesarinalilx sAthxpisuva aidu kalashagaLu; I kalashagaLanunx paMcAcAyaRra hesarinalilxyU sAthxpisuva padadhxtiyU ide:}
\ullekha{nAlavxrAcAyaR\-roDanA kalashapaMcakavanu haruSadiM mUrusULA sidadhx\-rAmaru shiraketitxyaBiSeVcanaMgeyudx (cebapu.~59-17); baMdanA sakalagaNavaqMdasaMdaNigaLoLu ...kaLashapaMcakadoLage naLanaLipa taLirugaLu paLavaLige meVlakxTuTx hoLeva BasitaMgaLoLu (diVkASxboV. 58-15).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{kalashAnAM paMcakaM - kalashapaMcakaM}}
\vskip -2pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\SEE{kaLashapaMcaka}}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{kaLashAcAyaR}
\src{kA}
\meaning{\arthanonum{parashivasavxrUpiyAda guru; shuBa\-kAyaRgaLigAgi mADuva paMcakalasha sAthxpaneya saMdaBaRdalilx mUtaRgoLuLxva paMcagurugaLalilx muKayxnAdavanu:}
\ullekha{I paMcakaLashaMgaLaM viracisutatxlA shirxV paramagurumUtiR\-yadhika kaLashAcAyaRriVpariyenalekx pAdAcaRnege yoVgayx\-dupa\-deVshakataRM nAlavxra A pUvaRvilasitAcAyaRreMdeV samxrisu\-toVpa\-sAdAKayxnAmadinaMtavagaRLaM sAthxpanaM mADi (viVsheYpu. 7-103-60).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{kalashasayx AcAyaRH - kalashAcAyaRH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{kaLashABiSeVka}
\meaning{\arthanonum{shariVrakekx anavxyavAguva ELu bageya diVkeSx\-gaLalilx oMdu; guruvu maMtorxVkatxvAda kalashada niVriniMda shiSayxnige sAnxna mADisuva vidhi:}
\ullekha{tuMbi tuLukada kalashABi\-SeVka, Agamavilalxda diVkeSx, pUjege bArada liMga, saMgavilalxda saMbaMdha (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1074-321); viVrasheYva diVkeSx\-yAdoDe AjAcnxdiVkeSx, upamAdiVkeSx, savxsitxkAroVhaNa, kalashABi\-SeVka, \hbox{viBUtiya}paTaTx, liMgAyata, liMgasAvxyatameMba sapatx\-vidha? ...paMcakalashoVdakaMgaLiM shiSayxMge sAnxnaMgeyuvxdeV kala\-shABi\-SeVkavenisuvudu (viveVka. 102); AyAjecnxyupame kaLa\-shABisukaMgaLa ...A adhika liMgasAvxyataMgaLumenipipxVyeVLa\char'273\char'236M\-dopupxvA sherxVSaThxdiSaTxmaM kAyakekx diVkeSxyaM mADi (viVsheYpu. 7-110-70).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{kalashAnAM aBiSeVkeVna kirxyamANaH aBiSeVkaH -\break kalashABi\-SeVkaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{kaLashABiSeVkadiVkeSx}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{kirxyAdiVkeSxya ELu avAMtara  diVkeSxgaLalilx oMdu; paMcabarxhamxra saMkeVtarUpavAda paMcakalashagaLiMda pavitarxjalavanunx tegedukoMDu shiSayxna masatxkada meVle porxVkiSxsuva kirxye:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
AjocnxVpamA ca kalashABiSeVkAKAyx tataH paramf |\\[2pt]
...... sapetxYtAH kirxyAdiVkASxMtarA matAH ||\\
\end{shl}
\vskip 3pt
\pauthor{(-kA.A., kirx.pA., 12. 43; cu.A.,kirx.pA., 9.12)}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{savxsitxkAroVhaNa diVkeSxya naMtara jaMgamanu nerediruva  parxmathagaNagaLu, ArAdhayxru, Bakatxru matutx mAheVshavxraropipxge\-yiMda niraMjana jaMgamakekx siMhAsana mADi, paMcakalashagaLige jaMgamadiVkASxpAdoVdaka\-vanunx tuMbutAtxre. anaMtara, SaTfsamAmxjaRne, \hbox{SaDavxNaRda} raMgoVle, navavidha dhAnayx, navasUtarx, viBUti, viVLayx, suvaNaR kANikegaLanunx koTuTx, sadoyxVjAta, vAmadeVva, aGoVra, \hbox{tatupxruSa},  IshAnayxmUtiRgaLa parxtinidhi\-gaLAda paMcakalashagaLige jaMgamapAda soVMkuvaMte guruvu muhUtaR mADi, A kalashagaLa sUtarxvanunx tananx kAlebxraLige kaTiTxkoLuLxtAtxne. kalashagaLa pUvaRBAgadalilx karikaMbaLiya gadudxge mADi, adara meVle moVkASxthiRyAgi baMda shiSayxnanunx kUrisutAtxre hAgU tananx kAlebxraLige kaTiTxruva sUtarxvanunx shiSayxnige kaTuTxtAtxre. AmeVle, shiSayxnu dharisiruva shivaliMgavanunx avana keYmeVlirisi, adara meVle niraMjana jaMgamada pAdavanunx muTiTxsi, paMcakalashagaLalilxruva jaMgama pAdoVdakavanunx oMdu kalashakekx tuMbi parxmathagaNArAdhayx BakatxmAheVshavxrarelalx shiSoyxVtatxmana masatxkada meVle, maMtarx\-dhAyxnadiMda A pAdoVdakavanunx porxVkiSxsuvudeV kalashABiSeVka diVkeSx:}
\ullekha{masatxkada meVle maMtarxdhAyxna\-diMda saMporxVkaSxNeya mADuvaMthAdedxV kalAkalashABiSeVka diVkeSx (savasaM. 10; gurusi. 213-404).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{kalashAnAM aBiSeVkeVna kirxyamANA diVkASx -\break kalashABi\-SeVkadiVkASx}}

\begin{entry}
\word{kAyaka}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{samapaRNaBAvadiMda mADuva kelasa; shivA\-paRNe\-gAgiyeV mADuva kAyaR:}
\ullekha{deVvasahita Bakatx manege baMdaDe kAyakavAvudeMdu besagoMDenAdaDe nimAmxNe! (savasaM. 1; basava. 453-109); kAya kAyakava mADutitx\-ralu manavu liMgadalilx berasi terahilalxdipapx maDivALana pariya noVDA! (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 845-251); kAyakadalilx nirata\-nAdaDe, gurudashaRnavAdaDU mareyabeVku, liMgapUje\-yAdaDU mareyabeVku ...kAyakave keYlAsavAda kAraNa (savasaM. 6; Ayadxkikx. 1170-369).}
\arthanonum{kAyaka eMdare udoyxVga. vacanakArara daqSiTxyalilx kAyakakekx vishiSaTx athaRvide.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad satayxshudadhx kAyakavaSeTxV kAyaka. kAya mADiyeV uNaNxbeVku. kAyava savesaleVbeVku. `kAyava baLalisade, tanu karagade, mana noVyade,
 kADi beVDi' taruvudu kAyakavalalx.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad kAyakavu durAseyiMda kUDirabAradu. nALegoVsakxra
 duDiyuvudu, makakxLu momamxkakxLigoVsakxra uLisu\-vudu, aSeTxVke,
 iMdina agatayxkikxMta hecucx duDiyuvudu, kAyaka sidAdhxMtakekx
 horagu. vayxkitx tananx kuTuMbakekx aMdaMdige agatayxvAdaSaTxnunx
 mAtarx duDidare sAku. inUnx uLidu\-danunx jaMgamakekx
 niVDabeVku.}
\ullekha{``beVDalAgadu Bakatx''}. \arthanonum{hiVge iDiV samAjavu samaqdidhx\-yiMda tuMbi
 tuLukutitxrutatxde} \ullekha{``citatxshudadhx kAyaka mADuva \hbox{sadaBxkatxna}
 maneyalilx etatx noVDidaDatatx lakiSxmX tAneV
 tAnAgipapxLu''.} \arthanonum{duSaTx kAyaka mADi liMgAMgasAmarasayx sAdhisalu
 sAdhayxvilalx. satAkxyaka\-diMda samAjada AthiRka
 parxgatiyAguvudaSeTxV alalx, samAjadalilx shAMti, samAdhAnagaLU uMTAgutatxve.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad kAyakavu sharaNara daqSiTxyalilx keVvala veYyakitxka athavA kwTuMbika vaqtitxyAgirade, oMdu samAjaseVveyU Agitutx. aMtaha samAjaseVveyeMba kAyakagaLanunx sAmAnayxvAgi jaMgamaru mADutitxdadxru. avugaLalilx muKayxvAda kelavanunx ililx hesarisabahudu:}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\artha{GaMTeya kAyaka : maThadalilxruva jaMgamaru parxtidina {beLagegx} nasukinalilx GaMTe bArisi, janaranunx ecacxragoLisutAtxre. nidedxyiMda janaru deYnaMdina kAyaRkarxmagaLanunx mugisi tamamx kAyakadalilx toDagali eMbudeV avaru GaMTe bArisuva udedxVsha.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\artha{jaMgina kAyaka : maThadiMda sUyoRVdayakekx horabidadx
 jaMgamaru parxti Bakatxra maneyanunx parxveVshisi, malagiruvavaranunx
tamamx betatxdiMda tividu ecacxrisutAtxre. ivaru tamamx eDageYge jaMgu
(jaMgf jaMgf eMdu shababx mADuva GaMTe) kaTiTxkoMDu aDADxDuvudariMda
inUnx malagidadx {janaru} adara shabadxdiMda edudx, muKamAjaRne
itAyxdigaLalilx niratarAgutAtxre. ivaru maneyoLage baMdu
ebibxsidudakAkxgi janaru avarige BikeSx niVDutAtxre. AdudariMda
avarige jaMgina ayayx eMba hesarU ide.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\artha{hiTiTxna kAyaka : sumAru 9 athavA 10 gaMTege (beLagina hotutx) hiTiTxna ayayxnavaru Bakatxra manege baMdu janaru sAnxnapUjAdigaLalilx niratarAgidAdxroV ilalxvoV, tamamx kAyaka\-gaLalilx niratarAgidAdxro athavA {inUnx} malagidAdxroV eMdu pariVkiSxsutAtxre. avaru mADida seVvege parxtiPala\-veMbaMte Bakatxru avarige oMdu hiDi hiTaTxnunx niVDutAtxre. avarige hiTiTxna ayayxnavareMdu hesaru. hiVge Bakatxra veYyakitxka, kwTuMbika matutx sAmAjika naDenuDiyanunx rUpisuva saluvAgi jaMgamaru meVlina nayavAda riVtigaLanunx anusarisutAtxre. Adare idAvudakUkx bagagxda kela janarirutAtxre; avaranunx tidadxlAgadavareMdu jaMgamaru hAgeV biTuTxbiDuvudilalx. aMthavaranunx tididx dhAmiRka hAdige tarabeVkeMba udedxVshadiMda avaru tekekxya kAyaka, muLALxvigeya kAyaka matutx shasatxrXda kAyaka eMba mUru kAyakagaLanunx mADutAtxre.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\artha{tekekxya kAyaka : GaMTeya kAyaka, jaMgina kAyaka matutx hiTiTxna kAyakadayayxgaLu oMdeV Uralilx nelesida jaMgamarAdare,  tekekxya kAyakadayayxgaLu UrUru tiruguva jaMgamaru. avaru  maThadalilx vAsatxvayx hUDi, alilxna jaMgamariMda adhamiRgaLa paTiTx paDeyutAtxre. anaMtara A \hbox{adhamiRya} maneya muMde sUyoRVdayakikxMta  modaleV hoVgi niMtirutAtxre. bAgilu tegeda kUDaleV oLanugigx maneyalilxruva kaMbavanunx apipxkoLuLxtAtxre. A adhamiRyu tananx guruhiriyara kaSxme keVLabeVku, tAnu adhamaRvanunx tayxjisi dhamaRda hAdi hiDiyutetxVneMdu sAvxmigaLige vacana niVDuvavaregU avaru tamamx apupxgeyanunx saDilisuvudilalx. aMdare, alilxyavaregU avarige sAnxnavilalx, pUjeyilalx, parxsAdavilalx. idu oMdu dinavAga\-bahudu, eraDu athavA mUru dinagaLAga\-bahudu. oMdu veVLe adhamiRyu idakekx bagagxdidadxre sAvxmigaLu alelxV pArxNatAyxga mADabahudu. \hbox{anaMtara} adhamiRge pashAcxtAtxpavAdarU Agabahudu.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\artha{muLALxvige kAyaka: tekekxya kAyakadayayxgaLu \hbox{adhamiRya} maneya oLage hoVgi tamamx kAyaka mADidare, muLALxvige kAyakadayayxgaLu tamamx kAyakavanunx A \hbox{adhamiRya} maneya muMde, rasetxyalilx niMtu mADuvaru. ivarU saha maThadalilx vAsatxvayx hUDi viSayalaMpaTara paTiTxyanunx paDedu mAraneya dinaveV tamamx kAyakavanunx pArxraMBisu\-tAtxre. tekekxya kAyakadayayxgaLu hoVdareMba samAdhAnada meVle adhamiRyu tananx adhamaRvanunx matetx muMduvaresabahudu. aMtahavana maneya muMde sUyoRV\-dayada hotitxge muLALxvige kAyakadayayxgaLu, cUpAda moLegaLanunx joVDisida halageya meVle hAvugeya meVle aMgAlanunx Uri nilulxtAtxre. adhamiRya hesaranunx GaTiTxyAgi heVLutAtx, basavAdi sharaNara hesaru\-gaLanunx samxrisutAtx, adhamiRge sadubxdidhxyanunx koDaleMdu shivananunx samxrisutAtx niMtare, Urina janarelalx adhamiRyanunx bayayx\-toDagutAtxre. A avamAna sAladeMbaMte, tananx tapipxgAgi sAvxmigaLige noVvAgutitxde eMba pashAcxtAtxpavU avanalilx uMTAgi, avanu tananx tapapxnunx opipxkoMDu, inunx muMde dhAmiRka jiVvana naDesuvudAgi vacana niVDida naMtaraveV, sAvxmigaLu tamamx rakatxsikatx pAdagaLanunx toLedukoMDu, sAnxna pUjAdigaLanunx mugisi parxsAda sivxVkarisutAtxre.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\artha{shasatxrXda kAyaka: idakUkx jagagxda adhamiRgaLigeVnU korate\-yilalx. Aga shasatxrXda kAyakadayayxgaLa  parxveVshavAgutatxde. sUyoRVdayakekx muMce \hbox{adhamiRya} mane hatitxra hoVgi  avara maneya muMde huriya oMdu koneyalilxruva kuDu\-goVlanunx goVDege  neVtuhAki, matotxMdu koneyalilxruva kuDu\-goVlanunx tamamx keYyalilx  hiDidukoMDu rasetxya madhayxkekx baMdu nilulxtAtxre hAgU GaTiTxyAgi \hbox{adhamiRya} hesaru heVLutAtx, basavAdiparxmathara hesaranunx samxrisutAtx, shivanu \hbox{avanige} sadubxdidhx koDaleMdu pArxthiRsutAtxre. avanige sadubxdidhx koDadidadxre tamamx shirasasxnenxV tegedukoLaLxleMdu nuDiyutAtxre. adhamiR\-yAreMdu iDiV Urige gotAtxdAga avanige avamAnavAgutatxde, alalxde tamamx tapipxgAgi jaMgamareVke pArxNatAyxga mADabeVku eMdu tiVmARnisida avanu tananx dumARgaR\-vanunx tayxjisutAtxne.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad hiVge yAvudeV kAyaka vayxkitxgU hitavAguvudalalxde samAjakUkx hitavAgutatxde. alalxde, hiVge aihikakUkx pAra\-mAthiRkakUkx seVtuve kalipxsida sharaNara kAyakasidAdhxMta aduBxta, apUvaR:}
\ullekha{mana shudadhx\-vilalxdavaMge... citatxshudadhxdalilx kAyakava mADuvalilx... sadaBxkatxMge etatx noVDidaDatatx lakiSxmX tAnAgipapxLu (savasaM. 5; Ayadxkikx. 725-223); Caladi Bakatxra keYya gudadx gudidxsikoMDu sale kAyakava taMdu jaMgamAcaRneya mADeMdu shiva peVLi poVge (pwrxDharA. 2-24).}}
%deVvasahita Bakatx... kAyakavAvudeMdu besagoMDenAdaDe.. (savasaM. 1; basava. 453-109); kAyakekx kAyavAgi, tanuviMge tanuvAgi.. (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 1082-323); darxvayxrUpa rUpisuve... parxsAdarUpa rUpisuve kAyakekxMdu.. (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 292-92); huTiTxda shishuviMge... kAyakava mADutitxpaRru noVDeMdanayAyx.. \begin{entry}
\word{kAyAnugarxha}
\meaning{\arthanonum{jAcnxnAcArasaMpananxnAda shivayoVgiyu tananx kAyavanunx janarige toVrisutAtx anugarxha mADutAtxne. adeV kAyAnugarxha. iMtaha kAyAnugarxhavanunx mADuvavanu kAyAnugArxhaka. anugarxhaliMgada kAyAnugarxha, iMdirxyAnu\-garxha matutx pArxNAnugarxha - eMba mUru parxkAra\-gaLalilx oMdu; aMgada vAyxmoVhagaLanunx dUramADi kAyavanunx liMgakekx apiRsuvudu:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
anugaqhANxti yalolxVkAnf savxkAyaM dashaRyananxsw |\\[1pt]
tasAmxdeVSa samAKAyxtaH kAyAnugarxhanAmakaH ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 17. 5)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{kAyAnugarxha, iMdirxyAnugarxha, pArxNAnugarxhaveMba tirxvidha liMgagaLu (savasaM. 2; alalxma. 789-222); \hbox{jaMga\-maveV} kAyAnugarxhamUtiR noVDayayx (savasaM. 10; gurusi. 673-367); kAyAnugarxhasathxla, iMdirxyAnugarxhasathxla, pArxNAnu\-garxhasathxla (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 780-355); kAyAnugarxha ...anugarxhavu kAyavanunx liMgakekx apiRsuvudu ililx aMgavikAragaLu dUrAguvuvu (shivAkoV. 63-105).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{kAyasayx anugarxhaH - kAyAnugarxhaH}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{kAyAnugarxhasathxla}
\meaning{\arthanonum{parxsAdisathxlada oMbatutx vidha liMgasathxla\-gaLalilx oMdu avAMtarasathxla. niSakxlanAda shivanu mUtiRrUpadalilxdudx jiVvigaLanunx anugarxhisuvaMte jAcnxnAcArasaMpananxnU shivarUpiyU Ada shivayoVgiyu tananx kAya (deVha) vanunx janarige toVrisutAtx janaranunx anugarxhisutAtxne. AdadxriMda shiva\-yoVgiyu kAyAnugarxhi enisutAtxne. aMtaha kAyAnu\-garxhige saMbaMdhisida sathxla. dhamARcAra, BAvAcAra, jAcnxnAcAra eMba tirxvidhaveVkavAda liMgavu parxsAdiya shariVradalilx liVnavAguva sathxla:}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
sathxlaBeVdA nava porxVkAtxH parxsAdisathxlasaMshirxtAH |\\[1pt]
kAyAnugarxhaNaM pUvaRM... ||\\[1pt]
yathA shivoV{\char'263}nugaqhANxti mUtiRmAvishayx deVhinaH |\\[1pt]
tathA yoVgiV shariVrasathxH savARnugArxhakoV BaveVtf ||\\[1pt]
anugaqhANxti yalolxVkAnf savxkAyaM dashaRyananxsw |\\[1pt]
tasAmxdeVSa samAKAyxtaH kAyAnugarxhanAmakaH ||
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi., 17. 2. 5-6)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\ullekha{keVLi, keVLirayAyx shivaBakatxsharaNajanaMgaLu niVvelalx. nUroMdu sathxlada niNaRya\-vanu ArusathxladalalxDagisi, Arusathxlada niNaRya\-vanu mUrusathxladalalxDagisi, A mUrusathxla oMdAda mUla\-barxhamxdalilx sharaNana kuruhu aDagi nimARyavAda BeVdamaM peVLevx... kAyAnugarxhasathxla, iMdirxyAnugarxhasathxla, pArxNAnu\-garxhasathxla, kAyApiRtasathxla, karaNApiRtasathxla, BAvApiRtasathxla, shiSayxsathxla, shushUrxSAsathxla, seVvayxsathxla I oMbatutx shivaliMgasathxlaM\-gaLu (savasaM. 14; SaNumxKa. 780-355); savARcAra\-BAvalasadAcAravaMtA lasadf jAcnxnadAcAraveMdeMbavuM tiLiya\-leVkavAdA liMgadaviraLasuliMga suKiyA liMgada kAMta\-parxsAdiya sakAyadoLavagArxhakaM tathA gurusudashaRnavaMga\-mumanaMTe muMtera\-Dana\char'273\char'236yenaMgada saMKeyxyenalu kAyAnu\-garxhasathxla (viVsheYpu. 8-126-24); shirxVmadAcAyaR liMga\-tirxvidhaveVkavAdiV mahitaliMgaM parxsAdiya shariVradoLu perxVma\-diMdavagavisalAga kAyAnugarxhasathxlavideMdenisitu (keYvasha. 111-1-palalxvi).}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\ni{kAyAnugarxhaH iti sathxlaM - kAyAnugarxhasathxlaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{kAyApaRNa}
\meaning{\arthanonum{kAyA\-paRNa, karaNApaRNa matutx BAvApaRNa eMba tirxvidha apaRNa\-gaLalilx oMdu; deVhABimAnavanunx tayxjisu\-vudu:}}

\smallskip
\pauthor{si.shi., 17-34}
\smallskip

\begin{entry}
  \word{keYlAsa}
  \src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{parashivanu nelesiruva sathxLa; shivaloVka; purANagaLa parxkAra, keYlAsavu parashivana sAthxna. alilx pAvaRti, gaNapati, kumAra, BaqMgi, tuMbura, parxmatharu muMtAdavaru avana saMgaDa irutAtxre. kaThiNa AdhAyxtimxka sAdhaneyanunx mADida shivaBakatxru sadeVhigaLAgi alilxge hoVgi, shivana saninxdhiyalelxV anaMtakAla irutAtxre. avarige shivasAninxdhayxdalilx yAva tApatarxyavU iruvudilalx. Adare vacanakArara parxkAra, keYlAsaveMbudu AdhAyxtimxka sAdhaneya parama guri eMbudu suLuLx. keYlAsavide eMdu naMbuvavaranunx sharaNaru apahAsayx mADidAdxre. keYlAsaveMbudoMdu BUmiyoLiruva hALu beTaTx eMdu heVLuva sidadhxrAmanu adoMdu vishAvxtiVta parxdeVshavalalxveMdu KacitapaDisutAtxne. ``BakitxyeMba pitatx talegeVri, keYlAsada baTeTxya hatutxva pApAtamxra kaMDu enanx mana nAcitutx'' eMdu basavaNaNx vayxMgayxvanAnxDutAtxne.}}
\vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad keYlAsavanunx KaMDisuvudoMdeV vacanakArara guriyalalx. avaru KaMDisutitxruvudu dhAmiRkajiVvanada guriya bagegiruva namamx tapupx kalapxneyanunx. sAdhAraNavAgi keYlAsa\-veMba parikalapxneyu Bakatx (aMga) beVre, keYlAsadalilxruva parashiva beVre eMba devxYta sidAdhxMtavanUnx, parashivanu namimxMda bahaLa dUra iruva, yAvAgaloV omemx BUmige iLidu baruva deVvaru eMba sidAdhxMtavanUnx parxtipAdisutatxde. vacana\-kAraru iveraDu sidAdhxMtagaLanUnx KaMDisidaralalxde, parashivanu namamxlelxV idAdxne athavA {nAvelalx} shivAMshikareV eMba sidAdhxMta\-vanUnx, shivasAkASxtAkxravAdAga nAvu shivanoMdige aikayx sAdhisa\-bahudu eMba sidAdhxMtavanUnx parxtipAdisidaru. keYlAsakekx hoVgabeVkAdavaru modalu videVhigaLAgabeVku, Adare vacanakAraru jiVvanumxkitx sidAdhxMtavanunx parxtipAdisidaru. shivajiVveYkayxteyanunx sAdhisidavana deVhadalilx shivaniruvudariMda, basavaNaNxnavaru kAyaveV keYlAsaveMdaru. alalxde vacanakArara parxkAra, keYlAsaveMba dheyxVyakikxMta liMgeYkayxteyeMba dheyxVyaveV sherxVSaThxveMdU sAridaru:}
\ullekha{BakitxyeMba pitatx talegeVri keYlAsada baTeTxya hatutxva vayxthaRra kaMDu enanx mana nAcitutx (savasaM. 1; basava. 1291-355); citfkeYlAsavaneYduvaDe jaMgamapAdave mahAdAvxravAgipupxdayAyx (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1332-471); keYyalilx joyxVtiya hiDidu katatxleyenaleVtakekx?... nitayx anitayxva tiLidu, matasxR keYlAsaveMbudu Bakatxrige yukitxyalalx (savasaM. 5; moVLima. 1162-345).}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\ni{keV - jaleV lAsaH lasanaM asayx iti - keYlAsaH}}
\end{entry}

\ullekha{jiVvapashugaLaM kolavx kAlavAyxGarxnaM saMharisi, tatatxvXrUpa\-mapapx vicitarx\-vaNaRmapapx digavxsanamuLuLxdariM vAyxGarxcamARMbara\-dhAriyAde. ninanx shirasisxna meVle kamaRkeVshaMgaLilalxde navagarxha\-savxrUpa puSapxgaLiM parishoVBiyAgiruvudariMda gaganakeVshiyAde (savasaM. 13; mumamxDi. 1056-513).}}

\ullekha{nAlUkx kalashada parxteyxVka parxdhAna deVvategaLaM kuLiLxrisi gurukalashavaM sAthxpayxvaM mADuva karxmaveMteMdaDe - cwkamadheyxV sumAMgalayxM SoVDashaM kalashaM tathA - BAsuraM taMDulaM tasayx paMca\-sUtarxM tatheYva ca teVSu tiVthARMbupUNeRVSu nidadhAyxdAmarxpalalxvAnf dUvARMkurasupUgAni nAgavalilxVdalAnayxpi paMcamuKaMgaLa\-nikikx gurukalashavaM sAthxpayxvaM mADuvudu (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1428-511); I maMtarxdiMda gurukalashakekx paMcasUtarxM\-gaLanikikx paMcapalalxvaMgaLanikikx paMcamuKaMgaLanikikx gurukalashavaM sAthxpayxvaM mADuvudu (gaNaBA. 189-21); gurukaLasha: BadArx\-sanade kuLiLxdaR vilasita shirxVguruvanakakx\char'273\char'236Mda parxmathayoVgigaLu pUjise virAjisutipaRramita paratatatxvXvA shirxVgurukaLasha (viVsheYpu. 7-103-44); nAlukx kaLashamaM nAledxseyoLirisi tanamxdhayxdoLf gurukaLashamaM nilisi paramashakitxyoLe tatfkaLashamaM guruBAva\-doLf kaMDu pUjisuvudu (cebapu. 56-30).}}

\meaning{\arthanonum{vaqtAtxkAra; maMtarxjapanAyxsavidhigaLalilx oMdu karxma. sAdhakanu AtamxrakaSxNeya saluvAgi mADuva nAyxsavidhi. adara karxmavu hiVgide: haqdaya, muKa, hegalu, toDe, kaMTha, nABi, eraDU pakekxgaLalilx SaDakaSxramaMtarxnAyxsavanunx mADabeVku. matetx paqSaThx, haqdaya, masatxka, muKa matutx eraDU kaNuNxgaLu, eraDU BujagaLu, kiVlugaLu, muMgeYgaLalilx adeV maMtarxnAyxsavanunx mADabeVku. shirasusx, muKa, haqdaya, kukiSx, toDegaLu, pAdagaLu matutx kaMThadalilx aBaya matutx iSaTxvara\-dAna muderxgaLanunx vinAyxsa mADabeVku. anaMtara muKa, hegalu, haqdaya, pAda, toDegaLu matutx udarada meVle karxmavAgi SaDakaSxramaMtarxda Aru vaNaRgaLanunx yathAvatAtxgi nAyxsa mADabeVku. matetx shirasusx, haNe, udara, hegalu matutx haqdayasAthxnagaLalilx adeV maMtArxkaSxragaLanunx karxmavAgi nAyxsa mADabeVku. anaMtara ``sAthxNusavxrUpAya joyxVtiliRMgAmaqtAtamxneV, catumURtiR vapucACxyA BAsitAMgAya {shaMBaveV} namaH'' eMdu heVLutAtx shivananunx
manasisxnalilx dhAyxnisa\-beVku:}}
\medskip
\begin{shl}
kuviRVta goVlakanAyxsaM rakASxyeY tadanaMtaramf |\\[1pt]
haqdi vakAtxrXMsayoVrUvoRVH kaMTheV nABw divxpAshavxRyoVH ||\\[3pt]
paqSeThxV haqdi tatoV mUdhinxR vadaneV neVtarxyoVnayxRseVtf |\\[1pt]
doVSoVH saMdhiSu sAgerxVSu vinayxseVtatxdanaMtaramf ||\\[3pt]
shiroVvadanahaqtukxkiSxsoVrupAdadavxyeV shiveV |\\[1pt]
haqdi vakAtxrXMbujeV kaMTheV maqgABayavareVSaTxdAH ||\\[3pt]
vakAtxrXMsahaqtusx pAdoVrujaThareVSu karxmAnanxyXseVtf |\\[1pt]
mUlamaMterxVSu maMtArxNARnf yathAvadedxVvi vinayxseVtf ||\\[3pt]

catumURtiRvapucACxyA BAsitAMgAya shaMBaveV ||\\[3pt]
EvaM nayxsatxshariVroV{\char'263}sw ciMtayeVnAmxM maheVshavxri ||
\end{shl}
\medskip
\pauthor{(pAra. A., 11. 50-55)}

EkeMdare, \hbox{sAdhakanu} avugaLanunx keVvala aBAyxsabaladiMda mADutAtxneyeV horatu, A kirxyegaLa athaRvAgali, avanunx Eke mADabeVkeMbudAgali avanige gotitxlalx. avugaLanunx manasisxTuTx mADabeVku. athaR gotitxdadxrU manasisxTuTx mADadidadxre EnU parxyoVjanavilalx.}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad vasutxgaLu elilxveyoV alilxMdaleV, keYyiMda muTaTxde keVvala manasisxnalelxV, avugaLanunx apiRsuvudu miVrida kirxye; parxtiyoMdu iMdirxya, aMtaHkaraNagaLalilx liMgavanunx sAthxpisi, vasutxgaLanunx tAnu anuBavisuva modalu, avugaLalilxruva liMgakekx (parashivanige) apiRsuvudU miVrida kirxyeyeV. deVheVMdirxyAdikaraNagaLanunx parashivanige apiRsi, anaMtara avugaLanunx baLasuvudu, tAnu mADuvudelalxvU liMgakAkxgiyeV eMdu tiLiyuvudU saha miVrida kirxyegaLeV.}}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad modalina eraDu kirxyegaLigU, miVrida kirxyegaLigU iruva vayxtAyxsaveMdare: modalina eraDu kirxyegaLanunx iMdirxya\-gaLa mUlaka yAru beVkAdarU tiLidukoLaLx\-bahudu. \vskip 3pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sAdhakanu tananx AtamxvanUnx samapiRsi, liMgAMgasAmarasayx paDeda meVle, avanige ahaMnaSaTx (mananaSaTx) uMTAgutatxde. \begin{entry}
\word{catuviRdhaparxsAda}
\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{guruparxsAda, liMgaparxsAda, jaMgama\-parxsAda, parxsAda parxsAdaveMba nAlukx bageya parxsAda\-gaLu: parxsAdada parxkAragaLanunx vivarisuvAga vacanakAraralilx omamxta\-vilalx. kelavaru parxsAdavu tirxvidhaveMdU, matetx kelavaru EkAdashavidhaveMdU heVLidare, matetx kelavaru catuviRdhaveMdu heVLidAdxre. catuviRdha parxsAdada bagege kaniSaThx mUru aBipArxya\-gaLive.}}
\vskip 6pt
\newmeaning{\artha{kADasidedhxVshavxraneMba sharaNanu catuviRdhaparxsAdaveMdare, acacx, nicacx, sidadhx matutx samayaveMba nAlukx vidhada parxsAda\-venunxtAtxne. alalxde, avelalxvanUnx I keLaginaMte vivarisidAdxne.}}
\vskip 6pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad guruvu (AcAyaRnu) shudadhxparxsAdada parxtiVka. avaniMda diVkeSx paDeda Bakatxnu tAnU guruvinaMtAgabeVku eMdu {parxtijecnx} mADabeVku. hiVge shudadhxparxsAdada savxrUpAcAyaRnanunx tanuvinalilx sAvxyata mADikoMDu (aMdare, AcAyaRnu boVdhisida AcAragaLanunx shariVradalilx aLavaDisikoMDu) A mUlaka tanuvina keTaTx guNagaLanunx kaLedukoMDare, Aga doreyuvudu acacxparxsAda.}}
\vskip 6pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad guruvu karuNeyiMda koDuva iSaTxliMgavU oMdu parxsAdaveV. guru  koTaTx sidadhxparxsAdarUpavAda cililxMgavanunx Bakatxnu  manasisxnalilx sAvxyata mADikoMDare, adariMda manasisxna duguRNagaLu naSaTxvAgutatxve. hAge naSaTxvAdare nAvu tegedukoMDa parxsAda nicacx (nitayx) parxsAda. liMgavu nitayxvAdudariMda, hAgU liMgaveV parxsAdavAdudariMda, adu nitayxparxsAda (nitayx = shAshavxtavAda liMgaveMba parxsAda) enisikoLuLxtatxde.}}
\vskip 4pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad guru matutx liMgagaLaMte jaMgamavU saha oMdu \hbox{parxsAdaveV}. sidadhxparxsAdarUpanAda jaMgamavanunx Atamxdalilx sAvxyata mADikoMDare Aga Atamxda jiVvatavxBAva naSaTxvAgutatxde; Aga doreyuvudu samayaparxsAda. shudadhx, sidadhx matutx parxsAda\-savxrUpavAda mahAliMgavU oMdu \hbox{parxsAdaveV}. A mahAliMgavanunx savARMgadalilx sAvxyata mADikoMDare, Aga elalx liMgagaLa duSaTxguNagaLu naSaTxvAgi, pUNaRBakitx nelesutatxde. hiVge pUNaRBakitx nelesidare, nAvu tegedukoLuLxva parxsAda Eka parxsAda. ililx, Bakatxnu tananxnunx tAneV apiRsikoMDu (hAgU parxsAdavanAnxgi mADikoMDu) parxsAdigU parxsAdakUkx iruva aMtaravanunx aLisihAkuvudeV EkaparxsAdada athaR. Adare catuviRdhaparxsAdavu parxsAdigiMta BinanxveMbudanunx gamanisabeVku:}
\ullekha{emamx shivasharaNara parxsAdavivara eMteMdaDe: shudadhxparxsAda\-savxrUpavAda sadUrxpAcArayxnanu tanuvinalilx sAvxyatava mADi A tanu parxkaqti A guruvinalilx naSaTxvAdudeV acacxparxsAda. sidadhxparxsAda\-savxrUpavAda cidUrxpaliMgavanu manadalilx sAvxyatava mADi, A manoVparxkaqti A liMgadalilx naSaTxvAdudeV nicacxparxsAda. sidadhxparxsAda\-savxrUpavAda paramAnaMdajaMgamavanu Atamxdalilx sAvxyatava mADi Atamxparxkaqti A jaMgamadalilx naSaTxvAdudeV samayaparxsAda. shudadhx sidadhx parxsidadhx parxsAdatarxyada EkasavxrUpavAda mahAparxsAda, aMtapapx mahAparxsAdasavxrUpavAda GanamahAliMgavu. A Gana\-mahAliMgavanu ApAdamasatxkapariyaMtaravAgi, savARMga\-dalilx sAvxyatava mADi A liMgaparxkAshadalilx savARMgada parxkaqti naSaTx\-vAgi, aMtapapx GanamahAliMgadeVkasavxrUpa tAnAdudeV Eka\-parxsAda. iMtiV nAlukx tarada parxsAdava koMDavaru AreMdaDe: hiMdakekx kalAyxNapuradalilx basavAdi parxBudeVvarAMtayxmAda ELu\-nUrepapxtutx parxmathagaNaMgaLu, inunx muMde shivajAcnxnoVdaya\-vAgi shirxVgurukAruNayxva paDedu, liMgAMgasaMbaMdhigaLAda shiva\-sharaNarige ideV parxsAdavu noVDeMdanayAyx namamx kADanoLa\-gAda shaMkarapirxya cananxkadaMbaliMga nimARyaparxBuve (savasaM. 10; kADasi. 165-110).}
\artha{kuSaTxgi karibasaveVshavxra eMba vacanakArana parxkAra guruparxsAda, nitayxparxsAda, jAcnxnaparxsAda matutx sidadhxparxsAda eMba nAlukx vidhada parxsAdagaLu.}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad guru koTaTx parxsAda guruparxsAda. liMgavu nitayxvAduda\-riMda, liMgamuKadiMda baMdudu nitayxparxsAdavenisikoLuLxtatxde. jaMgamaveMdare liMgAMgasAmarasayxda mUlaka jAcnxna paDedAta. aMthavanu mAtarx beVreyavarige jAcnxnavanunx niVDabalalx. avaniMda baMda jAcnxnavU oMdu parxsAdaveV. vAsatxvavAgi, jAcnxnaparxsAdavu haNuNx, hAlu muMtAda Bwtika parxsAda\-gaLigiMtalU sherxVSaThxvAdudu. jaMgamaniMda paDeda jAcnxnada mUlaka Bakatxnu AdhAyxtimxka sididhxyanunx paDedu, sidadhxnenisikoLuLxtAtxne athavA jAcnxnamuKadalilx baMda parxsAdavu sidadhxparxsAda\-venisikoLuLxtatxde.}}
\vskip 5pt
\newmeaning{\artha{gurusidadhxdeVvaru eMba vacanakArana parxkAra, \hbox{catuviRdha} parxsAdada paTiTxyalilx guruparxsAda, liMgaparxsAda, jaMgama\-parxsAda matutx nijaparxsAdagaLu seVrive. meVle heVLida padagaLeV ililxyU baLakeyAgidadxrU, avugaLa athaRdalilx vayxtAyxsa\-vide. avana parxkAra, diVkASxvidhigaLa mUlaka guruvu shiSayxnige koDuva iSaTxliMgaveV guruparxsAda; iSaTxliMga pUjAvidhigaLa parxkAra, guruvu shiSayxnige dashavidha pAdoVdaka matutx EkAdashaparxsAdavanunx karuNisuvudeV liMgaparxsAda. saqSiTxvicAra, Atamx vicAra, manuSayxnalilxruva yAva kalAshakitxge yAru adhideVvate, yAva Bakitxge yAva liMga, yAva cakarxdalilx yAva liMgavide, itAyxdi sakiVlagaLa rahasayxvanunx \hbox{jaMgamanu} (jAcnxnavanunx paDedavanu) shiSayxnige boVdhisuvudariMda, A boVdhaneyeV jaMgamaparxsAdavenisikoLuLxtatxde.~shiSayxnu I boVdhaneganuguNavAgi naDedukoMDu, savARcArasaMpatitx\-noDagUDi BinanxBAvava tayxjisi, tAnu matutx liMga (parashiva) oMdeV eMba aikayxBAvavanunx anu\-BAvada mUlaka paDedukoMDare, tAneV nijaparxsAdavAgutAtxne; vAsatxvavAgi, alapxsavxlapx badalAvaNegaLanunx horatu\-paDisi, catuviRdhaparxsAdada bagegina I sharaNara kalapxnegaLu oMdeV teranidudx, avugaLa hesarugaLaSeTxV BinanxvAgive eMbudanunx nAvu gamanisabahudu:}
\ullekha{ayayx, varakumAradeVshi\-keVMdarxne, niVnu aSaTxBoVgaMgaLaM tayxjisi, ninanx nijadiMda ninAnxdimadhAyxva\-sAnava tiLidu noVDidaDe ninanx kaNaNx muMde baMdipuRdu noVDA mahAparxsAdavu. adeMteMdaDe: mahAjAcnxna tale\-doVri savaRsaMgaparitAyxgava mADi, gurUpAvasethxyaM mADida shiSoyxVtatxmaMge shirxVguruliMgajaMgamavu parxtayxkaSxvAgi nAlavx\-rArAdhayx Bakatx mAheVshavxraroDagUDi, aMgaliMgada pUvARsharxyava kaLedu, kumAra ThAva mADisi, seVvABaqtayxriMda paMcakalaMshaMgaLa sAthxpisi, sUtarxva hAkisi, aSaTxvidhAcaRne SoVDashoVpacAraMgaLa mADisi, tamamx kaqpAhasatxvaniTuTx, jaMgamamUtiRgaLa siMhA\-sanada meVle mUtaRva mADisi, shirxVguruliMgavu edudx parxmatharoDa\-gUDi, kumAra ThAva mADidaMgaliMgava tananx caraNataLakekx sUtarxva hiDisi, guru-shiSayxtavxveMba uBayaBeVdavaLidu EkarUpa\-vAgi, niraMjanajaMgamamUtiRge aBivaMdisi aSATxMgaparxNata\-rAgi, apapxNeya besagoMDu, A niraMjana jaMgamamUtiRge parxtisiMhAsanava mADisi,  mUtaRgoLisi, gurushiSayxraBimuKa\-rAgi, guruvina daqkukx shiSayxna masatxkada meVle sUsi, shiSayxna daqkukx guruvina caraNakamaladalilx sUsi, EkaliMganeYSeThxyiMda sAva\-dhAnaBakitx karigoMDu. EkeMdare, jaDa (acitf) vasutxgaLu saqSiTxsabeVkeMdu nidhaRrisuvudilalx. alalxde, shUnayxsathxladalelxV citf ilalxdidadxre, parashivanige nidhARrasathxladalilx citutx elilxMda baralu sAdhayx? citutx parashivana muKayx lakaSxNa\-gaLalolxMdAgiruvudariMdaleV, avananunx cidAnaMda, cidAkAsha, citfsUyaR, citfparxkAsha, cidaGxna muMtAgi kareyuvudu.}}

A Ishavxranalilx mAheV\-shavxra, A mAheVshavxranalilx rudarx, A rudarxnalilx tarxyava(?) hiraNayxgaBaR virATfmUtiR iMtiV eMbatutxmUru mUtiRgaLoLage eMbatetx\-raDeV basavaNaNxnaMgavoMdeV pArxNa (savasaM. 11; gumamxLA. 768-379); sucidaMbarada madhayxdoLu niMdanA shAMtamalalx inAnx cidaMbarada CaMda QuSi deVvategaLanAnxDe maMtarxyaMtorxV\-dadhxraNegaLa peVLevxnu (viVsheYpu. 5-72-28).}}

\artha{Atamxna vayxvahAragaLa vayxtAyxsadiMdAguva jiVvAtamx, aMtarAtamx, paramAtamx, nimaRlAtamx, shudAdhxtamx, jAcnxnAtamx, mahAtamx matutx BUtAtamx eMba eMTu parxkAragaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{jiVvAtamxnaMta\-rAtamxM parAtamxM nimaRlAvisheVSAtamx shudAdhxtamx sujAcnxnAtamxnoV\-valu mahAtamx BUtAtamxniMtaSATxtamxru (viVsheYpu. 7-100-20).}

\ullekha{Atamxna vikAsavU adaraMteyeV hecucxtatx hoVgutatxde. vikAsa hoMdida hAge Atamxnu anukarxma\-vAgi jiVvAtamx, aMtarAtamx, paramAtamx, nimaRlAtamx, shudAdhxtamx, jAcnxnAtamx eMdu heVLalapxDutAtxne matutx kaDeya mUru Atamxna sithxti\-gaLu mahAtamx, divAyxtamx matutx cinamxyAtamx eMdu heVLalapxDutatxve (shivAkoV. 25-38).}
\artha{mUvatAtxru bageya tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdu:}
\ullekha{CatitxVsatatatxvXdoLu rAjisututxviRyoLagaNuvigaNuvA mahatitxgemahatitxvaRrilelxnisuvadavxya rUpaniravanAM baNiNxsuvo\-DaLave eMdaM ipapxtatxneya tatatxvXveV pArxNavAyuvAgipupxdadane deYvaveMbarA yoVgigaLu ipapxtotxMdaneya tatatxvXvadu jiVvAtamxnu (viVsheYpu. 3-28-34).}}
